K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:7b-11: sems can 'byams klas pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:7b-13: ye shes brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos 'byams klas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:7b-14: chos 'byams klas pa'i rgyan de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdzod thams cad nas byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8a-0: lhag pa'i bsam pas rnam par dag pa'i sems kyi rgyud mnyam pa nyid kyis zhugs pa'i ye shes 'byams klas pa rab @8a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8a-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8a-3: grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku las byung ba'i lus rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8a-4: lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas mos pa rab tu grub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8a-5: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs la brtson pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8a-6: sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8a-7: sangs rgyas kyi yul la yang dag par gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8a-8: ye shes kyi rgyan mtha' yas pas snang bar byas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i las kyis mngon par byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8a-10: tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad la mkhas pa rnam par dag pa khong du chud par bya ba la rab tu zhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8a-11: theg pa chen po mtha' yas pa'i rnam par 'phrul pas rab tu byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8a-12: 'gro ba mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba yang dag par bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8a-13: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8a-15: yongs su bsngo ba yongs su rdzogs pa thob par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8a-16: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis mnyam pa nyid kyi smon lam gyi dbang pos brtson zhing chags pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8a-17: grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su dbang po rno ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8b-0: chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i dbang @8b po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8b-1: mi zad pa'i dbang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8b-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brtson pa'i dbang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8b-3: sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i dbang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8b-4: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lung bstan pa la phyir mi ldog par shin tu brtson pa'i dbang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8b-5: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu phugs pa'i dbang po rdo rje'i khams lta bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes mtha' dang dbus med pa'i snang bar tu thob pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8b-7: rdo rje'i 'od 'phro ba'i dbang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8b-8: dbang po rab tu dbye ba thams cad ma lus pa la dbang sgyur ba'i dbang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8b-9: sems can mu med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbang po la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8b-10: dbang po mtha' yas pa 'byams klas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8b-11: dbang po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i dbang po bsgribs pa med cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8b-12: rnam par dag pa rab tu thob par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8b-13: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rab tu brtson pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8b-15: grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8b-17: byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:8b-18: ye shes mtha' yas pas khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9a-0: lus ma g-yos par sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu @9a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang chags pa med cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9a-3: thogs pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9a-4: ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis brlab cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9a-5: yang dag par bstan pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9a-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pas rnam par rtse ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9a-8: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i sems skad cig gi rdzu 'phrul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9a-9: dngos po med pa la rab tu gnas pas mi rten pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9a-10: skra'i sbubs gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9a-11: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyu zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9a-12: sems can 'byams klas pa thams cad rnam par bstan pa'i ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i rdzu 'phrul rab tu thob par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9a-13: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9a-14: grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu dag pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i ye shes kyis 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9a-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' dang dbus med par rab tu zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi sa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9a-16: skye ba med pa la brtson pa'i sems bskyed pa la 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9b-0: @9b kun tu bzang pos rtogs pa'i sgo nas 'jug pas rab tu 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu thob pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa re rer lus kun tu dgye ba'i byin gyi rlabs shin tu bstan pas zhing gi rgyud la rab tu zhugs par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9b-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9b-3: grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su sangs rgyas kyi rigs su 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyud la gnas shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9b-4: rnam pa'i tshul tha dad pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9b-5: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas rnam par phye ba thob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9b-6: tshad med pa'i smon lam la yang dag par brtson zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9b-7: dus gsum gyi chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu zhugs pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i tshul kun shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9b-8: rab tu shes pa dang rjes su rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi dbyings la rab tu zhugs par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9b-9: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i sgos rnam par dag par byas pa'i mig gi sgo dang ldan zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:9b-11: grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su skra'i sbubs re re zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i zhing rnams yang dag par 'dzud pa rab tu shes par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10a-1: bzhin du chos kyi dbyings thams cad la 'jug pa nye bar bzung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10a-2: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10a-3: skra'i sbubs gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings thams cad nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i skra'i sbubs thams cad du 'dzud pa la rab tu mkhas par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10a-4: shin tu shes par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10a-5: mngon par rtogs par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10a-6: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10a-7: grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su sems kyi skad cig gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal pa lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par ston par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10a-8: mtha' dang dbus med pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas mthong bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10a-9: rab tu zhugs par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10a-10: de bzhin du sems can gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa'i sems kyi skad cig la 'jug pa'i tshul du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10a-11: tshul 'di kun tu bzang po la brtson pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su shes par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10a-12: rab tu rtogs par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10a-13: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10a-14: grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems kyis lus re rer yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i lus yongs su 'dzud pa mthong bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10a-15: rab tu rtogs par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10b-0: lus gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin @10b du lus 'byams klas pa la 'jug pa thams cad ma lus par nye bar bzung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10b-1: sems can gyi khams thams cad ma tshang ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10b-2: lhag pa med par shes pa'i sems bskyed pa chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10b-3: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas yongs su bsngos pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10b-4: tshul gyis 'di la rab tu zhugs par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10b-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10b-6: grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10b-7: sangs rgyas thams cad rtog par bya ba rab tu rtogs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10b-8: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang bral ba med cing mtshan gyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i sku dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10b-9: dbyangs kyi yan lag rab tu dgye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10b-10: rgyun chad pa med pas snang bar mdzad pas gang ba rab tu chud par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10b-11: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa de dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag kyang kun tu bzang po'i smon lam yangs pa rgya chen po dang 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'du shes phyin ci log dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10b-14: lta ba phyin ci log las 'phags pa'i lta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:10b-15: phyin ci log thams cad spangs pa'i tshul gyis dmigs su med par rab tu rtogs par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:11a-0: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas @11a *//

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:11a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs la tshul gcig tu 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:11a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la rnam pa du mar rab tu 'jug pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:11a-10: spyi'i tshugs su rgyu ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams la rab tu 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:11a-11: phyogs kyi dra ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rgyud dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:11a-12: zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad la 'jug pa yongs su shes par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:11a-13: rab tu rtogs par gyur cig /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:11b-19: 'dul bar 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:12a-18: 'du shes pa'i rnam pa de dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:12a-19: 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i sa de dag thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:17a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i mngal na rnam par 'phrul bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:17a-12: chos kyi dbyings thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gcig par ma'i ltor shong pa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:17b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i mngal na sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba thams @17b cad yang dag par bstan pa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:17b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i tshe shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:17b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i gom pa bdun du sengge'i stabs su 'gro ba'i ye shes shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:17b-3: byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na thabs mkhas pa yang dag par ston pa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:17b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'byung ba'i tshul dang spyod pa rab tu sbyor ba shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:17b-5: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:17b-6: byang chub sems dpas bdud kyi sde rab tu pham par byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:17b-7: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:17b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi gdan la 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:17b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu dgye ba shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:17b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba yang dag par bstan pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:17b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i nga ro phyung ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa chen po shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:17b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad gdul ba'i 'khor du thogs pa med pa shin tu phra ba dang; de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la byang chub kyi sems rdo rje lta bu yongs su shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18a-1: 'gengs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yongs su bstan pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par rgyun mi 'chad pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar thug par thogs pa med pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18a-4: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa'i zhing gi yul thams cad du sems can 'dul bar sangs rgyas skye ba bstan pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18a-5: sangs rgyas kyi sku gcig sangs rgyas kyi sku tha dad pa rab tu spro ba'i shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18a-8: da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyu mchog gi mthu dbyung ba'i ye shes shin tu phra ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sems kyi skad cig re re zhing rnam par 'phel ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sbyor ba phyir mi ldog cing rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18a-10: kun tu bzang por rab tu 'phros pa'i yongs su bsngo ba'i sa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khong na yang dag par 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18b-0: 'dod chags dang bral ba med @18b pas byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sgo'i dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18b-1: spyod pa 'byams klas pa la brtson pa shin tu rnam par sbyangs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la dmigs pa 'gro ba thams cad bde bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang bsam pas chen por bsgrubs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18b-4: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'dul ba'i dmigs pa'i mdzod kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i sgo rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18b-5: byang chub sems dpa' 'jug pa'i sgo de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18b-6: chos bstan pa 'gal ba med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad kyi don la rab tu bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18b-7: 'gro ba thams cad kyis mi bsgul ba'i dam bcas pa shin tu rgya che ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18b-8: sems skad cig gis mthar phyin pa'i 'jug pa dang; dmigs pa'i mdzod sems dang sems ma yin pa'i sa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18b-9: yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo sems ma yin pa'i sems mngon par bsgrubs pa dang; ye shes kyis tshig gi lam thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18b-10: spyod pas mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i byin gyi rlabs byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18b-11: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor phyi ma'i mtha'i mur rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:18b-12: spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19a-3: tshig gi lam du gdags pas gtugs pa'i byin gyi rlabs khyad par gyi smon lam chen pos rnam par 'phrul pas khong du chud par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19a-4: rab tu shes par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19a-5: shin tu sgrub par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19a-6: rnam par spyod par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19a-7: 'gro ba kun tu yang dag par ston par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19a-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19a-9: grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su sems can gyi khams thams cad la 'jug par shes pa shin tu phra ba dang; sems can gyi khams rnam par dbye ba shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19a-10: sems can gyi khams sna tshogs rtogs par bstan pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19a-11: sems can gyi khams du ma'i mngon par zhen pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19a-12: sems can gyi khams kyi bye brag tha dad par shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19a-13: sems can gyi khams skal ba mnyam pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19a-14: sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa'i lam gyi rgyud shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19a-15: sems can gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa mngon par 'du bya ba sna tshogs rnam par rtog par gyur pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19a-16: sems can mtha' yas pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19b-0: @19b sems can grangs med pa'i rnam par byang ba shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19b-1: sems can gyi khams kyi yul shes pa shin tu phra ba 'di dag dang shes pa shin tu phra ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sems skad cig dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi phung po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19b-2: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19b-3: dus ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pas 'dul ba yongs su bzung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19b-4: dus thams cad du chos kyi sgo brjod du med pa rab tu bstan cing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu brtson pa'i ye shes 'byams klas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19b-6: 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dga' ba'i gnas su gyur pa'i lus brjod du med pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i sems la zhugs pa ye shes kyi nyi mas snang bar byas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i sems mngon par rdzogs pa'i byin gyi rlabs byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19b-9: ye shes chen po 'byams klas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19b-10: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu brtson pa'i 'jug pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19b-11: rab tu shes par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:19b-12: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20a-0: grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis @20a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20a-2: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad shes pa shin tu phra ba 'di lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams cher gyur pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya chen po shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20a-9: 'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20a-10: 'jig rten gyi khams dog pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20a-12: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par sangs rgyas skye bas rgyas par dgang ba shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20a-13: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par rab tu snang bar bya ba shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20a-14: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par lus kyis rgyas par dgang ba shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20a-15: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par 'od zer rab tu dgye bas snang bar bya ba shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20a-16: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20b-0: @20b sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20b-1: khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par bstan pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par dbyangs gcig gis dbyangs thams cad rnam par bstan cing rgyas par dgang ba shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis sangs rgyas kyi sku kun nas bskor bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la 'jug pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20b-4: chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus par sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu byin gyis brlabs pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20b-5: chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byin gyis brlabs pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par rmi lam lta bur 'jug pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par mig yor lta bur rnam par dmigs pas rgyas par dgang ba shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams shes pa shin tu phra ba 'di dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20b-9: shes pa shin tu phra ba de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam par mngon par bsgrubs pa la zhugs shing khong du chud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:20b-10: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21a-2: ye shes khong du chud pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rgyun mi 'chad pa kun tu bzang po sgyu ma lta bur mthong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21a-3: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21a-4: rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub kyi sems kyis yang dag par bskyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21a-5: lus la chags pa med par brtson pa'i yang dag par lta ba dang; dge ba'i rtsa ba chags pa med pa'i ye shes dang ma bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21a-6: mngon par chags pa med pa'i chos nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21a-7: sems kyi rgyud dmigs pa med pas yang dag par 'jug pa dang; mtshan ma la 'jug pa mtshan ma thams cad la gyen du 'phags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i mtshan ma yongs su sbyangs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21a-9: 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21a-10: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par bkod pa khams thams cad shes pa dang ldan pas rab tu shes par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21a-11: khong du chud par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21a-12: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21a-13: grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21a-14: chos kyi dbyings shin tu bstan pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21a-15: chos kyi dbyings yangs pa la 'jug pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21b-0: chos @21b kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dbye ba shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21b-1: chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dbye ba shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21b-2: chos kyi dbyings thams cad sems gcig gis rgyas par dbang ba shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21b-3: chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21b-4: chos kyi dbyings thams cad dmigs su med pa'i spyod yul du shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21b-5: chos kyi dbyings thams cad chags pa med par brtag pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21b-6: chos kyi dbyings thams cad skye ba med par yongs su rig pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21b-7: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21b-8: chos kyi dbyings 'byams klas pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21b-9: 'di dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis ye shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21b-10: chos la dbang ba sgyur ba rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21b-11: 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa la brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:21b-12: don gyi lus yongs su mi gtong zhing lus blta ba la bsgrings pa med pa'i ye shes mnyam pa med pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i rnam pa rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22a-0: chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i rang bzhin las ma g-yos pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin nam mkha' ltar gos pa med pa'i tshig gi lam rnam par @22a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22a-1: brjod pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa rnam par bkod pa'i don gyi rang bzhin shin tu rtogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22a-2: rang bzhin gyis zhi ba yongs su rig pa'i ye shes kyis mi gnas ba'i yid kyi yang dag par rtogs pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22a-3: dmigs pa'i tshul la rten pa med par gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22a-4: chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul yangs pa khong du chud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22a-5: 'jig rten thams cad du mi gnas pas yang dag par rgyu ba chos thams cad la mi dmigs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22a-6: gnas thams cad yang dag par bcom pas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i sgo 'di dag la zhugs pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22a-7: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22a-8: grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su bskal pa gang ji snyed pa thams cad shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22a-9: brjod du med pa'i bskal pa sems kyi skad cig gcig tu byin gyis rlob pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22a-10: sems kyi skad cig gcig la brjod du med pa'i bskal pa yang dag par bstan pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22a-11: grangs med pa'i bskal pa la yang dag par 'jug pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22a-12: bskal pa gcig grangs med pa'i bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22b-0: bskal pa ring po bskal pa thung ngur yang dag par 'jug pa shes pa shin tu phra ba @22b dang; bskal pa thung ngu bskal pa ring por yang dag par 'jug pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22b-1: sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal pa sangs rgyas mi bzhugs par 'jug pa'i shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22b-2: bskal pa thams cad ma lus pa'i grangs shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22b-3: bskal pa thams cad ma lus par bskal pa ma yin par shin tu brtags pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22b-4: sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22b-5: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22b-6: da ltar byung ba'i mu la yod pa'i bskal pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22b-7: dus gsum gyi bskal pa thams cad ma lus par sems kyi skad cig gcig gis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22b-8: bskal pa shes pa shin tu phra ba 'di dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22b-9: bskal pa ma lus pa'i grangs de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis thugs su chud pa shes pa shin tu phra ba de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po rab tu thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22b-10: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22b-11: rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa'i spros pa thams cad rab tu bsal ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:22b-12: skyo ba med pa'i smon lam chen pos rtsom pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:23a-0: mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'jig rten mang por sangs rgyas mang po yang dag par @23a *//

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:23a-3: sems can thams cad shin tu bag dro bar byed pa'i spyod pa'i rigs dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:23b-15: chos la mkhas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi khongs su chud pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:24a-13: mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa shin tu phra ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:24b-10: rmi lam dang 'dra ba'i shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:24b-11: sgyu ma dang 'dra ba'i shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:24b-12: sgra brnyan dang 'dra ba'i shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:24b-13: sprul pa dang 'dra ba'i shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:25a-21: de yang bdag gam gzhan la rnam par mi rtog pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:26a-3: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i lam dang 'gal bar mi byed pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:26a-4: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byed pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:26a-5: ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdams ngag la nan tan byed par 'gyur ba yin; da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdams ngag khong du chud par byed pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:26a-6: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:26a-7: ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid sgrub par 'gyur ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:26a-8: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la nan tan byed pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:26a-9: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la yongs su spyod pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:26a-10: ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la rab tu gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:26a-11: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul dang mnyam par 'gyur ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:26a-12: 'das pa dang; ma byon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:26a-13: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mtshan nyid gcig pa yin /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:26b-8: da ltar byung ba'i sems can gyi gtso bo thams cad kyi yul dang mi 'gal ba thob pa yin te /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:26b-14: khor yug rdo rje'i ri thams cad kyis mi choms pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:26b-15: 'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs thams cad ma lus pa dang ldan zhing zil kyis mi non pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:26b-18: bdud kyi las thams cad rab tu 'joms pa yin /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27a-0: @27a *// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rmongs pa med pa'i ye shes 'byams klas pa dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27a-1: gang dang gang du shi 'pho ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27a-5: 'dug pa thams cad du mi phyed pa'i g-yog 'khor dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27a-8: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27a-9: chos kyi 'byung gnas dran pa yang dag par 'dzin pa rnam par dag pa rab tu thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba la mi skyo bas phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27a-11: gnas thams cad yang dag par bcom pa yang rab tu thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27a-12: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam yang dag par bskyed pa yang thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27a-13: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27a-14: byin gyi rlabs dang; byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27a-15: rnam par 'phrul pa thob par bya ba yang rab tu thob pa yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27a-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27a-17: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-0: de dag zil gyis mi non 'gyur byas @27b shing; ;'dra med de dag phyogs rnams thams cad du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-1: las rnams ci 'drar yongs su bsags byas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-2: de dag kun la brnyas par yong mi byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-3: bdag gis byas pa'am gzhan gyis byas pa yi; ;dge ba gang la'ang brnyas par mi byed de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-4: de la shin tu mos pa rab bskyed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-5: de dag sems can phan phyir yongs su bsngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-6: de dag sems la mtho ba med byas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-7: yid la dma' ba'ang 'chang ba med byas te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-8: rgyal ba rnams kyi sku yi 'phrin las dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-9: gsol ba btab las las yangs gang 'byung dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-10: gang yang rnam pa mang po byed gyur cing; ;sems can kun la bde dang phan sems kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-11: brtan pa'i mos dang bsam las byung ba dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-12: skyes bu dbang por ci nas 'gyur bar bsngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-13: rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed gang yod tshul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-14: 'gro ba 'di na tha dad mi 'dra ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-15: rgya che yangs dang phra mo zab mo'i rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-16: de dag bdag gis yongs bsags shes par bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-17: ji snyed 'jig rten yangs pa'i 'gro ba yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-18: sna tshogs lus rnams lus su gzhol gzud pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-19: de dag shes byas spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-20: ye shes sgo las phyir ldog ma gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-21: gang yang 'jig rten zhing gi sgo mnga' ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-22: phra dang rgya che spyi'u tshug snrel zhi dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-23: skra yi sbubs su kun kyang bsdu byas te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:27b-24: ye shes sgo nas thams cad shes gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-0: gang yang sems kyi tshul mang @28a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-2: de dag sems su yang dag bsdu byas te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-3: ye shes sgo nas de dag shes byas nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-4: spyod lam ldog pa med par spyad par bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-5: 'gro ba kun gyi dbang po bsam pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-6: rgya che de bzhin shin tu phra ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-7: zab mo sna tshogs ji snyed bsdu byas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-8: thams cad rang bzhin ji bzhin shes gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-9: gang yang las kyi rnam pa sna tshogs pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-10: rab dang 'bring dang de bzhin tha ma'i rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-11: thams cad ye shes sgo nas shes byas te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-12: bde gshegs stobs la rab tu 'jug gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-13: bdag gis las gtsang yongs su gang bsags pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-14: 'jig rten bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-15: ji snyed de dag skad cig sems btud cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-16: phyogs rnams kun tu de dag shes gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-17: dus rnams snrel zhir dus gsum gzud byas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-18: bskal pa mi mnyam tha dad mtshan shes nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-19: de dag mnyam nyid de dang 'gal med du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-20: spyod cing kun tu rmongs par med gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-21: 'gro ba'i spyod pa ji snyed gang yang rung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-22: 'jig rten dag na brkyang bskum mi g-yo ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-23: rnam pa tha dad thams cad shes gyur kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-24: mtshan med dngos kyi rlom sems med gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28a-25: phyogs rnams kun na skyes dbang ji snyed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-0: su bzhugs de dag rnam par 'phrul mdzad @28b pa; ;tshul gyis dkon zhing shin tu yangs pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-1: de dag thams cad tshul bzhin shes gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-2: dga' ldan gnas na rang byung gang bzhugs pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-3: mi yi sengge 'dra med chen po dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-4: phra dang yangs dang rnam par rgya che dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-5: rang bzhin bzhin du thams cad mthong gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-6: yum gyi phyal na dpe zla med pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-7: rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed mdzad pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-8: 'tshang rgya mya ngan 'da' dang 'khor lo'i mchog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-9: 'gro ba kun tu ldog pa med pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-10: mi yi sengge bltams par gyur pa'i tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-11: lha yi mchog dang tshangs pa'i mchog rnams dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-12: ye shes mchog dang shes la gnas rnams kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-13: lag pa'i dam pas rim gror blangs pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-14: de bzhin chos dbyings ma lus ji snyed pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-15: phyogs na gang yod thams cad bsdu byas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-16: sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul gzhi mtha' dbus med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-17: de dag thams cad mthong zhing shes gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-18: skyes bu khyu mchog 'jig rten byung gyur cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-19: gshegs thabs bdun por gshegs par gyur pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-20: dpe zla med pas rnam par gzigs pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-21: thams cad chags med sgo nas shes gyur cig; gang yang skyes dbang bzhad mo bzhad pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-22: skye dgu'i 'di dag 'dod byin gzigs gyur cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:28b-23: sems can 'di dag rab rib bsgribs ldongs pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-1: bsngal kun las dgrol bya zhes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-2: sengge'i nga ro rnam par sgrog mdzad pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-3: bdag cag 'jig rten 'phags pa'i gtso yin gyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-4: ye shes sgron ma shin tu 'dir bstan cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-5: 'gro ba kun gyi skye ba dgag par bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-6: gang yang 'od zer brgya phrag mtha' yas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-7: mi yi sengge skye tshe rab 'phro bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-8: ngan song thams cad zhi bar gyur pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-9: 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal zhir gyur dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-10: gang yang btsun mo'i 'khor gyi khrod bzhugs shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-11: mi yi sengge rnam par 'phrul mdzad dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-12: 'gro ba kun la phan dang bde thugs kyis; ;'jig rten sgron ma mngon par byung ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-13: 'gro rgyud 'di las shin tu byung gyur cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-14: byang chub shing drung skyes dbang bzhugs gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-15: sa rnams bskyod byas dpe zla med pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-16: 'od snang phyogs bcu kun tu bkye gyur cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-17: bdud kyi khyim rnams rab tu ldeg mdzad de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-18: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad skul mdzad dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-19: sngon spyod gang rnams yongs su smin mdzad cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-20: gang don skyes dbang rnam par 'tshang rgya ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-21: ma lus skra yi sbugs su bsdu byas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-22: phyogs rnams zhing rgyud de bzhin bsdu byas te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-23: sems can mtha' yas rgyud kyang yongs bsdus shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-24: rgyal ba rnams kyi rnam 'phrul grub gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29a-25: tshul rnams 'di dag ma lus shes bya ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-0: 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i @29b yon tan brjod pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-1: ye shes mkhyen pa'i yon tan ma brjod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-2: thams cad spyod la gnas te shes gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-3: ji snyed bdud kyi dkrugs ma mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-4: de dag dpung gis stong gsum khyab gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-5: bdud rnams phyin ci log gtong mang po dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-6: thams cad chags med sgo nas thul gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-7: zhing na mi yi sengge gang bzhugs dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-8: brgya byin gnas na skyes dbang gang bzhugs dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-9: tshangs pa'i gnas na rang byung gang bzhugs pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-10: chags med thams cad ma lus mthong gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-11: gang rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-12: mi yi gtso bo'i sku chul [*tshul?] mtha' yas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-13: dus kyi dus gsum bskal pa ji snyed par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-14: gang rnams rgyal bas mtha' ma ma brnyes dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-15: dpe zla med pa'i gdan du gyur pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-16: mtha' yas phyogs rnams gang gis khyab gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-17: mtshan nyid tha dad rgyan gyis dag pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-18: kun du rgyal ba bsam yas bzhugs pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-19: de dag rgyal sras mang pos yongs bskor cing; ;chos dbyings ma lus kun tu khyab mdzad nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-20: gang gis sangs rgyas ma lus byung gyur pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-21: byang chub spyod pa kun tu ston mdzad cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-22: ye shes mkhyen pa rnams kyi tshul gcig gis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-23: sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad sdud mdzad cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-24: rgyal ba'i rgyan tshul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:29b-25: gang gis chos kyi chos nyid yongs khyab pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-2: rgyal ba rnams kyi sku tshul ji snyed dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-3: gang yang sku tshe bzung ste skyes gyur dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-4: gang yang btsun mo'i 'khor gyis bskor ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-5: gang yang mngon par 'byung ba bstan pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-6: mkhas pas dbang po shin tu phra mkhyen dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-7: mya ngan 'das nas ring bsrel kun bsdus te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-8: bgos shing rgyal ba'i mchod rten byas pa'i bar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-9: 'jig rten dag na tshad med ma lus pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-10: spyod pa mtha' yas de dag rab spyod cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-11: rgyal ba'i spyod pa yongs su gang brjod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-12: de dag kun la spyod yangs 'jug gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-13: de ltar tshul rnams kun la yongs bsngo ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-14: dge ba de dag yongs su bsngo bas na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-15: byang chub spyod pa de dag rab tu shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-16: spyod pas skyo bar nam yang mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-17: de dag rnam par 'phrul ba ji snyed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-18: rgyal ba rnams kyis brjod pa gang yang rung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-19: 'gro ba 'di na 'jig rten mkhyen pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-20: gang yod thams cad ma lus rtogs par shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-21: de ltar skyes dbang thams cad ma lus par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-22: rab byung yul rnams rjes su thob gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-23: de dag skad cig gcig gis rtogs gyur kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-24: byang chub spyod las rnam par phyir mi ldog; gang yang rgyal ba'i spyod yul phra mo rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-25: zhing dang chos kyi rgyud rnams thams cad kun //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30a-26: de dag spyod pa mchog gi shes gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-0: yongs su bsngo ba'i pha rol phyin pa @30b thob; ;bskal pa shin tu phra la 'jug pa gang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-1: skad cig gcig la grangs dang grangs med tshul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-2: de dag byang chub shes pas rtogs gyur kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-3: spyod pa'i dam pa de las phyir mi ldog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-4: gang yang 'gro ba rnams kyi zhing chen dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-5: kun nas nyon mongs de bzhin rnam dag rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-6: kun kyang ye shes spyod pas shes byas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-7: de la yid gzhungs sems can dam pa 'khod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-8: dus kyi tshul rnams rjes su sems byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-9: skad cig sems kyis bsam yas bskal pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-10: de bzhin dus gsum ma lus thams cad kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-11: spyod pa'i mchog la gnas shing rab tu shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-12: sems la yang dag gzhol zhing 'jug pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-13: chos la yang dag 'jug pa'i tshul rnams dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-14: zhing la yang dag 'jug pa mkhas 'di la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-15: kun kyang spyod pa dam pas rab tu shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-16: ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa gang yod dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-17: sems can bsgrub dang de bzhin chos bsgrub dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-18: rnam par 'phrul thob byang chub bsgrub pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-19: mtha' dbus gzhi med thams cad ma lus pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-20: 'jug pa shin tu phra ba mtha' dag bsdu byas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-21: rnam par phye ba ji snyed yod pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-22: bskal pa mi mthun tha dad mtshan ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-23: de dag thams cad spyod pa yangs pas shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-24: phyogs kyi rgyud na zhing rnams gcig min pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:30b-25: 'gro ba rnams na sna tshogs gang yod dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31a-2: spyod pa'i stobs la gnas shing shes par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31a-3: gang gis yongs su bsngo ba 'di shes pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31a-4: de ni ji snyed 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31a-5: gang rnams ma byon gang dag bzhugs pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31a-6: de dag spyod dang mnyam pa nyid 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31a-7: rgyal ba kun gyis bsod nams 'thob par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31a-8: rgyal ba kun gyi ye shes 'thob par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31a-9: rgyal ba kun gyi spyod pa'i rjes bslabs shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31a-10: yongs su bsngo ba 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31a-11: 'gro ba kun gyis thub par dkar gyur cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31a-12: 'jug pa kun tu bslab bya bslabs pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31a-13: rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su sems dpa' rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31a-14: thams cad 'jig rten sgron ma mthong bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31a-15: de yi spyod la tshad gdab mi nus te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31a-16: yon tan rnams la'ang tshad kyis gzhal mi nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31a-17: dpe med de dag spyod la gnas bcas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31a-18: rgyal ba kun gyi rnam 'phrul rab tu shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31a-19: chags pa med pa dang grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems zhes bya ba ste; yongs su bsngo ba dgu pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31a-21: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa zhes bya ba bcu pa gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31a-23: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos smra ba chen por gyur pas dri ma med pa'i go 'phang thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31b-0: chos kyi mdzod kyi @31b sbyin pa rab tu byin zhing snying rje chen po dang ldan pas byams pa chen po thob cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31b-1: byang chub kyi sems la sems can rab tu dgod par brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31b-2: sems can gyi don la zhugs pas byang chub kyi sems rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar gsog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31b-3: sems can thams cad kyi kha lo sgyur bas 'gro ba thams cad la thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam yang dag par ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31b-4: 'gro ba thams cad la chos kyi nyi ma dam par gyur pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31b-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pas 'jig rten thams cad snang bar byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31b-6: 'gro ba thams cad la sems rab tu mnyam pas; sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa rgyun mi gcod pa ye shes la dbang sgyur zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31b-7: sems rnam par dag pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i las thams cad nyams pa med par sgrub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31b-8: ye shes chen pos 'gro ba thams cad kyi ded dpon du gyur pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31b-9: sems can thams cad la bde ba'i lam yang dag par ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31b-10: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos bskyed pa thams cad la sems thams cad kyis sngon 'dren pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31b-11: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dbyer mi phyed par gyur pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31b-12: 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba spel ba la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:31b-13: dam pa'i chos sbyin pa sngon du gtong bas chos dkar po thams cad la yang dag par brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32a-0: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pas yongs @32a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32a-1: su bzung ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas stobs dang shugs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32a-2: lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu brtan pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa yang dag par bsgrubs pas nye bar ston pa'i spyod pa mthu chen po'i sems dang ldan pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32a-3: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la mos shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32a-4: sgyu med par byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yang dag par bsgrubs pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo'i dmigs pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la sems pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32a-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs shing yongs su bsngo ba rgya chen pos bsgribs pa med pa'i yul thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba la zhugs shing rab tu bsgrub pa de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32a-6: chung ngu na sangs rgyas kyi gsung las tshig dang yi ge gcig thos sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32a-8: yang dag par 'dzin kyang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32a-9: sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa de dag na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag dran pas dmigs te; 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang yid la byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32a-11: ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang yid la byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32a-12: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang yid la byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32b-1: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang yid la byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32b-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32b-4: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis yang dag par dgongs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32b-7: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa ma lus pa thams cad du yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32b-8: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal bar sems can gcig gi don du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yang dag par spyod par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32b-9: sems can gcig gi don du ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can gyi khams mtha' dag ma lus pa lhag ma ma lus pa thams cad kyi don du sems can gcig gi phyir yang phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thugs par go cha bgos te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32b-10: sems can gcig gi ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi phyir yang go cha bgos te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yang dag par spyod par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32b-12: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nam yang sangs rgyas dang 'bral ba'i 'du shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32b-13: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'bral ba'i 'du shes skye bar ma gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:32b-14: 'di ltar yang sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33a-0: sangs rgyas skye ba gcig dang yang @33a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33a-2: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33a-4: bsngags pa de la spyod par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33a-5: de dag yongs su rdzogs par byed par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33a-6: tshangs pa'i spyad pa ma god par spyod par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33a-7: tshangs pa'i spyod pa ma nyams par yongs su rdzogs par byed par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33a-8: tshangs pa'i spyod pa ma 'dres par yongs su spyod par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33a-9: tshangs pa'i spyod pa rnyog pa med pa gnas par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33a-10: ltung ba med pa'i tshangs pa'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33a-11: zil gyis mi non pa'i tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yongs su spyod par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33a-12: sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa'i tshangs pa'i spyod pa la nan tan du spyod par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33a-13: mi gnas pa'i tshangs pa'i spyod pa la rab tu bsgrub par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33a-14: mi dmigs shing byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa'i tshangs pa'i spyod pa rnam par spyod par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33a-17: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rjes su spyod pa'i tshangs pa'i spyod pa khong du chud par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33a-18: ji ltar bdag tshangs pa'i spyod pa de la nan tan du byed pa de bzhin du tshangs pa'i spyod pa chags pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33a-19: tshangs par spyod pa gnas pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-0: tshangs par spyod pa @33b nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-1: tshangs par spyod pa nyams pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-2: tshangs par spyod pa bsgribs pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-3: tshangs par spyod pa brtan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-4: tshangs par spyod pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-5: tshangs par spyod pa mi bsgul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-6: tshangs par spyod pa mi g-yo ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-7: tshangs par spyod pa mi 'khrugs pa de la sems can thams cad kyang rab tu 'god do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-8: sems can thams cad rab tu sbyor ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-9: sems can thams cad shin tu bsgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-10: sems can thams cad rnam par sbyong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-11: sems can thams cad dri ma med par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-12: sems can thams cad rnam par snang bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-13: sems can thams cad rdul med par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-14: sems can thams cad rab rib med par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-15: sems can thams cad yongs su gdung ba med par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-16: sems can thams cad 'byung ba la gnas par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-17: sems can thams cad 'gyod pa thams cad dang bral zhing gnod sems dang rnam par bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-19: byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyod pa rnam par ma dag pas gzhan gyi tshangs par spyod pa rnam par dag par bya ba mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-20: byang chub sems dpa' tshangs par spyod pa las phyir log pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-21: pha rol byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyod pa la bsgrub par mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:33b-22: byang chub sems dpa' tshangs par spyod pa rgyun chad pas /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:34a-7: byang chub sems dpa' tshangs par spyod pa la rnam par mi gnas pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:34a-8: gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyod pa la gnas par gzhag par mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:34a-9: byang chub sems dpa' tshangs par spyod pa la ma zhugs pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:34a-10: gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyod pa la gzhug par mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:34a-11: byang chub sems dpa' tshangs par spyod pa las g-yos pas /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:34a-13: byang chub sems dpa' tshangs par spyod pa ma spyad pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:34a-14: gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyod pas yang dag par gzung bar mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:34b-0: byang chub sems dpa' ni ji skad @34b smra ba de ltar byed pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:34b-1: byang chub sems dpa' ni ma nor ba la gnas shing ma nor bar smra ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:34b-2: byang chub sems dpa' ni bden par smra zhing de bzhin du byed pa la gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:34b-3: byang chub sems dpa' ni lus kyi las dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:34b-6: byang chub sems dpa' ni bsgribs pa thams cad rnam par 'thor zhing bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul la zhugs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:34b-7: byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan zhing gzhan la lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pas chos ston pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:34b-8: byang chub sems dpa' ni drang ba'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba la 'jam pa'i sems dang ldan zhing gzhan drang po la gzhog pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:34b-9: byang chub sems dpa' ni 'gyod pa dang bral bar byas shing gzhan 'gyod pa las rnam par slong ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:34b-10: byang chub sems dpa' ni yid dang bar gyur cing gzhan sems dang bar dbyer med pa la yang dag par bsgrub pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:34b-11: byang chub sems dpa' ni chos yang dag par brjod par gyur cing gzhan chos la nye bar stobs pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:34b-12: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:34b-13: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sbyin pa la brtson pa dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:35a-1: chos thams cad kyi sgo mi zad pa rab tu thob par gyur cig /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:35a-4: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'das pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:35a-9: chos rnam par brjod pa re re dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:35a-10: chos su gdags pa re re dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:35a-12: chos brjod pa re re dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:35a-13: chos kyi sgo re re dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:35a-14: chos la 'jug pa re re dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:35a-15: chos bskyed pa re re dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:35a-16: chos rnam par dgod pa re re las chos mi zad pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:35a-17: mtha' dang dbus med pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rab tu brtson pa thob ste /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:35a-19: sems can thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pas bstan pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i tshig chags pa med pas byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:35a-20: 'khrul ba med pa'i spobs pas 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i chos shin tu ston pa dang /
