K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:36a-13: chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i sems can gyi don gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba thob par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:36b-0: dge ba'i rtsa ba des chos 'di dag @36b yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:36b-1: ji ltar bdag gis thob par gyur ba de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:36b-2: sems can thams cad kyis kyang thob par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:36b-5: yongs su rdzogs pa 'dis sems can thams cad bdag dang spyod pa mnyam par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:36b-10: rnam par dag pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:36b-11: rnam par 'phrul pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:36b-12: mngon par byang chub pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:36b-13: chos bstan pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:36b-15: rnam par nges pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:36b-16: mngon par shes pa thams cad mnyam pas mnyam par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:36b-17: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:36b-18: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:36b-19: ji ltar chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag tshad med pa'i ye shes yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:36b-20: ji ltar chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sangs rgyas mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:37a-0: ji ltar chos kyi dbyings la mus gcad pa med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sangs rgyas @37a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:37a-1: kyi zhing mus gcad pa med pa thams cad du 'gro bar yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:37a-2: ji ltar chos kyi dbyings sa mtshams med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'jig rten gyi khams sa mtshams med pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:37a-3: ji ltar chos kyi dbyings la ris su chad pa med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ris su chad pa med par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:37a-4: ji ltar chos kyi dbyings rgyud kyi tshul gcig par gyur pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:37a-5: ji ltar chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin yongs su dag pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad shin tu rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:37a-6: ji ltar chos kyi dbyings 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su song ba de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:37a-7: ji ltar chos kyi dbyings 'gro ba thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i rgyan rnam par dag par yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:37b-0: ji ltar chos kyi dbyings @37b la 'jig pa med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:37b-1: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:37b-2: gang gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba der dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:37b-3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni thams cad du 'gro bas na thams cad du 'gro ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:37b-4: ci nas kyang 'gro ba thams cad du shin tu snang bar 'gyur ba de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:37b-5: ci nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:37b-6: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yongs su 'thob pa de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:37b-7: ci nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:37b-8: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ba de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:37b-9: ci nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba sems can thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba las phyir mi ldog pa de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:37b-10: ci nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba yongs su shes shing rab tu 'phel bar byed pa de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:37b-11: ci nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba gnas su mi 'gyur ba de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38a-0: ci nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba chags pa med par khong du chud par 'gyur ba de ltar @38a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38a-1: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38a-2: ci nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong zhing kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ba de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38a-3: ci nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong zhing mngon sum du blta ba rgyun mi 'chad pa de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38a-4: ci nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong bas byang chub sems dpa'i stobs dang shugs skye bar 'gyur ba de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38a-5: ci nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong zhing dngos po nyams par 'gyur ba thams cad las 'phags par 'gyur ba de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38a-6: 'di ltar yang chos kyi dbyings byed pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38a-7: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38a-8: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38a-9: chos kyi dbyings gnas med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38a-10: chos kyi dbyings nyams pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38a-11: chos kyi dbyings dben pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38a-12: chos kyi dbyings zhi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38a-13: chos kyi dbyings gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38a-14: chos kyi dbyings mi 'pho ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38a-15: chos kyi dbyings tha dad pa med pa bzhin du 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38a-16: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38a-17: dge ba'i rtsa ba chos bstan cing brjod pas yang dag par bzung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38a-18: chos bstan par bskul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38b-0: de la dmigs @38b pa la brtson par byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38b-1: de dag la sogs pa dge ba brtsams pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs shing byang chub sems dpar gyur te chos smra bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38b-2: sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la sems can thams cad 'god pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38b-3: sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyis chos yongs su dris pas zad par mi 'gyur bas mi 'phrogs pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38b-4: sems can thams cad chos kyi snang bas bsgribs pa med pa thob pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38b-5: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi tshig dang yi ge brjod pa la mkhas shing ye shes kyi snying po'i chos smra bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38b-6: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ston pa la mkhas shing sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38b-7: sems can thams cad gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pas mig dang 'dra ba'i chos smra bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38b-8: sems can thams cad rigs pas gzung ba'i tshig dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:38b-9: yi ge chud ma zos par shin tu ston pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dran pas yang dag par 'dzin pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39a-0: @39a *// sems can thams cad mtshan gyis shin tu brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39a-1: 'od mtha' yas par 'phro ba'i chos yang dag par dpyad pa la mkhas pas nye bar mi dmigs pa'i lam du zhugs pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39a-2: sems can thams cad chos mi 'chad pa la gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi char bsam pa thag pas dbab pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos kyi sprin rab tu ston cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39a-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39a-4: sems can thams cad gzhan gyis pham par mi nus pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa'i chos smra ba'i mdzod bdog pas chos rgya mtsho thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39a-5: sangs rgyas kyi chos chud mi gzon pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig; sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa la brtson zhing chos thams cad yang dag par brjod pa la mkhas pas chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nyi ma'i chos smra bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39a-6: sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa shin tu bstan pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas dang mdzod rab tu thob cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39a-8: rigs kyi tshul dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39b-0: sems can thams cad chos kyi mdzod rnam par phye ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan zhing chos kyi spyod pa'i pha rol tu @39b phyin pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39b-1: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas shin tu bstan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing dbye ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39b-2: gnas pa med pa'i chos la gnas pa rab tu thob pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39b-3: sems can thams cad yon tan dang bsngags pa mu med cing zad mi shes pa dang ldan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39b-4: chos thams cad khong du chud pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39b-5: sems can thams cad bden pa'i mtha'i tshul gyis rjes su zhugs pas 'gro ba thams cad la mi slu ba'i chos smra bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39b-6: sems can thams cad bdud kyi las thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing bdud thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i chos smra bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39b-7: sems can thams cad bdag gi med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39b-8: yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos smra bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39b-9: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi stobs kyis smon lam rab tu thob cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39b-10: 'gro ba thams cad bde bar byed pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39b-11: de yang 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39b-12: nyams pa med pa'i las kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39b-13: nyams pa med pa'i rnam par smin pas yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39b-14: nyams pa med pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:39b-15: nyams pa med pa'i chos la yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-0: nyams pa med pa'i dngos po la @40a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-2: nyams pa med pa'i rgyu rnams kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-3: nyams pa med pa'i chos kyi lam gyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-4: nyams pa med pa'i ming mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-6: yi ge mang po'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-7: nyams pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-8: nyams pa med pa'i sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-9: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo yang gzugs kyi tshul la chags shing yongs su mi bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-10: 'dod pa la gnas pa'i sgra'i don du yongs su mi bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-11: dri'i phyir yongs su mi bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-12: ro'i phyir yongs su mi bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-13: reg bya'i phyir yongs su mi bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-14: 'dod pa la gnas pa'i chos rnams kyi phyir yang yongs su mi bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-15: mtho ris su skye ba'i phyir yang yongs su mi bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-16: 'dod pa la spyod pa'i phyir yang yongs su mi bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-17: 'dod pa'i yul la chags pas kyang yongs su mi bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-18: g-yog 'khor gyi phyir yang yongs su mi bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-19: dbang phyug don du gnyer bas yongs su mi bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-20: 'khor ba'i dga' ba'i don du yongs su mi bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-21: 'chi 'pho dang skye ba la gnas shing yongs su mi bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-22: dngos po la mngon par mos shing yongs su mi bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40a-23: 'dod pa dang ldan par bya ba'i bsam pas yongs su mi bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40b-0: @40b kun gzhi la mos pas yongs su mi bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40b-1: bsten pa'i sems kyis yongs su mi bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40b-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhig pa'i don du yongs su mi bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40b-3: khams gsum pa la gnas pas kyang yongs su mi bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40b-7: snyoms par 'jug pa'i rol chags pas kyang yongs su mi bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40b-8: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas shing yongs su mi bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40b-9: 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40b-10: gdul ba'i don du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40b-11: chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40b-12: bsgribs pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40b-13: 'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba nas rab tu gdon pa'i ye shes chen po khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40b-14: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40b-15: bsam pa bsten pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40b-16: yun du 'chi ba med pa'i chos bsgrub pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40b-17: sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis brgyan pa'i rgyan du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:40b-18: thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pas rnam par 'phrul ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41a-0: chos snang ba thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i @41a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41a-1: rnam par 'phrul pa grub par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41a-2: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i zhing thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i gzhi yongs su rdzogs pa thob cing phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41a-3: rdo rje lta bu'i go cha don yod pas sems can thams cad kun tu bzang po'i sa la rab tu dgod pa la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41a-4: phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par sems can thams cad rab tu dgrol bar bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41a-5: sangs rgyas kyis bsgribs pa med pa thams cad 'jig rten du yang dag par bstan pa'i spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad pa la rab tu gnas par bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41a-6: de de ltar yongs su bsngo ba yang rang bzhin dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41a-7: chos nyid dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41a-8: 'gro ba tshad med pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41a-9: nyon mongs pa med pa dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41a-10: byed pa med pa'i rang bzhin dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41a-11: chos 'khrugs pa med pa yongs su shes pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41a-12: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du zhugs pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41b-2: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41b-3: mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa thob pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa la grub pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41b-5: sems can thams cad sems can dmyal ba nas phyir bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41b-6: sems can thams cad byol song gi skye gnas su mi dgod pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41b-7: sems can thams cad gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas pa dgag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41b-8: sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i chos thams cad spang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41b-9: 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dge ba'i rtsa bas shin tu tshim par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41b-10: chos kyi 'khor lo dus la bab par bskor bas dga' bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41b-11: stobs bcu'i 'khor lo la sems can thams cad gzud pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41b-13: smon lam mtha' dang dbus med pa thob par bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41b-14: rnam par dag pa'i chos can du bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:41b-15: byang chub kyi sems cang shes bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen grangs med pa thams cad dga' bar bya ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42a-0: sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la gnas par @42a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42a-1: bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par gzung zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42a-2: ye shes kyi snang ba shin tu 'phags par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bsgribs pa med par mngon sum du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42a-4: sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du lta bar mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42a-5: chos snang ba thams cad la mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42a-6: dog pa med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyis 'jigs pa med pa la mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes la mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42a-8: sems can thams cad snying rje chen po rnam par dag pas yongs su bskyab pa la mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' dag ma lus pa lhag ma med pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42a-10: brjod du med pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis thams cad brgyan par mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42a-13: bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rnam par gtor ba dang; rab tu gzhom par mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42b-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gnas med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas par mngon par mos @42b pas yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42b-1: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rgya chen pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyud la 'jug par mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42b-2: dran pa rnam par sbyangs pas yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42b-3: blo gros rnam par nges pas yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42b-4: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rig pas shin tu 'dzin pa'i mngon par shes pas yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42b-5: blo mtha' dang dbus med cing chags pa med pas yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42b-6: lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42b-7: 'gro ba thams cad la byams pa chen po spyod pas yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42b-8: snying rje chen po la rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42b-9: dga' ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42b-10: btang snyoms kyis gnyis la chags pa dang bral ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la dbang bsgyur bar gnas pas yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42b-11: rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i chos bsngags pa'i lam rab tu dbye bas chos rnam par dbye ba la zhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42b-12: chos nyid la nges par gzhog pa'i yid dang sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42b-13: dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42b-14: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa'i mdzod kyi sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:42b-15: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par gtor ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43a-0: chags pa med pa thams cad rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i sems @43a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad spyad pa las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43a-3: chos dam pa dang rab dang phul la mngon par mos pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43a-4: yon tan gyi chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i ye shes kyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa la mos shing dang ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43a-5: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43a-6: bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rab tu gzhig pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43a-7: chags pa med cing dri ma med pa'i chos kyi go 'phang 'thob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43a-8: sangs rgyas kyi mdas 'gro ba thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi nyi ma rab dang phul khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'od zer brgya stong gis brgyan pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes chen po'i snang ba 'gro ba thams cad du rab tu dgye ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43a-10: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya zhing gdul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43a-11: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems kyi rgyud shin tu tshim par bya ba dang; sngon gyi smon lam chen po nub pa med pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mur spyod pa chen po'i rgyud rgyun mi 'chad cing rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43a-12: snang ba dri ma med pas rgyags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43b-0: dregs @43b pa dang; nga rgyal shin tu gcad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43b-1: 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnam par gtor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43b-2: sred pa'i dra ba yang dag par gtub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43b-3: ma rig pa'i mun pa thibs po bsal ba dang; bsgribs pa med cing dri ma dang bral la chags pa med pa'i chos kyi lo shin tu legs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43b-4: 'gro ba thams cad du bskal pa'i grangs rnam par 'chad pa med pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43b-5: spyod pa'i rgyud las phyir mi ldog pas sems can gyi tshogs so sor chags pa med pa'i ye shes rab dam pa mchog rnam par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang; sems can re re las sangs rgyas kyi sku shin tu bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43b-6: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo yang 'dod pa'i yul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43b-7: khams gsum pa la gnas shing yongs su mi bsngo ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43b-9: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'dod ma chags pas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43b-10: byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams zhe mi sdang bas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43b-11: byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gti mug med pas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:43b-12: byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gnod pa med pas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44a-2: byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams g-yo med pas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44a-3: byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams drang pos yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44a-5: byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon par brtson pas yongs su bsngo bar bya ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44a-6: de de ltar yongs su bsngo bas sems rab tu dang ba 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la go skabs dbye ba 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44a-10: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44a-11: 'jig rten gyi nyes pa thams cad rab tu spong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44a-12: bdud kyi las thams cad rab tu spong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44a-13: dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44a-14: bdag gi smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44a-15: sems can thams cad gnyer ba chen pos shin tu 'bod pa yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44a-16: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sbyin pas 'byung ba la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44b-0: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad @44b kyis chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44b-1: sems can thams cad kyis dbyangs snyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44b-2: ye shes kyi rnga'i dbyangs dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44b-6: zhing thams cad du sgras rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dbyangs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44b-7: yon tan bye ba brgya stong brjod du med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i dbyangs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44b-9: sgra che bas rnam par 'khrug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i dbyangs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44b-10: chos kyi dbyings thams cad sgras rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dbyangs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44b-11: 'gro ba thams cad kyis ngag mnyan pa'i dbyangs rab tu thob par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44b-12: sems can thams cad kyis sgra dang dbyangs mtha' yas pa'i ye shes rab tu thob bar gyur cig /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44b-15: tshig gi lam thams cad shes pa rab tu thob par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44b-16: dbyangs la dbang bsgyur ba zil gyis mi non pa'i dbyangs thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes rab tu thob par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:44b-17: dbyangs thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa'i dbyangs rab tu thob par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:45a-0: sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis mnyan na mi ngoms pa'i dbyangs rab tu thob par gyur @45a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:45a-2: sems can thams cad kyis 'gro ba kun mos par nyan pa'i dbyangs kyis pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:45a-3: sems can thams cad dad par byed pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par gyur cig /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:45a-6: sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi gzungs kyi rgyan gyis chos thams cad rnam pa du mar ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:45a-7: chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:45a-8: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos rdo rje'i tshig gis yang dag par gzung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:45a-9: chos nyid thams cad brjod pa rab tu dbye ba ye shes dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:45a-10: tshig dang yi ge brjod du med pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:45a-15: 'gro ba thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:45b-0: chos thams cad kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i don @45b dang; tshig dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:45b-1: yi ge rnam par 'phrul pa'i dbyangs kyi byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:45b-2: chags pa med pa'i dbyangs la dbang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:45b-3: 'gro ba thams cad kyi shes pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:45b-4: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad mi dma' ba'i dbyangs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:45b-5: bag tsha ba med pa'i dbyangs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:45b-6: 'dod chags med pa'i tshig gi dbyangs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:45b-8: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mngon par dga' bar byed pa'i dbyangs dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:45b-10: 'gro ba thams cad kyi the tshom gcod cing khong du chud par byed pa'i dbyangs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:45b-11: spobs pas legs par sbyar ba'i dbyangs dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:45b-13: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:45b-14: bam po bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:46a-4: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i tshul rab tu shes pa rnam par dag cing kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:46a-7: sems can thams cad kyi dran pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:46a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:46a-14: sems can thams cad kyi lus rnam pa de ltar yongs su dag cing lus yongs su dag pa shin tu gsal ba rnyog pa med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:46a-18: dri ma dang bral ba 'od gsal zhing dang ba yid du 'ong ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:46b-0: bsgribs pa med pa de la 'jig rten gyi khams @46b thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du snang bar gyur cig /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:46b-2: mig yor gyi gnas kyi rnam pa thams cad snang bar gyur cig /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:52a-9: mthu bo che dpa' bo chos kyi go cha brtan pa bgos pas byang chub sems dpa'i sems phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i gnas rin po che grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:52b-0: sems kyi gnas thams cad las rnam par 'das pas rab tu gang ba'i rin po che'i gnas grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur @52b cig ;yongs su shes pa'i gos thams cad rab tu bgo ba'i gos rin po che grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:52b-1: khyim med par rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpas yongs su gang zhing rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi gnas grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:52b-2: blta na yid du 'ong ba rin po che dang ldan pa'i mthun pa'i rin po che grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:52b-3: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi 'od 'phro ba rab tu gtong ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu sprul pa rab tu bskor ba'i rin po che'i 'khor lo grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:52b-4: rin po che thams cad kyi shing rnam par dag pa mig 'phrul gyi rnam pa shin tu dag pa'i rin po che'i shing grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:52b-5: blta na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che shin tu rnam par bkram pa'i rin po che'i sa rnam par dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:52b-6: yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sgrog pa'i rin po che'i rol mo brdung ba grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:58b-8: chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:58b-9: chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:58b-10: rnam par byang ba rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:58b-11: chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:59a-9: chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i chos thams cad mi gnyis pa'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:59a-10: chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:59a-11: de de ltar yongs su bsngo bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:59a-12: chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam pa'i lus yongs su dag pa kun nas gnas par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:59b-0: chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam @59b pa'i dgra yongs su dag pa kun nas gnas par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:59b-1: chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam pa'i sems yongs su dag par kun nas gnas par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:59b-2: chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:59b-3: smon lam yongs su dag pa kun nas gnas par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:59b-4: chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa kun nas gnas par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:59b-5: chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam pa'i chos thams cad bstan pa dang brjod pas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad go bar bya ba yongs su dag pa kun nas gnas par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:59b-6: chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par gzhol ba'i tshul gyis lus 'byams klas pa rjes su 'gro bar kun nas gnas par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:59b-7: chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam pa'i chos snang ba mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:59b-8: mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa'i tshig gcig brjod pas sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi the tshom gcod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:59b-11: bsam pa khong du chud par byed pas tshim par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:59b-12: bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60a-1: bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60a-2: sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60a-3: ye shes la 'jug pa shin tu 'phags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60a-4: chos mngon par shes pa la gnas par bya ba kun nas gnas par 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60a-6: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa zhes bya ba bcu pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsngo ba des yongs su bsngos na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60a-8: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60a-9: smon lam mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su rdzogs pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60a-10: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60a-11: nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa thams cad yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60a-12: sems can thams cad kyis kyang rab tu thob par bya ba la brtson par byed par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60a-13: chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60a-14: sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas bskyed pa thams cad mthong ba rab tu thob cing khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60b-0: de bzhin gshegs @60b pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60b-1: rgya chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60b-2: bsgribs pa med pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60b-3: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60b-4: 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlab cing brtan par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60b-6: shin tu bstan pa brjod du med pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60b-7: dus thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60b-8: ye shes dang phyir mi ldog pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad ma lus par rgyas par 'gengs pa la 'jug cing khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60b-9: kun tu bzang po'i mig mtha' dang dbus med pa mngon par bsgrubs pa yongs su rdzogs pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60b-10: de mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos bstan pa chags pa med pa'i rna ba'i ye shes khong du chud pa yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:60b-11: chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad lus kyi skyil mo krung gcig gis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis rlob kyang sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par byed par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61a-0: dus gsum mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes 'byams klas pa yongs su rdzogs pa thob cing @61a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61a-2: blo mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61a-3: sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61a-4: chos thams cad rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61a-5: skye mched yongs su shes pa'i ye shes thams cad rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61a-6: nam mkha'i dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad la 'jug cing rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61a-8: skye gnas rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur pa thams cad nas byung ba'i sgra dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61a-10: skad thams cad ma lus pa la mngon sum gyi ye shes rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par rnam pa mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61a-12: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong zhing mtha' dang dbus med pa snang bar byed pa rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61a-13: dus gsum thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ma lus par mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61a-16: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dang dbus med pa ma lus pa thams cad la skad cig gcig tu 'jug pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61b-0: sems can thams cad kyi mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad ma lus pa la 'jug @61b pas 'gro ba mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dag par bya ba rab tu thob par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61b-1: yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61b-3: rnam par dag par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61b-4: mnyam par byed do; ;mngon sum du byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61b-5: rab tu rtogs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61b-6: khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61b-7: yang dag par sems par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61b-8: rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par bya ba rjes su thob par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61b-9: de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g-yos te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61b-29: chos nyid rab tu thob pas lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61b-30: lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61b-31: lha rdzas kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61b-32: lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:61b-33: lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62a-0: lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyi sprin gyi char mngon par @62a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62a-2: lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62a-3: lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62a-4: lha rdzas kyi dus dang mthun pa'i tsandan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62a-5: lha rdzas kyi sbrul gyi snying po'i tsandan mchog gi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62a-8: ba dan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62a-9: lha rdzas kyi lha'i lus grangs med pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62a-10: lha rdzas kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag brgya stong brjod du med pa'i tshig dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62a-11: brjod pa la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yid du 'ong bar spyod pa'i chos chen po'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62a-12: lha rdzas kyi de bzhin gshegs pas bstod pa'i sangs rgyas bsngags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62a-15: lhung lhung ldegs kyi sgra 'byin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62a-16: dga' bar byed pa'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62a-17: lha rdzas kyi lha'i lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med cing brjod du med pas rab tu btud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62a-18: lha yul gyi lha grangs med pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la brtson par yid la byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa la shin tu dad pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62b-0: sangs rgyas kyi @62b yon tan dang mi 'bral ba'i sems kyis mngon par gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62b-1: lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62b-2: dkrol ba'i sgra lha'i glu'i dbyangs kyi tshul grangs med par grag pa de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing yid la bya ba la brtson pa rnams kyang rab tu bsgrags so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62b-3: lha rdzas las shin tu 'das pa'i 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62b-4: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tha gru thams cad rab tu snang bas khyab par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62b-5: lha rdzas las 'das pa'i sprul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62b-6: sangs rgyas kyi yul grangs med pa bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i cho 'phrul rnams kyang yang dag par bstan par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62b-8: gling bzhi pa 'di dga' ldan gyi gnas su lha'i dbang po rab dga' ldan gyi khang pa na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang zhing chos bstan pa 'di nyid kun tu byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62b-9: sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi pha rol dag nas kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:62b-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' lhags nas phyogs bcu bkang ste 'di skad zer ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:63a-0: de ltar khyod kyis yongs su bsngo ba'i chos nyid 'di bshad pa legs @63a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:63a-4: bdag cag kun kyang ming rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba sha stag ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:63a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba dag na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs pa dag gis drung nas 'dir phyin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:63a-6: kun na yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:63a-9: go bar bya ba 'di dag gis don 'di nyid lhag pa med cing chad pa med par brjod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:63a-13: bdag cag kyang de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa dag gi dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyi khang pa rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan ces bya ba dag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyin pa mngon du mthong ba sha stag sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor 'dir phyin to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:63a-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis phyogs bcur bltas te /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:63a-16: don dang tshig dang yi ge la rab tu 'jug pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:63b-3: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan la 'jug pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:63b-10: chos rgyud mtha' yas rnam par dag byas nas; ;chos kyi 'od byed chos la kha lo sgyur //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:63b-12: de dag chos kyi kha lo sgyur gyur te //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:63b-18: 'jig rten khams su chos nyid nyi shar cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:63b-19: sems can phan phyir chos rnams ston par byed //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:64a-4: shin tu dri med chos kyi sems dang ldan //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:64a-10: chos nyid bsam pa yongs su dag byed cing //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:64a-12: chos kyi khang bar rgyal bas dbang bskur ba //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:64b-20: kun kyang kun tu bzang po ji bzhin du //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67a-3: yangs pa ji snyed rgyal bas gsungs pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67a-4: kun tu bzang zhes gang la gdags pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67a-5: rgyal ba'i sras rnams gang la gnas gyur pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67a-6: spyod pa dam pa de dag su 'dod pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67a-7: sems can ma lus thams cad bgrang bar nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67a-8: dus gsum sems kyang ma lus kun bgrang nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67a-9: gang la kun tu bzang por ming gdags pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67a-10: rgyal sras de yi yon tan mtha' med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67a-11: nam mkha' spu rtses bgrang bar nus kyang srid //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67a-12: zhing rnams kun gyi rdul kyang bgrang bar nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67a-13: gang la rgyal sras drang srong che gnas pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67a-14: spyod pa de dag bgrang bar mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67a-15: chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa zhes bya ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67a-16: yongs su bsngo ba bcu pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67a-17: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67a-18: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67a-19: rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis yongs su bsngo ba'i le'u ste sum cu'o ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67a-20: bam po bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi gnas kyi nor bu rin po che dam pa'i khang pa na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67a-22: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67b-0: gzhan nas 'dus pa sha stag kun kyang byang chub sems @67b dpa'i ye shes kyi yul dang spyod yul thams cad rab tu thob pas gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yul la 'jug cing gzhol ba'i spyod yul ma gtang ba; 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67b-2: gdul bar bya ba'i dus bzhin du thogs pa med pa'i byin gyi rlabs rnam pa tha dad pas bya ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub cing bskal pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67b-5: dus su spyod pa la gnas pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67b-8: rdzu 'phrul gyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs shing 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba mi zad pa la rab tu zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67b-10: thabs thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas 'khor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67b-12: mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yang dag par bstan cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67b-13: shin tu bsgrub pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67b-20: ye shes la rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pas bya ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:67b-21: byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68a-1: cad thob cing mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i sems skad cig gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'dong ba la sngon du 'dren pa'i gtam gyi skyes bu dam pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par gzung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68a-4: sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68a-5: rim gro rgya chen po bya ba'i don du mngon par brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i las thams cad yang dag par blang ba mnyam pa nyid kyis sbyor bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68a-8: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du chags pa med pa'i dbyangs rab tu sgrog pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68a-9: dus gsum thams cad du chags pa med pa'i sems dang ye shes kyi yul rgyas par 'gengs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68a-11: nan tan yongs su rdzogs pa thams cad bskal pa brjod du med par rgyun mi 'chad par yang dag par bstan pa la yon tan bsngags shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68a-12: brjod pa zad mi shes pa sha stag ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68a-13: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68a-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68a-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padmo'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal @68b gyi snying po dang /
