K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsang ba'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyan rnam par dgod pa thams cad rab tu snang bar ston pa'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal yid du 'ong ba'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tsan dan dpal gyi snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me tog dpal gyi snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68b-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me tog rgyas pa'i dpal gyi snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68b-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal lha'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dpal gyi snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:68b-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa dpal gyi snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dpal gyi snying @69a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen dpal gyi snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma dang bral ba'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa sna tshogs rgyan gyi snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po rab tu snang ba'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dri ma med pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid bzang po'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser bzang po dri ma med pa'i dbyig gis spras pa'i gzi brjid mdzes pa'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan thams cad kyis brgyan pas rnam par dag pa'i dpal gyi snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal gyi be'u rdo rje 'od 'phro bas brgyan pa'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i dpal gyi snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po 'od rab tu snang ba'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @69b nam mkha'i mdzod ye shes bsgribs pa med pa'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa med cing nga ro snyan pa'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi snying po yon tan gyis 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam yang dag par 'dzin pa'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri rab dpal gyi snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan thams cad rnam par dag pa'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par grol ba'i zla ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69b-9: de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:69b-18: brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa sha @70a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70a-1: stag dang thabs gcig tu zhugs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70a-2: de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po sangs rgyas kyi mthus theg pa chen po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70a-4: byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin theg pa chen po rab tu snang ba de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70a-5: de nas de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang mtshan rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya bar mthun pa sha stag gis zhal mngon par bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70a-9: de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin theg pa chen po rab tu snang ba la snyoms par zhugs pa legs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70a-11: 'di ltar rigs kyi bu khyod la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70a-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang mtshan rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya bar mthun pa sha stag gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70b-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs @70b pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad 'di'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70b-1: khyod nyid kyi ye shes kyi khyad par gyis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu brjod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70b-2: ye shes kyi sa la 'jug par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70b-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba dang; sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba la mkhas par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70b-4: chos thams cad la ye shes shin tu yangs par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70b-5: shin tu legs par gnas pa'i chos rab tu bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70b-6: ye shes tha mi dad pa rnam par sbyang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70b-7: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis gos pa med par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70b-8: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70b-9: ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul khong du chud par bya ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul gyi bar du khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70b-10: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu brtsams pa rab tu thob par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i sa ma nor bar rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70b-12: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par dmigs par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:70b-13: zag pa med pa'i chos kyi bye brag rnam par bsgom pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71a-0: rnam par dbye ba shin tu rnam par phye ba'i shes rab kyi snang ba chen po la @71a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71a-1: mkhas pa'i ye shes kyi rgyan thob par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71a-2: shin tu brtags pa'i ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71a-3: gnas kyi rnam pa ci rigs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71a-4: spobs pa'i snang ba dma' ba med par thob par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71a-5: tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa chen po'i sa shin tu rtogs par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71a-6: byang chub kyi sems la dran pa nyams pa med par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71a-7: sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71a-8: thams cad du song ba'i blo rnam par gdon mi za ba la mkhas pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71a-9: de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos kyi sgo rab tu dbye ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71a-11: chos kyi dbyings shin tu sbyangs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71a-12: sems can gyi khams thams cad la phan gdags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71a-13: chos kyi sku'i ye shes kyi lus la 'jug par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71a-14: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba yang dag par blang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71a-15: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du shin tu 'phags pa'i lus 'byung bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71a-16: 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71b-0: @71b 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi tshul yongs su dag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71b-1: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir spobs pa skyed cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71b-2: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la zil gyis mi non pa'i lus nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71b-3: thogs pa med pa'i spobs pas shin tu ston pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71b-4: shin tu sbyangs pa'i ye shes rnam par phye ba la 'jug pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71b-5: dran pa nyams pa med pa'i byin gyi rlabs nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71b-6: blo gros shin tu nges par rtogs pas mkhas pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71b-7: thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i blo'i rjes su 'gro ba nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71b-8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stobs thub pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa che zhing zhum pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71b-10: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pas rnam par dbye ba'i chos kyi tshul shin tu rtogs par bya ba nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyan shin tu rnam par phye ba mngon par bsdu ba nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:71b-13: de ni ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi chos nyid rab tu thob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72a-1: lam gyis mngon par bsgrubs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72a-2: lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu rnam par sbyangs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72a-3: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu sbyangs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72a-4: tshogs shin tu bsags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72a-5: yongs su sbyangs pa shin tu byas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72a-6: dran pa'i snod tshad med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72a-7: mos pa rnam par dag cing 'od shin tu gsal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72a-8: gzungs kyi sgo tha dad pa med par thob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72a-9: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas shin tu btab pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72a-10: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de dag na bzhugs bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyis mthus so so nas phyag g-yas pa brkyang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po'i mgo la byug pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72a-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la reg ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72a-13: byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam 'di ni shin tu rnam par gdon mi za ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72a-18: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par yangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72a-19: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72a-20: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72a-21: sems can gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par khyab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72b-0: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob @72b pa; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyi brlabs pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72b-2: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes kyi sa la yang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72b-3: ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes kyi sa la yang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72b-4: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes kyi sa la yang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72b-6: de la bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi sa rnams te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72b-7: gang la bsams te bdag gis de skad du smras pa de dag ni 'das pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72b-9: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72b-14: rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72b-15: dri ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72b-16: 'od byed pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72b-17: 'od 'phro ba can zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72b-18: rgyal bar dka' ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:72b-19: mngon sum pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73a-0: ring du song ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun @73a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73a-2: mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73a-3: legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73a-4: chos kyi sprin ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73a-6: de rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73a-9: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73a-13: bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po 'di dag mi gsung ba de lta bu ma mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73a-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su sbyong ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo 'di ni yang dag phul zhes bya ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73a-17: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73a-19: gnas 'di ni bsam gyi mi khyab pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73a-20: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73a-21: de nas de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po 'di dag @73b ming tsam zhig brjod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73b-1: cang mi zer bar 'dug nas de las rab tu phye ste ma bshad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73b-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po de dag gi ming tsam zhig thos nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73b-3: rab tu phye ste ma brjod pas skom par gyur nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73b-4: de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73b-5: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po de dag gi ming tsam zhig brjod de cang mi zer bar 'dug na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73b-6: de las rab tu phye zhing mi ston pa de la rgyu ni gang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73b-7: rkyen ni ci zhig yod snyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73b-8: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa de na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par grol ba'i zla ba zhes bya ba 'dus shing 'dug 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73b-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad de don de dris so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73b-12: ci phyir rtog pa rnam dag cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73b-13: dran dang ye shes ldan pa yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73b-14: sa yi mchog ni brjod byas te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73b-15: mkhas pas rnam par phye mi bshad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73b-16: 'di kun nges par rtogs pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73b-17: byang chub sems dpa' grags chen yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73b-18: ci phyir khyod ni sa brjod de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:73b-19: rab tu phye ba bshad mi bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-1: ni; ;kun kyang shin tu nyan par 'dod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-2: sa yi don tshul yang dag tu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-3: rnam par phye ste bshad par mdzod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-5: le lo med cing dge dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-6: dag pa'i mchog la gnas pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-7: yon tan ye shes ldan pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-8: phan tshun gcig la gcig lta zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-9: kun kyang rim gro bcas par gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-10: sbrang rtsi ji ltar spang min pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-11: de ltar bdud rtsi mchog kyang 'dod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-12: rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-13: shes rab chen pos de thos nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-14: 'khor rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-15: bde bar gshegs pa'i sras la smras //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-16: sangs rgyas sku rab yang dag 'byung bas na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab bstan cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-18: sa rgyu dam pa rnam par dbye bya ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-19: de ni rmad byung mchog tu dga' ba yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-20: phra zhing blta dka' rnam par rtog pa spangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-21: sems kyi sa dang bral bas bsgrub par dga'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-22: mkhas pa rnams kyi zag med spyod yul te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-23: 'gro ba rnams kyis de thos mos par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-24: rdo rje lta bur bsam pa rab bzhag ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-25: sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la mos byas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-26: bdag med pa yi sems kyi sa shes na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-27: ye shes dam pa 'di gzod mnyan par nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-28: ji ltar bar snang tshon ris bri ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-29: nam mkha'i dbyings la rlung gnas ji bzhin du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74a-30: de ltar ye shes zag pa med pa yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74b-0: shin tu @74b lta dka' thub pas rnam par phye //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74b-1: de la bdag gi sems ni 'di snyam byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74b-2: sangs rgyas ye shes dam pa bsam yas la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74b-3: 'gro ba gang rnams dang bar byed dkon zhes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74b-4: de yi phyir na ma smras ma bshad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74b-5: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74b-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74b-8: 'khor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'di dag la bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74b-9: kun tu rtog pa yongs su sbyangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74b-10: spyad par bya ba shin tu spyad pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74b-12: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong shin tu bsnyen bkur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74b-13: yon tan dang ye shes tshad med pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74b-14: the tshom dang nem nur med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74b-17: mos pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74b-18: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa sha stag tshogs pas yongs su dag pa yin gyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis legs par bshad pa mdzod cig dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74b-21: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad ni rnam par 'di lta bu'i gnas zab mo la mngon sum du gnas pa sha stag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74b-22: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas don 'di nyid gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:74b-23: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75a-1: dpa'i spyod pa bla med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75a-2: sa rnams rab phye rnam dgod brtags pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75a-3: ye shes sbyong zhing byang chub 'thob byed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75a-4: mchog dang dam pa zhi ba'i chos rnams shod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75a-5: 'khor 'di dag pa nyon mongs med pa'i mchog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75a-6: mos dang bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75a-7: sangs rgyas bye ba mang la spyod pa spyad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75a-8: sa 'di brtag la yid ches ldan pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75a-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla ba la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75a-11: 'khor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gnas zab mo la bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75a-12: kun tu rtog pa yongs su sbyangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75a-13: spyod pa shin tu spyad pa; tshogs shin tu bsags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75a-14: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75a-15: yon tan dang ye shes tshad med pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75a-16: the tshom dang nem nur med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75a-17: nyon mongs pa dang bral ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75a-18: mos pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75a-19: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa sha stag tshogs pas shin tu dag pa yang yin na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75a-20: 'on kyang sems can mos pa chung ngu gzhan dag gis zab mo'i rnam pa 'di lta bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas dag thos par gyur la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75b-0: thos nas kyang the tshom dang yid gnyis su gyur @75b na; de dag la yun ring por gnod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75b-3: 'di lta zhig tu snying brtse ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75b-4: bdag ni cang mi zer bar 'dug pa nyid du mos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75b-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos don 'di nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75b-6: 'khor 'di rnam dag shes rab yangs pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75b-7: zab cing gsal ba'i spyod ldan rtogs shes shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75b-8: gzhan dring mi 'jog ri rgyal bzhin mi g-yo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75b-9: bsam rtog mi 'khrug rgya mtsho chen po 'dra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75b-10: 'on kyang ma rtogs mi shes ma spyad pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75b-11: rnam shes yul gnas don la shes med pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75b-12: thos shing ma ches 'phral du ngan song lhung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75b-13: de dag snying brtses ye shes sa ma bshad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75b-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75b-15: yang byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la gsol ba btab pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75b-17: legs par bshad pa mdzod cig dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rnam pa 'di lta bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas 'di dag kyang gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75b-19: legs par yid ches par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75b-22: don 'di ltar sa shin tu bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe chos nyid rab tu thob pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:75b-23: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang dgongs par 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76a-0: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang ye shes kyi sa 'di yongs su bsrung @76a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76a-1: ba'i don du rab tu brtson par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76a-2: de yang ci'i phyir zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76a-3: 'di ni spyod pa'i sa dang po ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76a-4: 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'grub pa'i gzhi yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76a-8: yi ge dang 'bru 'grangs pa ji snyed du bstan pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba'ang yi ge'i phyi mo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76a-9: tha mar yang yi ge'i phyi mo la thug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76a-10: yi ge'i phyi mo bstan pas ma khyab pa de lta bu'i yi ge dang 'bru 'grangs pa bstan pa ni gang yang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76a-12: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang spyod pas rab tu 'grub pas sa sngon du 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76a-13: rang byung gi ye shes kyi mthar thug par 'gyur bas sa'i mthar thug pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir byin gyis rlob pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76a-18: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas don 'di nyid gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76a-19: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76a-20: sa dang spyod 'jug byang chub 'gyur ba ye shes sgrub byed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76a-21: spyod pa rnam dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i sras kyis legs par shod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-0: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba bde gshegs kun mgon @76b 'dren pa ji snyed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-1: khyu mchog de kun ye shes 'byung gnas ston la dgongs pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-2: 'di ni dang po zhugs pa'i shes spyod 'di yi mthar thug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-3: rgyal ba'i ches rab gzhal yas ji snyed de dag 'byung gnas 'di //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-4: yi ge 'grangs pa'i phyi mo'i rjes 'gro sngon du de 'gro ltar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-5: de bzhin sa mchog blo yi yul du tha ma thug par 'dod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis dbyangs kyi nga ro gcig tu glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-7: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la don 'di nyid kyi phyir gsol ba btab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-8: blo yangs dam pa'i phul mnga' ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-9: spobs pa mtha' yas rnam par dbye ba rtogs mkhyen pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-10: yid du 'ong ba'i gsung dbyangs kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-11: kun la phan don dam pa bshad pa mdzod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-12: dran dang dga' bas spyod dag pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-13: stobs bcu'i stobs kyi shugs sogs yon tan ldan pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-14: sa yi dam pa mchog gi rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-15: tha dad yang dag don mkhyen spyod pas shod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-16: zhi sdom bsgrub pa'i yid ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-17: nga rgyal dregs dang lta ba'i nyon mongs zhir gyur pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-19: khyod kyis legs par bshad du re zhing sdod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-20: skom pa bsil ba'i chu 'dod bzhin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-21: bkres pa kha zas nad pa sman rab 'dod pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-22: bung ba sbrang rtsi 'dod pa ltar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-23: de bzhin 'khor 'di khyod kyi tshig la sdod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:76b-24: de bas shin tu blo yangs pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77a-1: med rnams la sa yi dam par 'jug pa shod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77a-2: chags med stobs bcu'i tshogs gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77a-3: bde gshegs spyod pa ma lus bshad par mdzod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77a-4: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i mdzod spu nas byang chub sems dpa'i stobs snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor gyi 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa dang ldan pa byung ngo; ;de byung nas phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad ma lus par snang bar byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77a-5: sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad rtse zil bar byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77a-6: bdud kyi khyim thams cad zil gyis mnan nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77a-7: sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i mthu bstan nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77a-8: phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du chos bstan pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus snang bar byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77a-9: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan nas steng gi bar snang la 'od zer stug po'i sprin gyi dra ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen por byas te 'dug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77b-0: de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan @77b 'das de dag gi mdzod spu dag nas kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i 'od snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor gyi 'od zer grangs med pa dang ldan pa dag byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77b-2: byung nas kyang de dag gis phyogs bcu thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du chos bstan pa'i byin gyis byin du brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams snang bar byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77b-3: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di yang snang bar byas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77b-5: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di yang snang bar byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po'i lus kyang snang bar byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77b-7: steng gi bar snang la de bzhin du 'od zer stug po'i sprin gyi dra ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen por byas te 'khod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77b-8: de nas 'od zer stug po'i sprin gyi dra ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po de dag nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis sgra'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77b-9: mi mnyam mnyam dang mnyam pa mkha' dang mnyam pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77b-10: stobs bcu'i khyu mchog mthu ldan tshad med yon tan can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77b-11: 'jig rten kun mchog mi yi dam pa phul gyi rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:77b-12: sh'akya seng ge'i chos la byin rlabs dam pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78a-1: sras po 'dren pa'i byin gyis bshad par gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78a-2: chos rgyal khyu mchog rnams kyi mdzod kyi dam pa phye //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78a-3: sa yi ye shes rnam phye spyod mchog rab yangs pa; ;stobs bcu'i byin gyis ma thogs myur du bstan pa gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78a-4: gang gis rna lam bsam par chos dam rin chen 'di //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78a-5: song bar gyur pa de dag bde gshegs byin gyis brlabs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78a-6: rdul med sa kun rim gyis rab tu rdzogs byas nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78a-7: stobs bcu ldan pa'i rgyal ba dam par 'grub par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78a-8: rgya mtsho'i chu byung gyur cing bskal pa'i mes gdungs kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78a-9: gal te snod gyur sems can de dag 'di la nyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78a-10: gang rnams the tshom za zhing yid gnyis byed pa ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78a-11: de dag rna bas rnam pa kun tu thos mi 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78a-12: de phyir sa yi ye shes lam mchog bstan par gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78a-13: gnas dang rgyud dang 'phro ba rim gyis rab tu shod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78a-14: spyod dang yul dang chos dang ye shes tshul rnams kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78a-15: chos kyi tshul yang 'gro ba kun la phan phyir shod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78a-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos phyogs bcur bltas nas 'khor thams cad de bas kyang dad par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78a-17: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so; ;phra la shes dka' drang srong chen po'i lam //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78a-18: mi rtog rtog yul ma yin blta bar dka'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78a-19: rang bzhin zhi zhing 'gag med 'byung ba med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-0: mkhas gsal shes pas khong du @78b chud pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-1: ngo bo nyid stong zhi zhing sdug bsngal zad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-2: rgyud las rnam grol mnyam par mya ngan 'das //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-3: mtha' dang dbus med tshig gis brjod du med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-4: dus gsum grol ba nam mkha' 'dra zhing mtshungs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-5: bde gshegs spyod yul zhi zhing nye bar zhi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-6: smra ba'i lam rnams kun gyis brjod par dka'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-7: de dag sa dang spyod pa de 'dra bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-8: smra bar dka' na bstan par ga la nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-9: de ni bsam yas sems lam rnam par spangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-10: ye shes mngon bsgrubs rgyal ba'i spyod yul te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-11: phung po skye mched khams kyis bskyed pa min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-12: sems kyis mi shes yid kyis rnam ma brtags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-13: ji ltar bar snang gnas kyi bya yi rjes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-14: shin tu smra dka' bstan par mi nus pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-15: de ltar bde gshegs sras kyi sa rnams kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-16: yid dang sems kyi yul gyis shes mi nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-17: 'on kyang byams dang snying rje'i smon lam gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-18: de las phyogs tsam rim pa'i tshul bzhin du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-19: bshad par bya ste sems kyi spyod yul min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-20: ye shes tshul gyis rdzogs par bya ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-21: de 'dra'i spyod yul phra zhing blta dka' ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-22: rang rig yin pas brjod par ma nus kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-23: 'on kyang bde bar gshegs pa'i mthus brjod kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-24: thams cad mthun par nan tan gyis te nyon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-25: ye shes sa dang spyod 'jug ci 'dra ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-26: bskal pa bye bar zad par mi nus te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:78b-27: yang dag don dngos gzhan min gnas pa las //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-0: mdo tsam bshad kyi de dag @79a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-2: mthun zhing nan tan yod par sta gon gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-3: bde gshegs byin gyis bdag gis bshad par bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-4: dpe ldan 'thad la yi ge mnyam pa yi; ;chos sgra dam pa bdag gis brjod par bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-5: 'di ni tshig gis brjod par shin tu dka'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-6: de ltar tshad med bde gshegs mthu dag las //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-7: chu thigs gcig 'dra bdag gi lus 'di la; ;de ring zhugs kyi bshad pa mnyan par gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-9: de la sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-10: spyad pa shin tu spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-11: tshogs shin tu bsags pa; ;sangs rgyas byung ba shin tu bsnyen bkur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-12: chos dkar po shin tu bsdus pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-13: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis shin tu bzung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-14: bsam pa yongs su dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-15: lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu rgya chen po can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-16: mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-17: snying rje dang snying brtse ba mngon du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-18: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par mos pa rnams rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mos pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-19: stobs bcu'i stobs thob par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-20: mi 'jigs pa chen po thob par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-21: sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-22: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79a-23: snying brtse ba dang snying rje chen po yongs su dag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-0: phyogs bcu ma lus par thogs pa med pa'i ye shes @79b mngon du 'gyur ba bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad thogs pa med par yongs su sbyang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-2: dus gsum thams cad skad cig gcig gis khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-3: chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rab tu bskor ba la khyu mchog gi mthu dbyung ba rgya chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-5: shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-6: thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-7: bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas rab tu brtan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad med pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-10: blo'i stobs rnam par dbye bar bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-11: shin tu rnam par phye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-12: chags pa med pa'i ye shes mngon du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-13: rang byung gi ye shes dang mthun pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-14: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la shes rab dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-15: ye shes kyi man ngag yang dag par tshol ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-16: sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad las gdams ngag yang dag par blangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-17: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-18: nam mkha'i mthar thug par gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-19: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par skye bar 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-20: sems bskyed pa de bskyed ma thag tu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-21: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so'i skye bo'i sa las rab tu 'das pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:79b-22: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa shin tu non pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80a-1: pa'i rigs su skyes pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80a-2: rigs brjod pa la kha na ma tho ba med pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80a-3: 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las phyir log pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80a-4: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam shin tu non pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid la gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa la rab tu gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80a-7: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80a-8: rdzogs pa'i byang chub la shin tu gzhol bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su nges pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80a-10: chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la mi g-yo ba'i tshul gyis rab tu gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80a-12: de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rab tu dga' ba mang ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80a-13: yid bde ba mang ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80a-18: 'tshe ba med pa mang ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80a-19: khro ba med pa mang ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80a-21: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80b-0: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rjes su dran zhing rab @80b tu dga' ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80b-3: pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i khyad par rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul mi 'phrogs pa rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdams ngag dang lung rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80b-7: sems can gyi don rab tu thob par bya ba rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug pa'i thabs rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80b-9: yang de 'di snyam du sems te; bdag ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi yul las phyir log go zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80b-10: bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi sa dang nye bar gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80b-11: bdag ni byis pa'i sa las ring du gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80b-12: bdag ni ye shes kyi sa dang nye bar gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80b-13: bdag ni ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad rgyun chad do zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:80b-14: bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81a-1: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba dang nye bar gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81a-2: bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la yang dag par 'byung ngo zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81a-3: bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid dang ldan par gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81a-7: skyi g-ya' ba thams cad dang bral lo zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81a-10: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba 'di thob ma thag tu 'jigs pa'i rnam pa 'di dag 'di lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81a-15: 'khor du bag tsha bas 'jigs pa de dag thams cad de la med pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81a-17: 'di ltar de ni bdag gi 'du shes dang bral bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81a-18: de la bdag phangs par sems pa'ang med na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81a-19: yo byad thams cad la phangs par sems ba lta ga la yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81a-20: de'i phyir de la 'tsho ba med pas 'jigs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81a-21: de ni su las kyang rim gror bya ba cung zad tsam yang re ba med la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81b-0: gzhan du na bdag nyid kyis @81b sems can de dag la yo byad mang po thams cad kyis bstud par bya'o snyam du sems pas de'i phyir de la mi bsngags pa'i 'jigs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81b-1: de bdag tu lta ba dang bral bas de la bdag gi 'du shes med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81b-2: de'i phyir de la 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81b-3: bdag shi nas kyang gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes de'i phyir de la ngan song gis 'jigs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81b-5: bdag gi bsam pa dang 'jig rten na mtshungs pa'ang su yang med na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81b-6: lhag pa lta ga la yod ces de'i phyir de la 'khor du bag tsha ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81b-11: skyi g-ya' ba med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas lhag pa'i bsam pa ma nyams shing mi dma' bas de bas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir rab tu brtson par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81b-13: de dad pa la dbang sgyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81b-15: yid ches pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81b-18: snying rjes mngon par sgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81b-19: byams pa chen po dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:81b-20: yid skyo ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la rim gro dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82a-5: nyin mtshan du mi ngoms par dge ba'i rtsa ba gsog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82a-6: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82a-7: chos kyi dga' bas dga' bar gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82a-8: mi ngoms par mang du thos pa tshol ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82a-9: ji skad du thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin du rtog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82a-13: bsngags pa la chags pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82a-14: yo byad thams cad la phangs par sems shing chags pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82a-15: sems bskyed pa rin po che lta bus ngoms pa med par mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82a-16: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa la mngon par mos pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82a-19: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la dmigs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82a-20: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs yongs su tshol ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82a-21: sgyu dang g-yo yongs su spangs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82a-22: ji skad du smras pa de ltar byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82a-23: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bden pa'i tshig gi rjes su srung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la skyon du 'gyur bar mi byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa mi gtong @82b pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82b-1: ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po che po ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi sgul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82b-2: 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82b-3: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lam dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82b-4: mi ngoms par byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs rab tu bsags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82b-5: rtag tu rgyun mi chad par gong nas gong du khyad par du 'bogs pa'i lam tshol ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82b-6: sa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82b-8: de byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba de la shin tu gnas shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82b-9: rnam pa 'di lta bu'i smon lam chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82b-11: mngon par bsgrub pa chen po 'di dag mngon par sgrub ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82b-12: 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ma lus pa lhag ma med pa mtha' dag la mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82b-13: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82b-14: mos pa rgya chen pos rnam par dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82b-15: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82b-16: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82b-17: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du sangs rgyas skye ba 'grangs pa la rim gro dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:82b-18: mchod pa chen po bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83a-1: pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par gzung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83a-2: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub yang dag par blang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83a-3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa yang dag par bsrung ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83a-4: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83a-5: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83a-6: bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'grangs pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad kyi dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa na bzhugs pa la sogs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83a-14: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83a-17: snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83a-21: chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83a-22: mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa'i drung du 'gro zhing mchod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83b-0: dam pa'i chos yang dag par gzung ba'i sbyor ba la sogs pa thams cad dus gcig tu @83b mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83b-1: chos kyi dbyings kyi klas par rgya che ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83b-2: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83b-3: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'grangs pa'i drung du 'gro ba nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83b-4: mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar gyi drung du 'gro ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83b-10: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis yang dag par bsdus pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83b-11: sa yongs su sbyang ba'i yan lag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83b-12: nye ba'i yan lag tu bcas pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83b-14: bye brag gi mtshan nyid du bcas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83b-17: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod par gtogs pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83b-18: sa ji lta ba bzhin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83b-19: ji lta bur bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83b-20: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang ba la gdams ngag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83b-21: man ngag sbyin pas nye bar brtan pa'i sems bskyed pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83b-22: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83b-23: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83b-24: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du spyod pa 'grangs pa sems bskyed pas mngon par bsgrub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:83b-25: rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84a-1: can gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84a-2: lhag ma med pa mtha' dag gzugs yod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84a-6: 'du shes yod pa'ang ma yin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84a-7: 'du shes med pa'ang ma yin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84a-8: sgo nga las skyes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84a-10: drod gsher las skyes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84a-11: rdzus te byung ba khams gsum du gtogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84a-13: skye ba thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84a-14: sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84a-15: lam gyi rgyud 'grangs pa thams cad rgyun gcad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84a-16: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84a-17: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84a-18: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84a-19: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84a-20: bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84a-21: sems can 'grangs pa thams cad du sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba la rgyun mi 'chang pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84a-23: 'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84a-30: spyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba thams cad ma lus pa lhag ma med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84b-0: mtha' dag gzhi mnyam @84b par yang dag par 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84b-1: mig 'phrul gyi rnam pa ltar phyogs bcu'i rnam pa tha dad pa ma lus pa'i rnam pa la 'jug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84b-2: rnam par phye ba'i ye shes khong du chud cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84b-3: mngon du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84b-4: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84b-5: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84b-6: bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams 'grangs par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la 'jug cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84b-7: yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84b-8: smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84b-10: zhing thams cad zhing gcig tu yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84b-11: zhing gcig zhing thams cad du yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84b-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa 'od mang po'i rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84b-14: kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal bas yongs su dag pa'i lam dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84b-15: sems can ye shes kyi 'byung gnas tshad med pas yongs su gang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po la yang dag par gzhol zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84b-16: bsam pa'i tshul bzhin du sems can rnams la yang dag par bstan cing shin tu tshim par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84b-17: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84b-18: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:84b-19: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85a-0: @85a *// bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du zhing 'grangs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85a-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bsam pa gcig pa'i sbyor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85a-3: ltod pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85a-4: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang dmigs pa gcig cing mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85a-5: byang chub sems dpa' dang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'grogs shing mi 'bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85a-6: sangs rgyas 'byung ba ci dgar bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85a-7: rang gi sems bskyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85a-9: ye shes khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85a-10: ma nyams shing rjes su 'brang ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85a-12: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gzugs brnyan 'byung ba yang dag par bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85a-13: skye ba'i skye gnas thams cad du rang gi lus rjes su 'gro bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85a-14: theg pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad spyad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85b-0: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug @85b pa; phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85b-1: bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du spyod pa 'grangs par theg pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa la rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85b-3: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo la yang dag par gnas shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85b-5: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las don yod par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85b-6: mthong ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi chos gdon mi za bar thob par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85b-7: dbyangs brjod ma thag tu ye shes khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85b-8: dad par gyur ma thag tu nyon mongs pa phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85b-9: bsam pa sman gyi rgyal po chen po lta bur rab tu thob par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85b-10: lus yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu thob par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85b-11: byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad spyad pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85b-12: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85b-13: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85b-14: bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'grangs par spyod pa thams cad 'bras bu yod pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85b-16: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:85b-17: skra'i sbubs gcig dang tha mi dad pa'i skra'i sbubs thams cad du tshe dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:86a-1: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:86a-4: snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:86a-8: chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:86a-9: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:86a-10: sangs rgyas kyi yul dang mthu dang ye shes chen po khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:86a-11: sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:86a-12: skad cig gcig tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:86a-13: rab tu zhi ba thob par bya ba yang dag par bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:86a-14: mngon par 'tshang rgya ba gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad 'phrul bas rgyas par dgang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:86a-15: dbyangs gcig brjod pas sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:86a-16: bsam pa shin tu tshim par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:86a-17: mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:86a-18: spyod pa rnams rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:86a-19: theg pa chen po'i sa la chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa yang dag par bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:86a-20: chos shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi sgyu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:86b-0: dbang gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad sprul bas rnam par dgang ba'i @86b phyir /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96a-16: ci smras de bzhin byed pas bden pa'i tshig la gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96a-17: rgyal ba'i rigs skyon mi 'gyur byang chub slob la spyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96a-18: 'jig rten las kyi bsam bral 'gro ba'i don du brtson //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96a-19: dkar pos ngoms pa med par phyir zhing gong du rtsol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96a-20: de dag 'di 'dra'i chos brtson yon tan don dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96b-0: rgyal ba blta ba'i don du smon lam @96b mngon par sgrub //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96b-2: spyod pa mchog gi don du smon lam mngon par sgrub //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96b-3: sems can yongs su smin bya sangs rgyas zhing sbyangs te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96b-4: de yi zhing mchog rgyal sras kun gyis gang 'gyur zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96b-5: rgyal sras rnams dang bsam pa gcig cing don mthun phyir //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96b-6: skra sbubs kun tu don gyi dam pa mngon 'tshang rgya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96b-7: de dag smon lam du ma mngon par sgrub pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96b-8: de dag mtha' yas yangs shing mthar thug med dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96b-9: nam mkha'i khams dang chos nyid mya ngan 'das khams dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96b-10: 'jig rten mthar thug rgyal ba 'byung dang ye shes sa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96b-11: sems kyi yul dang ye shes 'jug pa'i mthar thug dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96b-12: rnam gsum rgyud rnams mthar thug 'gro ba'i mur thug pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96b-13: rnam pa de tshul bdag smon mthar yang thug gyur cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96b-14: de dag mthar thug ji bzhin bdag spyod de 'drar shog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96b-15: de ltar mngon bsgrubs 'jam zhing byams pa'i sems ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96b-16: sangs rgyas yon tan yid ches sems can rnam par lta //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96b-17: sems can sdug bsngal nyon mongs bdag gis bskyab ces te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96b-18: rten 'brel 'byung 'jug snying rje byams dang ldan pa ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96b-19: de dag don du sna tshogs sbyin pa yang du rtsom //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:96b-20: rgyal srid mchog dang rin chen sna tshogs glang po rta //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97a-1: rkang lag mig dang de bzhin bdag gi sha /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97a-2: thams cad yongs su gtong yang zhum pa'i yid med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97a-3: gtsug lag sna tshogs tshol yang yongs su skyo ba med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97a-4: gtsug lag 'jig rten spyod pa'i rjes kyang rab tu snyogs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97a-5: 'jig rten shes dang ldan zhing khrel yod dga' dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97a-6: bde gshegs gcig min rim gro rjes su mchod pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97a-7: de ltar mkhas pa nyin mtshan rtag tu brtson pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97a-8: dge ba mer bcug gser bzhin shin tu dag par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97a-9: de dag sa rnams bcu po 'di la sbyangs byas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97a-10: thogs pa med par chags med rab tu thob par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97a-11: ji ltar ded dpon lam grogs mang la phan brtson pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97a-12: lam gyi yon tan dris shing bde ba'i grong du skyel //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97a-13: de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dang po'i sa gnas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97a-14: 'gro ba'i don bshams chags med sa bcu rab tu 'thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97a-15: 'di gnas yon tan ldan pa mi yi dbang por 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97a-16: byams pa'i sems kyis sa rnams ma lus yongs su skyong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97a-17: 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan srid kun rab tu skyong byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97a-18: sbyin pas 'gro ba sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la 'god //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97a-19: khyu mchog dam pa 'dod na rgyal srid rab tu gtong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-0: rgyal ba'i bstan par rab tu byung zhing brtson @97b 'grus rtsom /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-1: ting 'dzin brgya dang sangs rgyas brgya rnams mthong bar byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-2: zhing brgya bskyod cing rab tu snang byed kun tu 'gro /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-3: sems can brgya sbyong chos kyi sgo la 'god pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-4: bskal pa brgyar 'jug lus brgya rab tu ston pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-5: rgyal ba'i sras kyang brgya yi grangs tshang yongs su ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-6: de yi gong na sman mchog stobs ldan tshad kyang med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-7: bdag gis don du mdor sdus te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-8: sa rnams khyed la bshad pa byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-9: rgya cher bskal pa bye bar yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-10: thams cad zad par mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-11: de ltar sa yi dang po 'di //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-12: 'jig rten kun la phan sems pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-13: byang chub sems dpa' mchog rnams la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-14: rgyal ba'i sras kyis bstan pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-15: rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-16: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-18: gnas kyi dam pa thos gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-19: bde bar gshegs pa'i sras kyi rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-20: yid rtog dang zhing rab tu dga'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-21: kun kyang bstan las 'das gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-22: nam mkha'i dbyings la mngon 'phags nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-23: me tog sil ma rab tu 'thor //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-24: legs zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang brjod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-25: rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-26: shes rab chen po legs so legs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-27: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:97b-28: sa 'di khyod kyis legs par bshad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98a-0: @98a *// rgyal ba'i sras kyi gong du yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98a-1: sa gnyis rab tu brjod pa mjod [*mdzod?]//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98a-2: yid kyi rtog pa ci 'dra bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98a-4: shes rab chen pos bshad par mdzod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98a-5: rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan par 'dod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98a-6: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98a-8: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po la yongs su sbyang ba byas pa de sa gnyis pa la mngon par mos pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98a-9: de'i sems kyi bsam pa bcu 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98a-11: 'di lta ste; drang po'i bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98a-13: las su rung ba'i bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98a-18: mi ltos pa'i bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98a-19: rlabs po che'i bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98a-20: bdag nyid che ba'i bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98a-21: sems kyi bsam pa bcu po 'di dag 'byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98a-22: de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dri ma dang bral ba la gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98a-24: de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa dri ma dang bral ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis srog gcod pa dang bral ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98b-0: khon du 'dzin @98b pa spangs shing ngo tsha dang ldan pas srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la phan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98b-1: bde bas phan 'dogs shing byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98b-2: de yid kyi yongs su rtog pa tsam gyis kyang srog chags la 'tshe ba mi byed na sems can gzhan la sems can du 'du shes shing ched du bsams te lus la gtse ba chen po bya ba lta ci smos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98b-3: bdag gis longs spyod kyis chog shes shing gzhan gyi longs spyod la re ba med pas ma byin pa len pa dang bral ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98b-4: de gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'i dngos po la gzhan gyis yongs su bzung bar 'du shes shing rku sems nye bar bzhag ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98b-5: chung ngu na rtsva dang lo ma yang ma byin par mi len na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98b-6: 'tsho ba'i yo byad gzhan lta ci smos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98b-7: bdag gi chung mas chog shes shing gzhan gyi chung ma la re ba med pas 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang bral ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98b-8: de gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'i bud med gzhan gyi chung ma rus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98b-10: chos kyis bsrung ba rnams la chags sems kyang mi skyed na gnyis kyis gnyis phrad par bya ba lta ci smos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98b-11: yang dag par smra zhing bden par smra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98b-13: tshod du smra ba la ji skad du smras pa de bzhin du byed pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:98b-14: rdzun du smra ba dang bral ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99a-0: de chung ngu na rmi lam du yang @99a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99a-1: rdzun gyi tshig mi pa rjod [*brjod?] na ched du bsams te brjod pa lta ci smos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99a-2: de sems can gyi dbyen mi byed cing mi 'tshe ba la zhugs pas phra ma'i tshig dang bral ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99a-3: de de dag dbye ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99a-4: tshu bi las thos shing pha pir snyod pa ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99a-5: pha bi las thos nas tshu bir snyod pa ma yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99a-6: 'dum pa rnams dbye bar mi byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99a-7: bye ba rnams la dpar bas mi rnon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99a-8: mi 'dum pa la dga' zhing mi 'dum pa la mos pa ma yin pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99a-9: bden nam rdzun yang rung mi 'dum bar bya ba'i tshig mi smra'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99a-10: zhe gcod pa'i tshig dang bral ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99a-16: nyes pa ngor brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99a-17: nyes pa ngor brjod pa la gzhol ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99a-20: gzungs su bzung ba ma yin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99a-23: gshe ba las byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99a-24: snying na bar byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99a-25: yid yongs su gdung bar byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99a-28: bdag dang gzhan gyi sems ma rung bar byed pa'i tshig gi rnam pa de lta bu spangs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99b-9: skye bo mang po dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99b-10: skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99b-12: sems can thams cad la phan zhing bde bar 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99b-13: yid bde bar byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99b-14: yid sim par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99b-15: bdag dang gzhan gyi sems dang bar byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99b-19: nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i tshig gi rnam pa de lta bu dag brjod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99b-20: tshig kyal ba spangs pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99b-21: legs par lan glon pa'i tshig dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99b-28: dus la bab par shin tu go ba'i gtan tshigs dang bcas par smra bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:99b-29: de chung ngu na bzhad gad du bya ba tsam gyi tshig la'ang yongs su spang par bya ba yongs su spong na dgos pa don du gnyer cing tshig gis rnam par 'khrug pa lta ci smos chags sems med pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100a-0: gzhan dbang ba'i yo byad gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la ji ltar na gang gzhan @100a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100a-1: gyi yin pa de dag bdag gir 'gyur zhes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100a-2: chags sems mi skyed mi re mi smon cing 'dod pa'i sems mi skyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100a-3: gnod sems dang bral ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100a-4: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100a-9: 'gro ba thams cad la phan gdags pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100a-10: 'byung po thams cad la phan zhing snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100a-16: khrong khro ba la sogs pa de dag spangs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100a-17: gang 'di phan pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100a-19: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir rnam par rtog cing rnam par dpyod pa de dag la rnam par rtog pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100a-20: yang dag par lta ba dang ldan zhing ngo mtshar dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100a-22: ngang tshul ngan pa'i lta ba sna tshogs dang bral ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100a-23: lta ba drang zhing g-yo med la sgyu med pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100a-24: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la bsam pa nges pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100a-25: de dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag rtag tu rgyun mi chad par srung zhing 'di ltar sems kyi bsam pa mngon par sgrub ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100a-26: sems can rnams kyi ngan song dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100b-1: log par ltung ba yod pa gang yang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100b-2: de dag thams cad mi dge ba bcu'i lam yongs su blangs pa'i rgyu las byung gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100b-3: bdag gis ni 'di ltar bdag nyid yang dag pa'i nan tan la gnas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100b-4: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i nan tan la dgod par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100b-5: yang dag pa'i nan tan la gnas par bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100b-7: bdag log pa'i nan tan la gnas shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100b-8: gzhan yang dag pa'i nan tan la dgod par bya ba 'di ni gnas med skabs med pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100b-9: 'di ni mi srid do zhes nas yang de 'di ltar rnam par dpyod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100b-10: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag yongs su bzung ba'i rgyus sems can dmyal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100b-11: byol song gi skye gnas dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100b-12: gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du skye ba rnams yod par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100b-13: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su bzung bas ni mir skye ba la sogs pa srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du skye ba yod par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100b-14: de'i gong du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag nyi tshe ba'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100b-15: khams gsum pas skrag pa'i yid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100b-16: snying rje chen po med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100b-17: gzhan las thos pa'i sgra'i rjes su 'brang bas shes rab kyi rnam par yongs su bsgoms na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100b-18: nyan thos kyi theg pa yongs su sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:100b-19: de'i gong du gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101a-3: thabs mkhas pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101a-4: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab par khong du chud pas yongs su sbyangs na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101a-5: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101a-6: de'i gong du yangs shing tshad med pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101a-7: snying brtse zheng snying rje ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101a-8: thabs mkhas pas yang dag par bzung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101a-9: smon lam chen po shin tu btab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101a-10: sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101a-11: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya chen po la dmigs pas yongs su sbyangs na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101a-13: pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa rgya chen po yongs su sgrub par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101a-14: de'i gong du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag nyid rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par yongs su sbyangs pas stobs bcu'i stobs thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101a-15: mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa nas rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su 'grub pa yang dag par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101b-0: de lta bas na bdag gis dge ba bcu'i las mngon par bsgrub tu 'dra ba la rnam pa thams cad du yongs su sbyang zhing mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson par bya'o zhes nas de 'di @101b ltar yang dag par slob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101b-1: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag bsten pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101b-3: mang du byas pa'i shas che bas ni sems can dmyal ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101b-4: 'bring gis byol song gi skye gnas kyi rgyur 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101b-5: tha mas ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyur 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101b-6: de la srog gcod pas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101b-7: byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101b-8: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:101b-9: de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par bsgrub pa 'di lta ste /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:106b-14: don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste /
