K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:106b-23: yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:106b-24: sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-2: dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-3: byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-6: pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-7: stobs yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-8: mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-9: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-10: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-11: de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu khyim dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-13: srid thams cad yongs su spangs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-15: de rab tu byung nas kyang skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin stong rab tu 'thob cing de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-16: sangs rgyas stong mthong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-17: de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-18: 'jig rten gyi khams stong skyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-19: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong du 'gro ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-20: 'jig rten gyi khams stong snang bar byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-21: sems can stong yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-22: bskal pa stong du gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-24: phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa stong la rab tu 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107a-25: chos kyi sgo stong rnam par 'byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107b-0: lus stong @107b yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107b-1: lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor stong yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus de lta bu rtsom mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107b-2: de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107b-13: mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107b-14: bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107b-15: bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107b-16: bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107b-17: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107b-18: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107b-19: bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107b-20: de dag gnyen drang las rung 'jam pa'i sems ldan zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107b-21: bsam pa dag dang bsam pa zhi dang ldan pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107b-22: 'du 'dzi'i dmigs bral rlabs chen blo dang ldan pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107b-23: che nyid sems ldan mkhas pa de dag gnyis la 'phar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107b-24: de gnas yon tan 'chang zhing dge ba phun ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107b-25: gtse med sems ldan srog gcod rnam par kun spangs shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107b-26: ma byin len dang gzhan gyi chung ma de bzhin spangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:107b-27: bden dang ldan zhing phra ma mi smra zhe gcod med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-1: gyi longs spyod 'dod sems bral zhing byams sems ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-2: drang zhing g-yo med yang dag lam du rab tu zhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-3: g-yo med thibs po med cing shin tu nges pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-4: rtag tu bag yod ston pa'i spyod pa yongs su srung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-5: sems dmyal byol song skye gnas sdug bsngal ji snyed dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-6: gshin rje'i ris na yi dvags rtag tu lus 'bar ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-7: de dag sdig blos dge ba min la brtson pas byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-8: de bas de spangs bden pa'i chos dang ldan par bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-9: mi yi nang du skye ba yid du 'ong la sogs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-10: srid rtse'i bar gyi lha yi bsam gtan bde ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-11: rang rgyal theg pa de bzhin nyan thos theg pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-12: kun kyang dkar lam bcu pos byung ba yin zhes te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-13: de ltar shes shing rtag par mkhas pa bag yod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-14: shin tu bsdams pa'i yid kyis pha rol tshul la 'god //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-15: sems can sdug bsngal shes shing snying brtse bskyed byas nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-16: de bas gong du snying rje'i sems dang ldan par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-17: kye ma byis pa'i blo can 'di dag lta ngan lhung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-18: khro zhing shar gnyer gnod pa kun sems rtsod pa can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-19: rtag tu mi ngoms yul la yang dang yang du smon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-20: gzhi gsum 'brel ba de dag yongs su dgrol bar bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-21: gti mug mun pa chen pos kun nas yog pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108a-22: lta ba'i dra mang mya ngam lam du lhung 'gyur ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108b-0: @108b 'khor ba'i shing thags nang na rtag tu dgras gtse zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108b-1: bdud kyi chom po'i nang gnas de dag bdag gis dgrol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108b-2: nyon mongs rlabs kyis g-yengs shing chu bo bzhir nub pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108b-3: khams gsum sdug bsngal brgya yis yongs su gdungs pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108b-4: phung po'i gnas la rten cing bdag tu 'du shes pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108b-5: de dag sdug bsngal dgrol don bdag gis brtson par bya; ;sangs rgyas ye shes dam pa rmad byung phul spangs shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108b-6: 'byung ba yod bzhin dma' ba'i blo gros skyed byed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108b-7: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yang dgod ces; ;rgyal ba'i ye shes don du brtson 'grus yangs pa rtsom //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108b-8: 'di gnas yon tan brgya bsags drang srong chen po rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108b-9: bde gshegs du ma mthong zhing mchod pa'ang rab tu byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108b-10: dge ba de dag bskal pa bye bar phyir zhing sbyong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108b-11: gser gyi dam pa nag mtshur nang du bcug pa bzhin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108b-12: 'di gnas rgyal sras 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108b-13: dge ba bcu la sems can rab tu dgod pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108b-14: dge tshogs gang yang rung ste gsog par byed pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108b-15: stobs bcu ldan zhing 'gro ba'i skyabs 'gyur don du gsog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108b-16: 'dod na rgyal po'i srid kyang rnam par spangs byas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108b-17: brtan pa rnams ni bstan pa'i mchog la rab byung nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:108b-18: brtson 'grus ldan zhing ting 'dzin dam pa mchog kyang 'thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-1: rgyas stong tshang skad cig gcig gis mthong bar byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-2: 'di 'dra'i tshul gyis bgrang bas gzhan yang gcig min pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-3: khyu mchog sa 'di gnas pa rab tu ston par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-4: de yi gong nas ye shes smon lam mchog ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-5: rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa du mas sems can 'dul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-6: de ltar sa mchog gnyis pa 'di //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i mchog rnams la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-9: bde bar gshegs pa'i sras kyis bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-10: dri ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa'o ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-12: bam po bzhi bcu bdun pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul bsam yas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-14: sa mchog spyod pa de skad thos gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-15: rgyal ba'i sras rnams rab tu dga' zhing bsti stang du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-16: me tog sprin char kun nas mngon par 'bebs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-17: ri yi rgyal por bod pa legs so legs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-18: sems can kun la snying brtse bsam pa yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-19: sa mchog dam pa'i spyod yul de 'dra dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-20: mkhas pa'i tshul khrims sdom pa khyod kyis bshad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-21: yang dag de dngos ma nor gzhan min pa'i; ;byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid 'ong zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-22: sems can kun la phan dang bde bar rab sems pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109a-23: phul du 'od gsal khyod kyis bstan pa byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-0: da dung @109b da chud lha dang mis mchod cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-1: chos kyi ye shes rigs par brjod mkhas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-2: de dag spyod yul tshul ni ji bzhin du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-3: sa yi dam pa gsum pa brjod par mdzod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-4: drang srong chen po'i sbyin tshul spyod pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-5: bzod pa brtson 'grus zhi ba shes rab thabs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-6: byams pa'i mchog dang snying rje lam gyi rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-7: rgyal sras spyod pa rnam sbyang bstan mdzod cig ;rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-8: rnam grol zla bas yang smras pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-10: bsam pa mkhas pas bshad pa mdzod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-14: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa gnyis pa la bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-15: sa gsum pa yongs su gnon to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-16: de sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba bcus yongs su gnon to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-19: dag pa'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-20: mi g-yo ba'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-21: skyo ba'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-22: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-23: phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-24: brtan pa'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-25: sbyangs pa'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:109b-26: rlom sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110a-1: che'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110a-2: bdag nyid che ba'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110a-5: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa la gnas pa ni 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad la mi rtag par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110a-9: yid brtan du mi rung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110a-11: ring du mi gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110a-12: skad cig tu 'byung zhing 'gag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110a-13: mi zad cing mi skye mi 'gag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110a-14: sngon gyi mtha' kun nas ma byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110a-15: phyi ma'i mtha' 'pho ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110a-16: da ltar byung ba mi gnas par rab tu rtog go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110a-17: 'du byed kyi rnam pa de lta bu la rab tu rtog pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110a-23: yid du mi 'ong bas rnam par bcings pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110a-24: sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba mang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110a-25: bsags pa med pa las byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110a-28: gti mug gi me rab tu 'bar ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110a-29: nad du mas rnam par skyed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110a-30: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin lta bur mthong nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110a-31: de de bas kyang 'du byed thams cad las sems gyen du skyod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la rab tu gtong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110b-0: des de bzhin @110b gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang rjes su mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110b-7: mi 'jigs pa'i grong rdal du 'gro ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110b-9: 'gro ba mang po yongs su skyob pa yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110b-10: des de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de ltar tshad med pa mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110b-11: 'du byed kyi rnam pa de ltar sdug bsngal mang pos gtses par mthong nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110b-12: sems can thams cad la de bas kyang shas cher sems kyi bsam pa bcu nye bar gzhog ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110b-17: rten med pa'i sems kyi bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110b-18: rtag tu phongs pa'i sems kyi bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110b-21: gti mug gi me kun nas 'bar ba'i sems kyi bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110b-22: srid pa'i btson ras bzung ba'i sems kyi bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110b-23: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par nyon mongs pa'i thibs pos bsgribs pa'i sems kyi bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110b-24: brtag pa'i mthu med pa'i sems kyi bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110b-25: dge ba'i chos la mos pa med pa'i sems kyi bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:110b-26: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las shin tu gol ba'i sems kyi bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111a-0: 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'bab pa'i sems @111a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111a-2: thar pa'i lam gyis dngangs pa'i sems kyi bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111a-3: sems kyi bsam pa 'di bcu nye bar gzhog go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111a-4: des de ltar sems can gyi khams gtse ba mang po can mthong nas brtson 'grus 'di ltar rtsom ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111a-5: sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis bskyab par bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111a-6: yongs su dgrol bar bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111a-7: yongs su sbyang bar bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111a-8: shin tu gdon par bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111a-9: rab tu dgod par bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111a-10: shin tu brtan par bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111a-11: yongs su tshim par bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111a-12: gnas su phyin par bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111a-13: rnam par gdul bar bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111a-14: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111a-15: zhes nas de de ltar 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad las skyo ba'i rjes su song zhing sems can thams cad la rab tu lta ba'i rjes su song ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111a-16: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su song zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la rab tu brten pas sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya ba la brtson pa de 'di ltar yongs su rtog ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111a-21: thabs gang zhig gi 'di lta bur sdug bsngal dang; nye ba'i nyon mongs par lhung ba'i sems can 'di dag mngon par gdon par nus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111b-0: thabs gang zhig gis ni shin tu bde ba'i mya ngan @111b las 'das par dgod par nus snyam nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111b-1: de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111b-2: bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rnam par thar pa'i gnas ma gtogs par gzhan gyis mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111b-3: bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rnam par thar pa'i gnas de yang chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa ma gtogs par gzhan gyis thob par mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111b-4: chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa yang rgyu ba med cing skye ba med pa la spyod pa'i shes rab ma gtogs par gzhan gyis khong du chud par mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111b-5: shes rab kyi snang ba de yang bsam gtan la mkhas shing rtogs pa'i blos rab tu rtog pa med par gzhan gyis thob par mi rung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111b-6: bsam gtan la mkhas shing rtog pa'i blos rab tu rtog pa de yang thos pas mkhas pa med par mi 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111b-7: zhes de de ltar shin tu brtag pa'i shes pa dang ldan pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111b-8: de bas kyang shes cher dam pa'i chos tshol ba la mngon par brtson par gnas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111b-9: nyin mtshan du chos mnyan pa don du gnyer ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111b-10: sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal ba'i don du chos la mos shing ngoms mi shes la rgyun mi 'chad pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111b-11: chos la dga' zhing spro ba dang chos la rab tu 'jug pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:111b-12: chos la gzhol zhing chos la 'bab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112a-0: chos la rten cing chos la @112a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112a-2: chos la mthu tshol ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112a-3: chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la mngon par brtson pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112a-4: de de ltar chos tshol ba la mngon par brtson pas rin po che'i rnam pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112a-7: bang ba gang yang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112a-8: yongs su mi gtong ba de lta bu gang yang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112a-9: chos smra ba'i gang zag de 'ba' zhig la dka' ba'i 'du shes su gyur pa las phar /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112a-10: de dag gzhan la cung zad kyang dga' ba'i 'du shes mi skyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112a-11: de ni chos kyi don du phyi rol gyi dngos po nye bar bzung ba yongs su mi gtong ba de gang yang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112a-12: nang gi dngos po yongs su mi gtong bar bya ba de lta bu'ang cung zad kyang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112a-15: rgyal srid yongs su gtang ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112a-16: longs spyod yongs su gtang ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112a-21: bang ba yongs su gtang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112a-25: bzhon pa yongs su gtang ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112a-27: lhab lhub yongs su gtang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112a-30: bu mo yongs su gtang ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112a-33: yan lag gi dam pa yongs su gtang ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112b-0: lus thams cad @112b yongs su gtang bar bya ba yang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112b-1: de dag thams cad chos kyi don du yongs su mi gtong ba gang yang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112b-2: bla ma la bsnyen bkur dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112b-3: rim gror bya ba gang yang rung ste nyams su mi len pa gang yang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112b-4: nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su gtang bas nga rgyal med pa la sbyang ba gang yang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112b-5: nyams su mi len pa gang yang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112b-6: lus kyi gnod pa gang yang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112b-7: nyams su mi len pa gang yang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112b-8: de ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshig gcig thos pa nor che bar 'dzin gyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112b-9: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gang ba'i rin po che'i phung po thob pas ni ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112b-10: legs par bshad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig thos pas sems dga' bar 'gyur gyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112b-13: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i srid la bskal pa brgya stong mang po'i mthar thug par gnas pas ni ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112b-14: de la la la zhig brgya la 'di skad du zer te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112b-15: gal te khyod kyis me'i dong chen por lus por te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112b-16: sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'i phung po chen po rang gi lus kyis nyams su blang bar nus na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112b-17: ngas khyod la chos kyi tshig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:112b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su spyad pa 'di bshad par bya'o //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113a-3: me'i dong tha mal pa 'di lta bu zhig tu bdag dor ba lta ci smos kyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113a-4: de bas sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad nyams su bab pas kyang bdag gis chos btsal bar bya'i /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113a-5: me'i sdug bsngal dang 'grogs pa lta khyad du gsad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113a-6: zhes nas de rnam pa de lta bu'i brtson 'grus rtsom pas chos yongs su tshol lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113a-7: ji skad du thos pa'i chos rnams la yang tshul bzhin du rab tu rtog pa'i ngang tshul can yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113a-8: de chos de dag thos nas kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113a-9: rjes la rang gi sems rtog par bzhag pas gcig pu dben pa na 'dug cing 'di ltar rtog go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113a-10: chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du bya bas sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba'i tshig gi lam yongs su dag pa 'ba' zhig gis ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113a-12: byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa la gnas shing 'dod pa rnams las dben /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113b-0: sdig to dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben zhing rnam par rtog pa @113b can; rnam par dpyod pa can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113b-1: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba'i bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113b-2: de rnam par rtog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113b-3: rnam par dpyod pa rnam par zhi ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113b-4: nang shin tu dang zhing sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113b-6: rnam par dpyod pa med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113b-7: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113b-8: bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113b-10: 'phags pa rnams kyis btang snyoms pa dran pa can dga' ba med la bde ba la gnas pa'o zhes bya bar bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113b-12: sdug bsngal yang spangs la bde ba'i yid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113b-13: nyam nga ba'i yid kyang sngar nub pas sdug bsngal yang med /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113b-14: bde ba yang med pa'i btang snyoms dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113b-15: de gzugs su 'du shes pa las rnam pa thams cad du 'das nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113b-16: thogs pa'i 'du shes rnam pa nub ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:113b-17: 'du shes sna tshogs yid la mi byed pas mtha' yas nam mkha' zhes te /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:114a-3: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:114a-5: cung zad kyang med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:114a-17: de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:114a-18: dga' ba dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:114a-19: btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:114b-5: sa 'di yang g-yo bar byed do //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:114b-10: ra ba la thags thogs pa med pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:114b-23: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du yang lus kyis dbang bsgyur te /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:116b-3: yang dag pa'i lta ba'i las rab tu blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:116b-4: shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lhar skye'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:116b-5: de ltar na lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas sems can 'chi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:116b-8: kha dog mi sdug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:116b-10: ngan song du song ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:116b-12: bzang po thams cad sa tshigs dang bcas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:116b-14: dan rtags dang bcas par rab tu mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:116b-15: las ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba'i sems can rnams kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:116b-16: de bsam gtan dang; rnam par thar pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:116b-18: snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang yang gang du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i gnas ma gtogs par de dag gi dbang gis mi skye'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:116b-19: byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:116b-20: de'i lta ba rgya chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:116b-21: smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po snang bar 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:116b-22: lta ba rgya chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:116b-23: smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117a-2: sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117a-3: sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117a-4: sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117a-5: sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya phrag mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117a-6: sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117a-7: sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117a-8: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117a-9: des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong nas bsam pa rgya chen pos rim gro byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117a-17: yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117a-18: dge 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la yang yang dag par mchod pa byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117a-19: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing de dag las rim gror chos nyan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117a-23: thos nas kyang ci tshul du nan tan gyi yang dag par bsgrub ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117b-0: @117b de chos thams cad la 'pho ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117b-2: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pas rab tu lta zhing rtog pas kyang 'dod pa'i bcings pa thams cad bsrabs par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117b-3: srid pa'i bcings pa thams cad bsrabs par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117b-4: ma rig pa'i bcings pa thams cad bsrabs par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117b-5: lta ba las byung ba'i bcings pa rnams ni snga nas kyang byang ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i log pa'i 'dod chags ni bskal pa du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117b-7: bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117b-8: bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117b-9: bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117b-10: bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117b-11: bskal pa khrag khrig phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117b-12: bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117b-13: bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117b-14: bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117b-15: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar spangs shing mi gsog par gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117b-16: log pa'i zhe sdang spangs shing mi gsog par gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117b-17: log pa'i gti mug spangs shing mi gsog par gnas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117b-18: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang yongs su byang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:117b-20: las su rung bar gyur par gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118a-1: de nyid mgar ba mkhas pa'i lag na spyod na srang grangs ci yod pa'i tshad bzhin du 'dug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118a-4: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa 'di la gnas pa'i log pa'i 'dod chags kyang 'grib pa med par 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118a-6: log pa'i zhe sdang yang 'grib pa med par 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118a-7: log pa'i gti mug kyang 'grib pa med par 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118a-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rab tu 'byang zhing yongs su dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118a-10: de bzod pa dang nges pa yang de bas kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118a-11: grogs la bde zhing nges pa'i bsam pa dang; mi 'khrugs pa'i bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118a-12: glong ba med pa'i bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118a-13: rnyog pa med pa'i bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118a-14: mtho dman med pa'i bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118a-15: sems can la phan 'dogs pas lan mi re ba'i bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118a-16: phan btags pa la phyir lan glon pa'i bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118a-17: g-yo med cing sgyu med pa'i bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118a-18: thibs po med pa'i bsam pa yang yongs su dag par 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118a-19: de'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi las don grub pa'i shas che ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118b-0: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shas che @118b ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118b-1: lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi sgrub pa ma yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118b-4: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa zhes bya ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118b-6: de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phal cher lha'i rgyal po'i dbang po 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118b-7: sems can rnams kyi 'dod pa'i 'dod chags rnam par bzlog pa'i thabs nye bar bsgrubs pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118b-11: don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118b-12: de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118b-20: yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118b-21: sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118b-22: chos yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118b-23: dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118b-24: byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118b-25: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang; byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118b-26: pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118b-27: stobs yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:118b-28: mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119a-1: 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119a-2: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119a-3: de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin brgya stong rab tu thob cing de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119a-4: sangs rgyas brgya stong mthong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119a-5: de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong skyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong du 'gro ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong snang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119a-9: sems can brgya stong yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119a-10: bskal pa brgya stong du gnas par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119a-12: phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa brgya stong la rab tu 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119a-13: chos kyi sgo brgya stong rnam par 'byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119a-14: lus brgya stong yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119a-15: lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor brgya stong yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119a-16: de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119b-0: rgyan @119b tam; byin gyi rlabs sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119b-2: mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119b-3: bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119b-4: bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119b-5: bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119b-6: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis bgrang bar dka'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119b-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos don 'di nyid yang brtag pa dang bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119b-8: de dag yon tan 'byung gnas bsam dag sems des pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119b-9: skyo zhing 'dod chags bral te 'tshe med sems dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119b-10: sems bskyed bstan pa dga' ldan rgya chen shugs can rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119b-11: mkhas pa bdag nyid che ba'i sems ldan gsum pa gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119b-12: 'od byed sa phyogs 'di la gnas pa'i mkhas pa ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119b-13: sdug bsngal mi rtag mi sdug rab tu 'jig chos dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119b-14: ring por mi gnas skad cig snying po med par ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119b-15: 'dus byas rnam pa 'ong ba med la rab tu rtog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119b-16: nad du gyur pa mya ngan smre sngags 'don dang bcas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119b-17: gnod dang 'khrug dang sdug dang mi sdug rjes 'brang ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119b-18: sdug bsngal yid blong phung po 'bar ba'i me 'dra bar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119b-19: 'dus byas mtha' yas kun nas 'bar mthong de las skyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:119b-20: srid pa gsum po kun las skyo zhing ltos sems med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120a-1: gshegs ye shes 'dod cing blo gzhan med pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120a-2: bsam du med cing gzhal yas pha rol mtha' yas pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120a-3: rgyal pa'i ye shes gnod med de dag rab tu mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120a-4: de dag sangs rgyas ye shes gnod med mthong gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120a-5: skyabs med mgon dang bral pa rab tu dgrol ba'i phyir //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120a-6: rtag tu dbul zhing me gsum kun nas 'bar gyur dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120a-7: srid pa'i btson rar sdug bsngal sna brgyas sems bskor cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120a-8: nyon mongs bsgribs dang rnam par lta dang 'dod nyams pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120a-9: bde gshegs chos kyi dga' ba stor ba'i byis pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120a-10: 'khor ba'i rgyud du 'bab cing thar pas dngangs gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120a-11: bdag gis bskyabs pa yin zhes brtson 'grus dam du rtsom; ;ye shes 'dod pas ltos pa med par 'gro don byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120a-12: gang rgyus rnam thar lam gyi rgyud ni gang zhes rtog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120a-13: bde gshegs ye shes bsgribs pa med las gzhan med na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120a-14: bde gshegs ye shes de yang shes rab mthus 'byung ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120a-15: shes rab thos las 'byung bar byang chub sems dpa' rtog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120a-16: de ltar shes nas thos don spyad par brtson 'grus rtsom //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120a-17: nyin mtshan nyan pa'i rgyur spyod bya ba gzhan med par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120a-18: chos kyi don gnyer chos la rab tu rten pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-0: nor bu mu tig rin chen tshogs dang @120b mdza' gnyen dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-1: srid longs du ma pho brang phun ldan dam pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-2: chung ma dag dang bu dang mthun par spyod ba'i 'khor //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-3: ltos med sems kyis mkhas pa chos kyi don du gtong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-4: mgo dang rkang lag mig dang de bzhin bdag gi sha /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-5: lce dang mche ba rna ba sna dang khrag rnams dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-6: phangs pa'i rkang dang snying phyung yongs su gtong bar byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-7: 'di ni dka' bar mi rtsi thos pa de dkar rtsi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-8: la la de drung 'ongs shing de skad smrar gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-9: de ste me lce mi bzad 'bar dong mchong phod na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-10: bde gshegs bstan chos rin chen bshad do zhes na yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-11: thos nas mi dma'i yid kyis yon tan don du mchod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-12: chos kyi tshig gcig don du ri rab brtses btags par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-13: stong gsum mes bkang tshangs ris yul nas mchongs gyur kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-14: da dung rgyal ba'i byang chub yangs pa thob dka' na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-15: de ste tha mal mi bdes rnyed 'gyur shin tu bde //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-16: drang srong mchog gi ye shes 'thob 'gyur ji srid pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-17: de srid bar du mnar med sdug bsngal bzod bya na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-18: mi yi sdug bsngal phung po sna tshogs ci smos kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-19: chos rab mnyam pa'i don du bdag gis nyams blang zhes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-20: chos rnams thos par gyur nas tshul bzhin sems par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:120b-21: bsam gtan tshad med de bzhin gzugs med rnam pa bzhi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-1: dam pa lnga po mngon sgrub kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-2: de dag dbang gis skye bar de dag 'gyur ba min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-3: legs ldan 'di gnas sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-4: mchod par byed cing des rtogs yid kyis chos kyang nyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-5: bsrabs par gyur cing log bral yongs su dag par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-6: skyon med gser sbram ji ltar srang la gcal ba bzhin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-7: de gnas yon tan ldan pa lha yi bdag po ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-8: dbang sgyur don byed 'dod pa'i nad kyi rnam pa sel //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-9: lha mang sna tshogs du ma dge ba'i lam la dgod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-10: sangs rgyas yon tan mngon 'dod bsam pa gzhan yang med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-11: 'di la gnas pa'i rgyal sras brtson 'grus rab rtsom ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-12: brgya phrag stong las mi nyung ting 'dzin thob pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-13: mtshan rab sku brgyan sangs rgyas rnams kyang rab tu mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-14: yan chad smon lam rab ldan yon tan bsam mi khyab //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-15: de ltar sa mchog gsum pa 'di //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-16: 'jig rten kun la phan brtson pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i mchog rnams la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-18: rgyal ba'i sras kyis bstan pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-19: 'od byed pa zhes bya ba ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-21: sa mchog dam pa yid 'ong phul gyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-22: spyod pa yangs pa 'di 'dra thos nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121a-23: rgyal sras yid dga' shin tu mgu gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121b-0: rgyal ba la ni @121b me tog mngon 'thor //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121b-1: chos 'di shin tu bstan cing brjod pas //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121b-3: lha yi bu mo yid 'ong snyan pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121b-4: glu yi dbyangs su chos rab dbyangs len //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121b-5: dbang sgyur lha dbang shin tu yid dga'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121b-6: bde gshegs rin chen lha rdzas nor 'thor //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121b-7: don 'grub yon tan pha rol phyin pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121b-8: rgyal ba de tshe gsung rab sgrog mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121b-9: ci phyir zhe na chos kyi dam pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121b-10: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod rab //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121b-11: de ring 'dir thos mkhas pa'i sa de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121b-12: bskal pa brgya yang thos par rab dka'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121b-13: rgyal sras mkhas la spyod pa'i dam pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121b-14: lha dang mi la phan pas yang shod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121b-15: sa don nges pa ma nor lam 'di //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121b-16: lha ma nga 'di dag yid dga' nyan 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121b-17: bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po la //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121b-19: bzhi por yang dag 'bar ba yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121b-20: spyod yul mkhas pas bshad par mdzod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:121b-21: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:122a-11: de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro ba can thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su de'i bdag nyid kyi chos rab tu 'thob pa'i phyir ye shes yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos bcus yang dag par 'byung ba yin /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:126b-10: de 'di ltar las gang bya ba'i mi cha ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis smad pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:126b-12: las gang bya ba'i rigs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:128a-3: des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:128a-4: bsam pa rgya chen pos rim gro byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:128a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:128a-14: dge 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la yang yang dag par mchod pa byed de /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:128a-17: de dag gis chos bstan pa yang rim gror nyan cing len to //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:128a-19: de dag las phal cher de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:128a-20: phyir zhing de'i bsam pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:128b-17: de ma yin pa'i gser gyi sa le sbram gzhan rgyan du ma byas pas mi 'phrogs shing mi thub pa yin /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:129a-0: nor bu rin po che 'od dang @129a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:129a-2: 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:129a-3: snang ba rab tu gtong pa ni de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i rnam pas mi 'phrogs shing mi thub pa yin /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:129b-0: sems can rnams kyi 'jig tshogs la lta ba mang po yang dag par gzhom @129b pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:129b-24: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:129b-25: de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin khrag khrig rab tu thob cing de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:130a-3: bskal pa khrag khrig tu gnas par bya ba dang; sngon gyi mtha' dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:130a-4: phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa khrag khrig la rab tu 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:130a-5: chos kyi sgo khrag khrig rnam par 'byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:130a-6: lus khrag khrig yongs su bstan pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:130a-8: de yan chad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:130a-18: mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:130a-19: bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:130b-0: sa gsum 'od byed pa @130b la shin tu sbyangs byas shing //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:130b-5: ston pa'i rigs su yang dag skyes pas phyir mi ldog /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:130b-7: skye zhing 'jig dang gnas ma byed pa med par lta //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:130b-8: 'jig rten rgyu ba'i las dang byed dang srid skye dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:130b-9: mya ngan 'das 'khor zhing dang sems can rnam par sgom //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:130b-10: sngon dang phyi mtha' zad dang skye med grub pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:130b-11: las la ston pa'i rigs kyi rjes su 'brang zhing sgom //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:130b-12: de dag 'di 'dra'i chos ldan phan dang bder sems pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:130b-13: lus dang dran pa tshor ba sems dang chos sgom ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:130b-14: dran pa nyer gzhag bsgom pa rten pa rnams spangs pa //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:130b-16: yang dag spong ba bzhi la'ang mkhas pa sgom par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:130b-17: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi dang stobs dang dbang po dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:130b-19: de dag kun kyang 'gro la lta ba'i blo sgom ste //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:131a-1: pa go 'phang mchog gi rjes sems shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:131a-2: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas zhing la smon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:131a-3: ston pa'i 'jigs med rnams dang chos rnams 'phrogs med dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:131a-4: sangs rgyas gsung gi mchog la brten pa smon byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:131a-5: rin chen lam zab rnam par thar pa'i gnas rnams dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:131a-6: che ba'i thabs rnams yang dag bsgrub phyir sgom par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:131a-7: 'jig tshogs lta med lta ba drug cu gnyis kyang med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:131a-8: bdag dang bdag gi med cing srog tu dmigs pa med /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:131a-9: phung po skye mched rnams dang khams kyi gnas dang rten //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:131a-10: kun kyang mkhas pas bzhi pa'i sa la rab tu spangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:131a-11: des ni gang dang gang rnams rgyal bas smad mdzad pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:131a-12: las dang nyon mongs bcas pa don du mi 'gyur rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:131a-13: de dag yongs su spangs shing mkhas pa khong nas dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:131a-14: 'gro ba bskyab pa'i don du las rab dge ba brtson //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:131a-19: bla ma rim gror byed dang ldan zhing nan tan brtson //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:131a-20: drin bzo khro ba med cing nga lo bde dang ldan //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136a-7: ldem po dag khong du chud pas rig pa dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136a-8: bdag de gzhan gyi sems rjes su srung bas ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136a-9: sdom pa dang tshul ma bor bas dga' ba dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136a-10: gnas dang gnas pa ma yin pa la mkhas shing shin tu brtags pas blo dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136a-11: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pas ye shes dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136a-12: don dang don ma yin pa'i tshig yang dag par dbye ba la mkhas pas shes rab dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136a-13: bsgom pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pas mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136a-14: 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'brang bas thabs la mkhas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136a-15: bsod nams kyi tshogs nye bar gsog pas ngom mi shes pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136a-16: ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su tshol bas brtson 'grus rgyun mi 'chad pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136b-0: byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i tshogs yang dag par gsog pas @136b skyo ba med pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136b-3: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su tshol bas snyom las med par yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136b-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136b-5: rgyan mngon par shom pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136b-6: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yang dag par bsgrub pas dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs la brtson pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyan yongs su tshol bas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par brtson pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136b-9: chos smra ba thams cad la rim gro byed pas bsnyen bkur dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136b-10: sri zhu chen po'i ngang tshul can yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136b-11: byang chub kyi sems dang thabs mkhas pa chen po'i ngang tshul dang ldan par 'jig rten du rgyu bas khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136b-12: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la mngon par brtson pas nyin mtshan du gzhan du sems pa'i yid yongs su spangs pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136b-13: de de ltar mngon par brtson pas sbyin pas kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:136b-17: gzugs kyi lus kun tu bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid smos pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137a-4: 'khor ba'i nyes pa bstan pa dang; sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yon tan yongs su grags par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137a-6: rnam par 'phrul pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137a-8: thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sbyor bas sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137a-9: de ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mngon par brtson pa dang ldan zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137a-10: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rjes su song ba'i bsam pa can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137a-11: dge ba'i rtsa ba phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137a-12: khyad par can gyi chos yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson pa de gang 'di 'jig rten na yod pa'i yi ge dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137a-17: shod thabs la sogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137a-18: khams kyi cho ga dang; gso ba'i cho ga dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137a-22: dug dang ro langs kyi sbyor ba bsal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137a-27: sgrung gtam la dga' bskyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137a-29: bza' shing gi ra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137b-4: nags tshal mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137b-11: rin po che sh'i la dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137b-13: rin po che rnams kyi 'byung gnas bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137b-20: rmi lam dang ltas bstan pa la 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137b-29: gzugs med pa'i gnas rnams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137b-30: gzhan yang gang sems can la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137b-31: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang; bde bar 'gyur ba yod dgu de dag thams cad 'jig rten la snying brtse bas rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir mngon par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137b-32: byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lta ba rgya chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137b-33: smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po snang bar 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137b-34: lta ba rgya chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137b-35: smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137b-36: sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:137b-37: sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138a-1: bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138a-2: sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138a-3: sangs rgyas khrig khrig brgya phrag mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138a-4: sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138a-5: sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138a-6: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po snang bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138a-7: des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas bsam pa rgya chen pos rim gro byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138a-15: yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo; ;dge 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la'ang yang dag par mchod pa byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138a-16: dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la rim gro byed cing de dag las rim gro dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138a-19: bsti stang du chos bstan pa nyan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138a-22: thos nas kyang ci tshul du nan tan gyis yang dag par sgrub ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138b-0: de dag las phal cher de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bstan pa la rab tu @138b 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138b-1: rab tu byung nas kyang thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa'i chos smra bar 'gyur ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138b-2: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bskal pa du mar shin tu byang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138b-4: 'od rab tu gsal bar gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138b-5: bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138b-6: bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138b-7: bskal pa brgya stong du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138b-8: bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138b-9: bskal pa khrag khrig phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138b-10: bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138b-11: bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138b-12: bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138b-13: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag shin tu byang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138b-15: rab tu 'od gsal bar gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138b-17: gser gyi sa le sbram de nyid rin po che mu sa ra gal bas btab na; de bas kyang yongs su 'tsher ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138b-19: 'od shin tu gsal zhing dang bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:138b-21: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thabs dang shes rab kyis rnam par spyad pa yang de bas kyang shin tu byang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139a-1: rab tu 'od gsal zhing dang ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139a-2: ye shes kyi sbyor ba'i yon tan mngon par bsgrubs pa dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139a-3: mi 'phrogs shing shin tu brtags pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139a-10: rgyu skar gyi gzhal med khang gi 'od snang ba ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis mi 'phrogs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139a-11: rlung dang thun mong du mi spyod pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139a-13: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba 'di la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139a-16: sems kyis shin tu brtags pa dang ldan pa yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139a-17: 'jig rten pa dang thun mong du mi spyod pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139a-18: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shas che ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139a-19: lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su mi sgrub pa ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139a-21: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139a-22: byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa mdor bstan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139a-23: de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phal cher lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan du 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139b-0: sems can thams cad kyi mu stegs @139b kyi gnas thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139b-4: don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139b-5: de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139b-13: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139b-14: sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139b-15: chos yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139b-16: dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139b-17: byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139b-19: byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139b-20: pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139b-21: stobs yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139b-22: mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139b-23: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139b-24: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139b-25: de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin khrag khrig phrag stong rab tu 'thob cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139b-26: de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:139b-27: sangs rgyas khrag khrig phrag stong mthong zhing de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140a-1: rten gyi khams khrag khrig phrag stong skyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag stong du 'gro ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig phrag stong du snang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140a-4: sems can khrag khrig phrag stong yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140a-5: bskal pa khrag khrig phrag stong du gnas par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140a-6: sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi mi'i mtha'i bskal pa khrag khrig phrag stong la rab tu 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140a-7: chos kyi sgo khrag khrig phrag stong rnam par 'byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140a-8: lus khrag khrig phrag stong yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140a-9: lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor khrag khrig phrag stong yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140a-10: de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te de dag gi lus sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140a-20: mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140a-21: bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140a-22: bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140a-23: bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140b-0: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas kyang bgrang @140b par dka'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140b-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140b-2: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140b-3: rgyal ba'i spyod pa bzhi po de ltar rnam sbyangs te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140b-4: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su sems byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140b-5: tshul khrims sems dang nan tan lam rnams rnam dag pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140b-6: nem nur med pa'i mkhas pa lnga pa yongs su gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140b-7: dran pa'i gzhu dang dbang po mda' rno phyir mi ldog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140b-8: yang dag spong ba rta yin gzhon pa rdzu 'phrul rkang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140b-9: stobs lnga go cha dgra rnams kun gyis tshugs mi nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140b-10: dpa' bas mi ldog mkhas pa lnga pa yongs su gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140b-11: ngo tsha khrel yod gos yin mkhas pa'i tshul gtsang spos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140b-12: byang chub yan lag phreng ba byug pa bsam gtan mchog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140b-13: shes rab rnam par dpyang dang thabs mchog rgyan yin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140b-14: bza' shing ra ba ting 'dzin dga' ldan yang dag gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140b-15: rdzu 'phrul bzhi po rkang pa dran pa rnam dag mgrin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140b-16: byams brtse rnam dag mig yin shes rab mche ba mchog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140b-17: bdag med nga ros nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu 'joms //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140b-18: mkhas pa mi yi seng ge sa lnga yongs su gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140b-19: de dag sa mchog lnga pa'i phyogs su phyin gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:140b-20: yongs su dag pa'i lam rnam phyir zhing gong du sbyong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141a-0: bsam dag mkhas pa rgyal ba 'thob @141a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141a-2: skyo ba med par snying rje byams pa'i rjes su sems //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141a-3: bsod nams tshogs bsags de bzhin ye shes rab ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141a-4: sa rnams snang bar bya phyir gcig min thabs rtog cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141a-5: sangs rgyas byin gyis dran dang blo gros blo thob pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141a-6: bden pa bzhi po ma lus yang dag khong du chud //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141a-7: don dam bden pa de bzhin kun rdzob mtshan bden dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141a-8: rnam par dbye ba'i bden pa de bzhin brtag bden dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141a-9: 'byung zhing 'jug dang dngos po bzhi lam bden pa nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141a-10: sgrib med bden pa'i bar du yang dag rab tu rtogs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141a-11: de ltar bden pas yongs su sbyangs pa'i blo phra yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141a-12: rnam thar dam pa sgrib med de ni thob pa min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141a-13: ye shes mos yangs yon tan rnams kyi 'byung gnas te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141a-14: 'gro kun dgra bcom rang rgyal rnams ni zil gyis gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141a-15: de dag bden pas de ltar rang gi blos bsgrubs pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141a-16: 'dus byas rdzun zhing rang bzhin snying po med par shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141a-17: sems can don du bde gshegs ye shes tshol ba'i tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141a-18: bde gshegs thugs brtse byams pa snang ba rab tu 'thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141a-19: 'dus byas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhas pa rab tu lta //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141a-20: gti mug mun gnag mun pas 'khrugs shing sred chags pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141a-21: 'gro rnams sdug bsngal phung po lta ba bdag med cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141b-0: srog @141b bral rtsva shing 'dra ba mngon par sel ba byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141b-1: nyon mongs rjes 'gro 'di dag 'das dang ma 'ongs pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141b-2: sdug bsngal rgyun gcod mthar phyin gzhal bar yong mi byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141b-3: kyi hud 'gro ba de ltar 'khyams zhes snying rje skye //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141b-4: gti mug 'khrul pas 'khor ba'i rgyud du phyir mi ldog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141b-5: phung po'i gnas dang khams sprul lta bu'i zug rngu can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141b-6: mes gdungs yid can sgrib pa'i mun pas bsgribs gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141b-7: don rnams rnam par ma brtags sred pa'i mtshor lhung zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141b-8: rgyal ba'i ded dpon bral ba sdug bsngal rgya mtshor gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141b-9: de ltar rig nas bag yod phyir zhing rab tu rtsom //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141b-10: ci rtsom kun kyang 'gro ba rnam thar don du ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141b-11: phyir zhing dran ldan blo gros rig dang ldan pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141b-12: khrel yod dga' ldan mkhas pa blo ldan shes rab ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141b-13: bsod nams bsags dang ye shes dam pas mi ngoms shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141b-14: rtag tu skyo med le lo med par thos pa tshol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141b-15: zhing sgrub rgyal ba'i mtshan dang sangs rgyas gsung tshol zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141b-16: sems can phan par brtson pa'i bya bas ngoms mi shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141b-17: 'gro ba smin bya'i don du mkhas pas bzo yi gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141b-18: yi ge lag brda grangs dang rtsis dang gso ba'i thabs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141b-19: 'byung po'i gdon dang las rnams sna tshogs bsal ba'i phyir //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:141b-20: snying brtse byams pa'i blo gsal gtsug lag kun la gzhol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142a-0: rang bzo mchog dang gar sdug @142a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142a-2: chu klung ra ba shing tog me tog 'dug gnas dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142a-3: bya ba sna tshogs sgrub byed sems can bde don du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142a-4: rin chen 'byung gnas du ma'ang nye bar ston pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142a-5: sa g-yo nyi zla gza' skar kun kyang de bzhin du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142a-6: sems can yan lag mtshan ma'i dpyad dang rgyal srid gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142a-7: gzugs med bsam gtan mngon shes mchog dang tshad med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142a-8: 'gro la bde dang phan pa'i don 'dod mngon par bsgrub //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142a-9: shin tu rgyal dka' 'di thob shes rab mchog spyod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142a-10: sangs rgyas bye ba mchod byed chos rnams nyan par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142a-11: de dag dge dang bsam pa phyir zhing dag par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142a-12: gser sbram ji ltar mu sar gal bas btab pa bzhin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142a-13: ji ltar bar snang gza' yi rin chen gzhal med khang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142a-14: rlung la rgyu ste 'on kyang rlung gis 'phrogs pa min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142a-15: de ltar 'gro ba'i don spyod 'jig rten chos spyod kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142a-16: ji ltar padmo chus mi chags bzhin 'phrogs pa min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142a-17: 'di la gnas pa dga' ldan dbang po mkhas par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142a-18: mu stegs spyod dang lta ba mang po'i gnas kyang sel //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142a-19: stobs rnams bcu po sems can bskyab par bya'o zhes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142a-20: dge ba de dag rgyal ba'i ye shes don du rtsom //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142a-21: 'di na sa gong du brtson 'grus rtsom byed mthu thob pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-0: khrag khrig @142b bye ba stong gi bde gshegs mchod pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-1: ting 'dzin thob nas khrag khrig zhing yangs mkhas pas bskyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-2: yan chad smon lam khyad par yon tan 'byung gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-3: de ltar sa mchog lnga pa 'di //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-4: thabs kyi rnam pa khrag khrig gis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-5: sems can gtso la yang dag tu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-6: rgyal ba'i sras kyis bstan pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-7: shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba zhes bya ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-9: mkhas pa rnams kyis mchog spyod pa rab thob nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-10: rgyal sras dga' zhing mkha' las me tog char 'bebs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-11: nor bu rin chen rnam dag 'od gsal rgya chen 'byung ba dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-12: bde bar gshegs la mngon 'thor dge zhes rnam par brjod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-13: lha rnams brgya phrag stong grangs dga' zhing bar snang las //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-14: lha rdzas yid 'ong rin chen sna tshogs phye ma'i rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-15: bde bar gshegs la mngon 'thor byug pa phreng ba spos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-16: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan se mo do yang 'bul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-17: lha yi dbang po dbang sgyur lha tshogs mang po dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-18: steng gi nam mkha' la 'khod cing rin chen sprin yangs pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-19: rgyal ba mchod pa'i don du bde bar gshegs la 'thor //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-20: dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyal sras legs zhes rnam par brjod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-21: bar snang gnas las lha yi bu mo stong gis kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-22: glu dbyangs yid 'ong rol mo'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa phyung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:142b-23: sgra rnams kun gyi dbyangs las 'di skad tshig kyang byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143a-0: @143a *// rgyal ba'i gsung ni yid 'ong nyon mongs gdung ba sel //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143a-1: chos rnams thams cad stong zhing dngos zhi mtshan ma med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143a-2: nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs mnyam rnam dag rnam mi rtog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143a-3: 'gro dang gnas las rnam 'das ma lus spros pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143a-4: de bzhin nyid du chos rnams yang dag mnyam mi rtog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143a-5: chos rnams kun la snang ba khong du sus chud pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143a-6: de la dngos dang dngos med g-yo ba gang yang med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143a-7: snying rje brtse bas 'gro ba dgrol phyir brtson pa ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143a-8: de dang de dag rgyal sras chos kyi sku skyes pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143a-9: mtshan ma thams cad spangs shing sbyin pa'i spyad pa spyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143a-10: tshul khrims shin tu sems dam sngon nas zhi zhing dul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143a-11: 'gro ba'i don du chos kyi ye shes ma nyams bzod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143a-12: brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan zhing chos rnams kun gyis dben //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143a-13: nyon mongs bsal cing rnam dag bsam gtan tshul la zhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143a-14: dngos po thams cad snga nas zhi zhing rnam par phye //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143a-15: ye shes spyod dang stobs phyug rtag tu 'gro don brtson //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143a-16: rgyal sras de dag sdig zhi che ba nyid dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143a-17: de skad sgra dbyangs snyan pa stong grangs brjod byas nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143a-18: lha yi bu mo mi smra dad par thub la lta //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143a-19: rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143a-20: thar pa'i zla bas yang smras pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143b-0: sa mchog lnga yi gong ma @143b de; ;rnam pa ci 'dras 'grub par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143b-1: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143b-3: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa la sa'i lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143b-5: de chos mnyam pa nyid bcus 'jug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143b-8: chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143b-9: chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143b-10: chos thams cad mi skye ba mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143b-11: chos thams cad ma byung ba mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143b-12: chos thams cad dben pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143b-13: chos thams cad snga nas rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143b-14: chos thams cad spros pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143b-15: chos thams cad blang ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143b-16: dor ba med pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143b-17: chos thams cad sgyu ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143b-23: sprul pa dang mtshungs pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143b-24: chos thams cad dngos po yod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143b-26: gnyis ka ma yin pa mnyam pa nyid de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:143b-28: chos mnyam pa nyid bcu po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144a-0: de chos thams cad la rang bzhin de 'dra bar rab tu rtog cing spyod @144a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144a-1: pa dang mthun par sems shing mi mthun par mi byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa mthun pa'i bzod pa rnon pos 'thob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144a-2: 'on kyang da dung mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa mngon du gyur pa ni thob pa ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144a-3: de chos thams cad la rang bzhin de ltar rtog pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144a-4: de bas kyang snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang; snying rje chen po la dbang bsgyur bas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144a-10: 'jig rten kun tu rgyu ba'i skye ba ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdag tu mngon par shes pa las 'byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144a-11: bdag tu mngon par zhen pa dang bral na 'byung ba yang med par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144a-12: byis pa'i blo can bdag tu mngon par zhen pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144a-13: mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis bsgribs pa yod pa dang med pa la mngon par mos pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144a-14: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la gzhol ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144a-15: yang dag pa ma yin par rab tu zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144a-16: log pa'i rjes su 'brang ba de dag ni bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'du byed nye bar gsog ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144a-17: 'du byed de dag gis yongs su bsgos pa'i sems kyi sa bon zag pa dang bcas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144a-18: nye bar len pa dang bcas pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144b-2: yang srid pa mngon par 'grub pa 'byung ba nye bar song ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144b-3: las kyi zhing gi gzhi dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144b-4: ma rig pa'i mun pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144b-5: sred pa'i snum dang; nga'i nga rgyal gyis brlan pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144b-6: dra ba rab tu 'phel bas ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu 'byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144b-8: ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu rnam par 'phel nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144b-11: phan tshun 'dus shing phrad pas reg par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144b-12: reg pa 'dus pas tshor ba 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144b-13: tshor ba de'i rjes su mngon par smon pas sred pa 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144b-14: sred pa ni nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144b-15: nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel ba las srid pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro; ;srid pa byung nas phung po lnga po 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144b-16: phung po lnga byung nas lam gyi rgyud lngar rim gyis dengs par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144b-18: dengs shing bral bas mi dga' zhing yongs su gdung bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144b-19: mi dga' ba dang yongs su gdung ba'i rgyus mya ngan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:144b-23: 'khrug pa 'byung bar 'gyur yang de dag las su yang 'byung bar byed pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145a-0: rang bzhin dang lhun gyis grub par 'jig par 'gyur yang de dag la 'jig @145a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145a-1: par byed pa su yang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145a-2: zhes de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lugs su mthun par rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rab tu rtog go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145a-4: bden pa mngon par mi shes pa ni yang dag par ma rig pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145a-5: ma rig pas byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa ni 'du byed rnams so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145a-6: 'du byed la gnas pa'i sems dang po ni rnam par shes pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145a-7: rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig tu skyes pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung po bzhi ni ming dang gzugs so; ;ming dang gzugs rnam par 'phel ba ni skye mched drug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145a-8: dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa gsum phrad pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni reg pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145a-9: reg pa'i rjes las skyes pa ni tshor ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145a-10: tshor ba la chags pa ni sred pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145a-11: sred pa rnam par 'phel ba ni nye bar len pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145a-12: nye bar len pa las byung ba'i las zag pa dang bcas pa ni srid pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145a-13: las dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni skye ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145a-14: skye ba ni phung po 'byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145a-15: phung po yongs su smin pa ni rga ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145a-16: rgas nas phung po 'jig pa ni 'chi ba'o; ;'chi zhing 'bral ba'i tshe myos shing chags par 'gyur ba'i sems la yongs su gdung ba ni mya ngan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145b-0: mya ngan las byung ba'i tshig tu brjod pa ni smre sngags 'don @145b pa'o; ;dbang po lnga'i nyams su bab pa ni sdug bsngal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145b-1: yid kyis lta ba'i nyams su bab ni yid mi bde ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145b-2: sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba mang po byung ba ni 'khrug pa ste; de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145b-3: sdug bsngal gyi sdong po 'ba' zhig byed pa po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145b-4: tshor ba po med pa mngon par grub par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145b-5: de 'di snyam du sems te; byed pa po la mngon par chags pas las rnams yod par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145b-6: gang na byed pa po med pa de na don dam par na las kyang mi dmigs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145b-8: 'di ltar khams gsum pa 'di ni sems tsam ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145b-9: gang 'di srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu phye ste bka' stsal ba de dag thams cad kyang sems gcig la gnas pa dag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145b-11: dngos po gang la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems skyes pa de ni rnam par shes pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145b-13: 'du byed la mgo rmongs pa ni ma rig pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145b-14: ma rig pa'i sems dang lhan cig skyes pa ni ming dang gzugs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145b-15: ming dang gzugs rnam par 'phel ba ni drug gi skye mched do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145b-16: dgru gi skye mchod dang 'brel ba ni reg pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145b-17: reg pa dang lhan cig skyes pa ni tshor ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:145b-18: tshor bas mi ngoms pa ni sred pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:146a-0: sred pas mnar te sdug cing mi gtong ba ni nye @146a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:146a-2: srid pa'i yan lag 'byung ba 'di dag ni srid pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:146a-3: srid pa 'byung ba ni skye ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:146a-4: skye ba yongs su smin pa ni rga ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:146a-5: rga ba dang bral ba ni 'chi ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:146a-6: de la ma rig pa ni bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:146a-7: sems can rnams kyang dmigs pa la rmongs par byed do //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:151a-12: mthun pa'i bzod pa gsum pa rab tu rno ba rab tu skyes pa yin /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:151a-18: sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang /
