K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:151b-3: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po snang bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:151b-4: des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:151b-5: bsam pa rgya chen pos rim gro byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:151b-13: yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:151b-14: dge 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la yang yang dag par mchod pa byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:151b-15: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:151b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing rim gro dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:151b-17: bkur stis nan tan du chos nyan cing len to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:151b-19: thos nas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:151b-20: shes rab dang ye shes kyi snang bas rab tu brtson par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:151b-21: nan tan gyis yongs su 'dzin pas de sngon pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod rab tu thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152a-0: de ltar de byang chub sems @152a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152a-1: dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152a-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152a-3: bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152a-4: bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152a-5: bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152a-6: bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152a-7: bskal pa khrag khrig phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152a-8: bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang; bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152a-9: bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152a-10: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar sngon pas kyang ches byang ba dang; ches 'od gsal zhing dang bar gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152a-14: gser gyi sa le sbram de nyid beed'uryas btab na sngon pas kyang shin tu 'tsher la 'od gsal zhing dvangs par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152a-16: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang shes rab dang ye shes kyis shin tu brtags pas sngon pas kyang shin tu byang la 'od gsal zhing dvangs pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152a-17: phyi phyir zhing yang rab tu zhi bas mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152a-21: zla ba'i 'od ni sems can gyi lus kyang sim par byed la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152b-0: rlung gi dkyil 'khor @152b chen po bzhis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152b-2: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sngon pas kyang sems can du ma'i bsam pa'i nyon mongs pa 'bar ba yang zhi zhing sim par byed la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152b-4: bdud kyi lam gyi rgyud bzhis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152b-5: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152b-6: lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi sgrub pa ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152b-8: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum zhes bya ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152b-10: de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phal cher lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dgar 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152b-11: sems can thams cad kyi lhag pa'i nga rgyal zhi bar bya ba la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152b-12: nyan pa thams cad kyi yongs su dri bas mi 'phrogs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152b-16: don mthun pa sa dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:152b-17: de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153a-2: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la brten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153a-3: sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153a-4: chos yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153a-5: dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153a-6: byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153a-9: pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153a-10: stobs yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153a-11: mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153a-12: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153a-13: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153a-14: de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin khrag khrig brgya stong rab tu 'thob cing de dag la mnyam par gzhog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153a-15: sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong mthong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153a-16: de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153a-17: 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig brgya stong skyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153a-18: sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig brgya stong du 'gro ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153a-19: 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig brgya stong snang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153a-20: sems can khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153a-21: bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153b-0: @153b phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong la rab tu 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153b-1: chos kyi sgo khrag khrig brgya stong rnam par 'byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153b-2: lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153b-3: lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor khrag khrig brgya stong yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153b-4: de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153b-15: mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153b-16: bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153b-17: bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153b-18: bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153b-19: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153b-20: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153b-21: bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153b-22: mkhas pas lam gyi spyod pa lnga por yongs rdzogs nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153b-23: chos rnams mtshan med mtshan nyid med dang ma skyes dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:153b-24: ma byung snga nas yongs su zhi zhing spros med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154a-1: pas ye shes blo can drug pa gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154a-2: chos rnams dben zhing len med rnam par rtog med dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154a-3: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gnyis kyi dngos las rnam grol bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154a-4: chos kyi tshul la 'gal med rjes su mthun byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154a-5: ye shes ldan pa'i dam pa drug pa yongs su gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154a-6: mthun pa rno la gnas shing ye shes stobs ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154a-7: 'jig rten kun gyi 'byung dang 'jig la rab tu rtog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154a-8: gti mug mun pas 'gro ba 'byung ba kun tu bskyed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154a-9: gti mug de nyid bral bas 'byung ba med pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154a-10: rkyen gyi rnam pa don dam stong par rnam pa 'byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154a-11: bya ba mi 'gal rgyu rkyen byed pa mnyam par shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154a-12: yang dag ji bzhin byed pa med par las shes nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154a-13: 'dus byas sprin sdug lta bur byed pa med par shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154a-14: bden pa mi shes de ni yang dag ma rig pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154a-15: las ni sems kyi stobs kyis mgo rmongs byung bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154a-16: sems la rten te lhan cig byung ba ming dang gzugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154a-17: de ltar sdug bsngal phung po chen po'i bar du 'byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154a-18: khams gsum sems kyi rgyu las byung ba der 'jug ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154a-19: srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis 'di dag sems gcig rten //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154a-20: 'dod chags skyes pa de las sems su brjod pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154a-21: de bzhin srid pa'i dngos po sems kyi rnam pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-0: ma rig bya ba @154b gnyis byed rmongs bya'i dngos po la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-1: rmongs par byas shing de nas sems pa'i rgyu yang 'byin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-2: de bzhin rga ba phung po gzhig bya 'jig byed par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-3: de las sdug bsngal ming thogs thams cad mi zad 'byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-4: ma rig rkyen gyis chad par 'gyur ba yod pa min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-5: rnam par chad cing rgyu rkyen bral bas yod pa 'gag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-6: gti mug sred pa nyer len nyon mongs lam yin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-7: las dang srid pa sems pa lhag ma sdug bsngal yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-8: gti mug skye mched bar du 'dus byas sdug bsngal te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-9: reg dang tshor ba de dag sdug bsngal sdug bsngal yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-10: yan lag lhag mar 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal rnam 'phel ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-11: bdag med shes pas sdug bsngal gsum po 'chad par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-12: mun pa sems dang 'dus byas 'di ni sngon bltas yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-13: rnam par shes nas tshor ba'i rgyud du da ltar byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-14: sred dang srid par sdug bsngal 'byung ba phyi ma'i mtha'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-15: 'gags shing zad pa de dag lta ba chad pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-16: gti mug rkyen gyis de dag rnam par 'brel pa 'byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-17: zad pas byang chub rkyen rnams rnam par 'brel pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-18: rgyu las rgyu 'byung med na rgyu yi rgyun chad 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-19: bde phan shes ldan rang bzhin stong pa de ltar rtog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-20: rgyud du mthun pa gti mug mun pas byung ba yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:154b-21: mi mthun bzlog pa gti mug zad pas mi 'byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155a-0: @155a *// zad pa'i rkyen dang de dag yod dang med pa las //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155a-1: gnas pa med blo rnam pa bcur ni de ltar rtog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155a-2: srid pa'i yan lag mtshams dang sems gcig las mthun dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155a-3: ched du mi byed rgyud gsum rjes 'brang sngon mtha' dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155a-4: sdug bsngal gsum dang rgyus byung skye dang 'jig pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155a-5: srid pa'i mthar phyin zad dang rkyen gyi lugs mthun par /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155a-6: ;de ltar rten 'brel 'byung la yang dag 'jug byed pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155a-7: sgyu 'dra yang dag ma yin tshor bar byed med cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155a-8: rmi lam 'dra ba de bzhin mig yor 'dra ba ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155a-9: byis pa slu ba'i smig rgyu rang bzhin mchungs [*mtshungs?] mnyam pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155a-10: de ltar bsgom pa mkhas pa'i stong pa nyid kyi sgo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155a-11: rkyen rnams med pa de ni mtshan ma med pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155a-12: log par shes pas nam yang smon pa med pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155a-13: gzhan du sems can snying brtse'i don du skye ba 'dzin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155a-14: de 'dra'i rnam thar sgo la sgom byed mthu che ba; ;snying brtse ba yi blo ldan sangs rgyas yon tan mngon 'dod cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155a-15: 'dus byas 'dus pa mkhas pa yongs su rtog byed pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155a-16: bsam pa nges shing gcig min legs dang ldan pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155a-17: stong nyid ting 'dzin stong phrag bcu rnams yongs su rgyas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155a-18: de bzhin brtan pa mtshan ma med dang smon med ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-0: shes rab shas che mthun pa'i bzod @155b pa mchog can te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-1: mkhas pa'i rnam thar ye shes chags pa med dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-2: de 'dra'i bsam pas drang srong che mang mchod byed pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-3: rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di la shin tu bsngags pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-4: de ni sangs rgyas mdzod thob khong du chud pas na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-5: bee d'uryas btab gser mdog bzhin du sngon pas gsal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-6: zla ba'i 'od ni 'gro ba'i lus la sim par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-7: rlung bzhi langs pas yongs su 'phrogs par mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-8: rgyal sras 'od kyang bdud kyi lam las shin tu 'das //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-9: nyon mongs yongs su gdung dang sdug bsngal nad kyang sel //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-10: sa 'di phyogs su phyin pa lha yi bdag por 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-11: 'phrul dga'i dam pa lhag pa'i nga rgyal sel la mkhas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-12: ye shes lam dang ldan pa de ni ci rtsom yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-13: nyan thos lam las 'das te brtan zhing mi 'phrogs pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-14: bde gshegs sras po brtson 'grus ldan pa 'dod gyur na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-15: ting 'dzin bye ba brgya stong tshang pa 'thob par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-16: skad cig gcig tu phyogs bcur sangs rgyas mang po lta //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-17: dpyid kyi nyi ma gsal zhing lhan par byed pa bzhin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-18: zab cing blta dka' phra ba ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-19: nyan thos rang rgyal shes mi nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-20: bdag nyid che la sa drug pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-21: rgyal ba'i sras kyis bshad pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-22: mngon sum zhes ni bya ba ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-23: byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa'o ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:155b-24: bam po bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-2: lha tshogs mang po mkha' la gnas shing mngon par mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-3: tshig snyan rnam par rjod pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-4: dga' ba'i dam pa mchog gis yongs su rgyas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-5: dge'o don dam sems mdzad cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-6: yon tan brgya dang yan lag ldan zhing dbang sgyur ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-7: mi yi punda ri ka yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-8: 'gro la phan pa'i spyod rab yang dag bshad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-10: mi yi gtso bo mya ngan yongs su sel mdzad la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-11: dbang phyug chen po mkha' gnas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-12: spos sprin yid 'ong dam pa mngon par 'thor //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-13: tshig snyan rab tu rjod pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-14: lha tshogs mang po mkha' las dgar 'gyur dbyangs sgrog cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-15: gang gis sa bstan 'di thos pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-16: de dag thob pa bzang po thob ces zer //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-17: rol mo brdung dkrol dbyangs snyan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-18: brgya mang lha yi bu mos dga' bar byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-19: bde bar gshegs dang khyod mthu yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-20: tshig rab 'di 'dra rab tu brjod par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-21: zhi dang nges spyod dam pa can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-22: ma dul 'dul mdzad 'jig rten kun gyis mchod byas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-23: 'jig rten kun las 'das pa yi; ;'jig rten spyod pa shin tu phra ba bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-24: sna tshogs lus kyang rab tu bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156a-25: lus dang lus la chos nyid phun sum tshogs shing ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-0: rnam dpyod zhi gnas mthus @156b bcil pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-1: dbyangs su sgrog kyang yi ge brjod mi byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-2: zhing rnams brgyar yang 'dod byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-3: mgon po mchod par 'os la mchod par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-4: zhing rgyal bdag tu 'du shes pa; ;ye shes dbang sgyur mchog gi rab tu sel //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-5: sems can yongs su smin byed kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-6: bdag dang gzhan gyi 'du shes rnam pa kun tu med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-7: dge ba yangs pa yang dag gsog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-8: 'on kyang dge ba gsog la gnas pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-9: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-10: 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'bar bar mthong gyur cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-11: 'du shes thams cad rnam spangs nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-12: snying brtse ldan par brtson 'grus rab tu rtsom //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-13: lha mang lha yi bu mo yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-14: gsung ba'i mchog la mchod byas nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-15: kun kyang mi smra dgar gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-16: drang srong che la lta zhing gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-17: thar pa'i zla bas yang smras pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-18: 'khor rnams shin tu rnam par dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-19: sa bdun pa yi rnam pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-20: rgyal ba'i sras kyis bshad pa mdzod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-21: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-23: byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la de ltar sa'i lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-24: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa yongs su gnon to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:156b-25: de thabs dang shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i lam brtsam pa'i khyad par bcus yongs su gnon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157a-5: smon ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa'i yid dang yang ldan la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157a-7: ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yang yang dag par gsog pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157a-10: gang zag med pa'i chos la'ang rab tu 'jug la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157a-11: tshad med pa bzhi mngon par sgrub pa yang yongs su mi gtong ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157a-12: bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis shin tu mtho ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub pa'ang mngon par sgrub la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157a-13: chos gang la yang mngon par chags pa med pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157a-14: khams gsum pa las dben par gyur pa'ang thob la khams gsum pa bsdu ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157a-15: rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa'ang mngon par sgrub pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157a-16: nyon mongs pa 'bar ba thams cad shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157a-17: nye bar zhi ba yang yin la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157a-18: sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157a-21: nyon mongs pa'i me lce rab tu zhi bar mngon par bsgrub pa'ang mngon par sgrub pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157a-24: mi yor dang; sgra brnyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157a-27: sprul pa'i rang bzhin lta bur yod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157b-0: gnyis ka ma yin pa thams cad kyang khong du chud @157b la; las dang bya ba rnam par phye ba tshad med pa'i bsam pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157b-1: zhing gi tha gru nam mkha' dang mnyam par shin tu bsgoms pa'i yid dang ldan la; sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong zhing bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157b-2: rgyan kyang mngon par sgrub pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157b-3: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157b-5: sku nam mkha' lta bur yang rab tu 'jug la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157b-8: dpe byad bzang po bsdu zhing rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rang bzhin gyis zhi zhing brjod du med pa'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par yang yid ches la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157b-10: sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par phye ba'i rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis skad cig gcig tu dus gsum thugs su chud par yang khong du chud la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:157b-12: dus dang bskal pa'i grangs mtshan nyid tha dad pa la'ang sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par bsgom pa'i phyir rjes su 'jug pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158a-0: thabs dang shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i lam brtsam pa'i khyad par 'di bcus byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas pa sa bdun yongs su @158a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158a-3: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi tshogs thabs dang shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i khyad par snang bar gyur pa 'di dag mngon par bsgrubs pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun yongs su gnon ces bya ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158a-4: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi khams tshad med pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158a-6: 'dul ba'i 'phrin las tshad med pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams mang po tshad med pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158a-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158a-9: chos tha dad pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes mngon par 'tshang rgya ba tshad med pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158a-11: bskal pa'i grangs tshad med pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158a-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dus gsum thugs su chud pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158a-13: sems can gyi mos pa'i khyad par tshad med pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158b-0: @158b sku sna tshogs ston pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158b-1: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158b-2: dbang po tha dad pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung brjod pas sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158b-4: sems can rnams kyi sems dang spyod pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158b-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes 'byams klas pas thugs su chud pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158b-6: nyan thos kyi theg pas 'byung ba la mos pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi lam shin tu bstan pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa tshad med pa la 'jug cing mos par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158b-8: rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag par bsgrub pa shin tu rdzogs par bya ba tshad med pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes zab mo'i sgor 'jug pa bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jug go ;byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sbyor ba tshad med pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:158b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi theg pa chen po yang dag par bsgrub pa la 'jug pa shin tu bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @159a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159a-1: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni de ltar tshad med pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159a-2: de ni bskal pa brgya phrag khrag khrig dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159a-3: bskal pa stong phrag khrag khrig dang; bskal pa brgya stong phrag khrag khrig nas de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis kyang bgrang bar dka' ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod yul de bdag gis lhun gyis grub par bsgrub par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159a-6: rnam par rtog pa med par yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes de de ltar shin tu brtags pa'i ye shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159a-7: mngon par shes pa dang ldan zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159a-8: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par brtson pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su bsgoms pa'i lam gyi tshogs rgya chen po'i ye shes la mi g-yo ba'i tshul gyis yongs su gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159a-9: de skad cig gcig tu yang lam mngon par bsgrub pa las ldang bar mi byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159a-10: de 'gro yang de lta bu'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159a-14: rmi lam dag tu yang sgrib pa med cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159a-15: spyod lam thams cad la gnas kyang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'du shes yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159a-16: de'i sems bskyed pa re re la yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu @159b phyin pa bcu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yang dag par bsgrub pa yang dag par 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159b-3: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de snying rje chen po sngon du btang ba'i sems bskyed pa byung ba re re zhing yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159b-4: sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi don du yongs su bsngo bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159b-6: de la gang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su tshol zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159b-7: sems can rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gtong ba 'di ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;gang nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi ba 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159b-8: gang snying rje dang byams pa sngon du 'gro bas sems can thams cad la 'tshig pa med pa 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159b-9: gang gong nas gong du dge ba'i chos tshol pas mi ngoms par dam 'cha' ba 'di ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159b-10: gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon du bya ba'i phyir 'gyod pa med pa'i lam dang ldan pa 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:159b-11: gang rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa mngon du gyur pa 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160a-0: gang ye shes tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di ni de'i @160a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160a-1: thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160a-2: gang gong nas gong du ye shes la dmigs shing mngon par bsgrub pa 'di ni de'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160a-3: gang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160a-4: bdud kyi tshogs thams cad kyis lam yongs su mi chod pa 'di ni de'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160a-5: gang chos thams cad la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa 'di ni de'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160a-7: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po de dag de ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160a-8: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160a-10: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160a-11: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160a-12: mdor bsdu na byang chub kyi yan lag gi chos thams cad skad cig skad cig tu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160a-13: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160a-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160a-16: ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di @160b la gnas pa 'ba' zhig gis byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad skad cig skad cig tu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ram /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160b-2: sa bcu po thams cad la'ang de bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160b-3: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160b-5: sa bcu po kun la yang byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad skad cig skad cig tu yongs su rdzogs par lta 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la ni de dag pas lhag par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di ni nan tan du bya ba'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ye shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160b-10: mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su gnon pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la ni smon lam thams cad la lhag par dmigs pas byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160b-14: gnyis pa la sems kyi dri ma thams cad gsal bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160b-15: gsum pa la smon lam rnam par 'phel ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160b-16: chos kyi snang ba thob pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160b-17: bzhi pa la lam la 'jug pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:160b-18: lnga pa la 'jig rten gyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161a-0: drug pa la chos zab mo'i sgor 'jug pas byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad @161a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161a-1: yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te; byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pas byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad skad cig skad cig tu yongs su grub par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nas bzung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa'i bar du byang chub sems dpas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa'i sbyor ba'i yan lag de dag byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa yan chad lhun gyis grub par yongs su 'grub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161a-8: kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161a-9: shin tu dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar ni smon lam dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161a-12: mngon par shes pa'i stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161a-13: shugs chen po ma gtogs par 'dod 'dod brgal bar mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161a-15: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'dres pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161a-16: yongs su dag pa'i bar yang smon lam dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161a-21: shugs chen po ma gtogs par 'dod 'dod brgal bar mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161b-0: byang @161b chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161b-2: 'o na ci byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun rnams la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nyon mongs pa'i spyod pas kun nas nyon mongs par yid ches par bya ba yin nam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161b-4: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po rab tu dga' ba nyid bzung ba yan chad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i dbang gis nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa dang bral bar gar 'os pa'i tshul gyis lam mnyam pa nyid kyis yid ches par bya ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161b-7: de tsam gyis sa bdun po rnams su nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa las yang dag par 'das zhes mi bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161b-11: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ni lha rdzas kyi glang po rin po che la zhon zhing gling bzhi dag tu 'ang 'gro /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161b-14: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa rnams kyang rab tu shes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161b-15: 'on kyang nyes pa de dag gis gos par mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161b-16: de tsam gyis mi'i lus las yongs su 'das pa'ang ma yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161b-17: nam mi'i lus spangs te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur pa de'i tshe ni tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang na gnas shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:161b-18: stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang mthong /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162a-1: brnyan yang kun tu ston te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162a-2: mi zhes kyang mi brjod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162a-5: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po bzung ba yan chad /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa la zhon zhing 'gro ba thams cad du rgyu ba'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162a-7: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa rnams kyang rab tu shes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162a-8: yang dag pa'i lam du zhugs pas kun nas nyon mongs pa de dag gis gos par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162a-9: 'on kyang de tsam gyis sa bdun po rnams la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162a-10: nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa rnams las yang dag par 'das zhes ni mi bya ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162a-11: nam sbyor ba can gyi spyod pa thams cad spangs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162a-12: sa bdun po nas sa brgyad pa yongs su non par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yongs su dag pa la zhon zhing 'gro ba thams cad du rgyu ba'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162a-14: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa thams cad kyang rab tu shes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162a-15: 'jig rten gyi bya ba kun las 'das pas nyes pa de dag gis kun nas nyon mongs par gyur ces mi bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa mang po thams cad las kyang shin tu shas che bar 'da' ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyon mongs pa can zhes kyang mi @162b bya; nyon mongs pa med pa zhes kyang mi bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162b-2: nyon mongs pa thams cad rgyu ba med pas nyon mongs pa can zhes mi bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mngon par 'dod cing bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs pas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes kyang mi bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162b-4: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162b-5: lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pas ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162b-6: lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162b-7: de ni 'di ltar mi dge ba'i las kyi lam de bzhin gshegs pas smad pa kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa de dag las thams cad kyi thams cad du yang dag par 'das pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162b-8: gang 'di dag dge ba'i lam yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa de dag gi rjes su rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'brang ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162b-9: gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa la bzo'i gnas dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162b-10: las kyi gnas ji ltar mngon par bsgrubs pa de dag thams cad kyang lhun gyis grub pa rab tu 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162b-11: de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na slob dpon du bya ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:162b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa yan chad kyi @163a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163a-1: byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par su yang de dang bsam pa'am sbyor bas mnyam pa med de; 'di ltar yang gang 'di dag bsam gtan rnams dang; ting nge 'dzin dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163a-3: mngon par shes pa dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163a-4: rnam par thar pa rnams kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du bsgom pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo'i tshul gyis mngon du 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163a-5: 'on kyang da dung byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa la ji ltar de bzhin du ni rnam par smin pas yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163a-6: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa thams cad la shes rab dang thabs dang bsgom pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163a-7: sngon pas kyang byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163a-8: de de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par dbye ba shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba la mnyam par gzhog ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin don shin tu bsam pa zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163a-11: khyad par gyi blo gros zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163a-12: rab tu phye ba'i don gyi mdzod ces bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163a-13: chos ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163b-0: rtsa ba shin tu gnas pas @163b bstan pa zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163b-1: ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i sgo zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163b-2: chos kyi dbyings yongs su sbyangs pa zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba dang; don sna tshogs kyi mdzod 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo zhes bya ba la yang mnyam par gzhog ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163b-4: de dag la sogs pa mngon par shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163b-5: ye shes chen po sgo'i ting nge 'dzin sa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba la snyoms par 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163b-6: de thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su sbyang ba'i ting nge 'dzin de dag rab tu thob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163b-7: snying rje dang snying brtse ba'i mthus nyan thos kyi sa las 'das pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163b-8: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163b-9: shes rab dang ye shes kyis rnam par dpyad pa'i sa mngon sum du gyur pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163b-10: de ltar de byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163b-11: lus kyi las tshad med pa mtshan ma dang bral bar rab tu 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163b-12: ngag gi las tshad med pa mtshan ma dang bral ba rab tu 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163b-13: yid kyi las tshad med pa mtshan ma dang bral ba shin tu rnam par sbyangs pa mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pas snang bar gyur pa tshad med pa rab tu 'byung ngo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163b-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:163b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas pa'i tshe'ang byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164a-0: @164a *// ngag dang yid kyi las tshad med pa nyan thos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164a-1: rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa las yang dag par 'das na ci rob /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164a-2: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164a-6: de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la dmigs pa'i mthur zad kyi rang gi blos rnam par dpyad pa ni ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la ni rang gi blo'i spyod yul rnam par dpyod pa rab tu thob pas nyan thos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164a-8: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164a-13: rgyal po'i rigs su skyes pa'i rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa ni btsas ma thag tu rgyal po'i byin gyis blon po'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon gyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164a-14: rang gi blos rnam par dpyad pas ni ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164a-15: nam nar son par gyur pa de'i tshe rang gi blo'i mthus blon po thams cad kyi byed pa'i tshul las shin tu 'das pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164a-17: rgyal ba'i sras; de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'ang sems bskyed ma thag tu lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bdag nyid chen pos nyan thos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164a-18: rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164a-19: rang gi blos rnam par brtags pas ni ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rang gi yul gyi ye shes kyi stobs kyis shugs @164b kyis nyan thos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164b-1: rang sangs rgyas kyi byed pa'i tshul las shin tu 'das pa yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164b-4: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164b-5: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las zab cing dben la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164b-6: rgyu ba med pa dang ldan pa'ang rab tu thob pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164b-7: khyad par gong du btsal ba'i brtson 'grus kyang yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164b-8: yongs su btsal ba'i brtson 'grus des kyang yang dag pa'i mthar gnas pa la'ang khyad par gong ma shin tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du'ang mi byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164b-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i sa gang yan chad du byang chub sems dpa'i 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164b-13: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164b-16: byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa yan chad byang chub sems dpa'i 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164b-17: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems skad cig re re la yang 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164b-18: 'gog pa mngon du byas zhes ni mi bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:164b-19: de bas na de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dang ldan zhes bya ba yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165a-1: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pas kyang gnas la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165a-2: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang mi byed pa ni ngo mtshar che'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165a-7: mi la la zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru chen por zhugs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165a-8: rgal ba'i thabs la mkhas shing rlung la mkhas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165a-10: rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i nyes pas mi gos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165a-13: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas shing pha rol tu phyin pa'i gru chen por zhugs pa yang yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pas kyang gnas la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165a-15: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang mi byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165a-16: de ltar de ye shes kyi stobs dang shugs thob pa ni ting nge 'dzin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165a-17: ye shes kyi stobs dang shugs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i blo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165a-18: thabs dang shes rab kyi stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165a-19: shugs chen pos 'khor pa'i sgo yang ston la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165a-20: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pa dang yang mi 'bral ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165a-21: 'khor mang pos kun nas bskor bar snang yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems kyi dben pa'ang rab tu thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165a-22: khams gsum du skye ba yang smon lam gyi dbang gis mngon par sgrub la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165a-23: 'jig rten gyi nyes pas kyang mi gos pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165b-0: zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba yin @165b la; thabs kyis rab tu 'bar te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165b-1: de ltar 'bar yang tshig par mi 'gyur ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165b-2: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la'ang yongs su 'jug la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165b-3: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las kyang phyir mi ldog pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165b-4: sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthil du yang phyin la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165b-5: bdud kyi yul na'ang 'dug par snang ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165b-6: bdud kyi lam bzhi las kyang yang dag par 'das la bdud kyi yul dang spyod yul yang yang dag par ston pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165b-7: mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad na'ang 'dug par snang la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165b-8: sangs rgyas kyi mu stegs kyi gnas kyi bsam pa yang mi gtong ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165b-9: 'jig rten gyi bya pa thams cad dang yang ldan par snang la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165b-10: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul la yang yang dag par gzhol ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:165b-22: 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad las lhag pa'i rgyan dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:168a-6: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas par bya ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:168b-7: mkhas pas sa bdun spyod pa dam pa yongs su gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:168b-8: stong pa mtshan med mi smon snying rje byams dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:168b-9: chos nyid mnyam pa'i rjes 'gro sangs rgyas mchod par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:168b-10: shes pas shes byas bsod nams stobs kyis mi ngoms pas //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:168b-12: khams gsum mngon par sgrub byed shin tu dben pa thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:168b-13: nyon mongs stobs rnams zhi zhing 'gro ba zhi la mos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:168b-14: mig yor sgyu ma rmi lam mi gnyis chos spyod kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:168b-15: snying rje las spyod ston pa mkhas pas bdun pa gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:168b-16: nam mkha'i bsam pas zhing rnams yongs spyod rnam mi rtog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:168b-17: rgyal ba'i mtshan dang ldan zhing mi g-yo chos dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:168b-18: brjod pa'i dbyangs bral 'gro ba dgar bya don du gnyer //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:168b-19: skad cig sems kyi rgyal bas kun mkhyen yang dag gzhol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169a-1: dag spyad pas snang ba thob gyur pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169a-2: 'gro ba'i don 'dod sa mchog yongs su mnan ces bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169a-3: de dag sa 'dir gnas shing mtha' yas sems can spyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169a-4: bde gshegs tshad med las mkhyen rnam par spyod pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169a-5: zhing dang bskal pa chos grangs sna tshogs du ma dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169a-6: mos dang bsam pa sems dang spyod pa sna tshogs dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169a-7: theg pa gsum po bstan pa tshad med yang dag 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169a-8: bdag gis sems can de dag yongs su smin bya zhes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169a-9: de dag de ltar rnam phye shes rab lam ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169a-10: spyod lam bzhi por mngon par brtson zhing thabs dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169a-11: sems kyi skad cig kun la byang chub yon tan sgrub //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169a-12: pha rol phyin pa bcur 'jug yongs su rdzogs par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169a-13: sems skyes 'gro la yongs bsngo de ni sbyin pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169a-14: tshul khrims nyon mongs zhi ba bzod pa mi 'tshig pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169a-15: brtson 'grus de nas khyad par gong du rtsom pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169a-16: lam las mi sgul de ni legs ldan bsam gtan no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169a-17: mi skye'i bzod pa rdul med mkhas pa'i shes rab mchog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169a-18: da dung mngon 'dod bsngo ba de yi smon lam ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169a-19: mi thub stobs yin shin tu rtogs pa ye shes so; ;de ltar byang chub yon tan thams cad skad cig ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169a-20: dang por dmigs pas yon tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-0: gnyis la dri ma bsal phyir gsum la bgegs @169b bsal bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-1: bzhi la lam gyis lnga la mnyam pa nyid kyis te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-2: mi skye'i snang bas mkhas pa'i drug pa rnam par 'phel //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-3: bdun pa 'dir phyin yon tan mtha' dag kun rdzogs par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-4: smon lam du ma sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-5: ci phyir zhe na ye shes spyod pa 'dir grub pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-6: de ni brgyad pa yan chad kun tu rnam dag 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-7: 'da' dka' phyin dka' ye shes mang po'i las kyis 'grub //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-8: zhing gnyis bar mtshams ji ltar yongs su brgal dka' bzhin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-9: bdun la spyod pa rgyal po chags med ji bzhin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-10: lam la gnas pa yin gyi thams cad brtan ma 'das //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-11: brgyad pa'i ye shes sa dang gang tshe ldan gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-12: de tshe sems kyi yul 'das ye shes las la gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-13: tshangs pa 'gro ba lta yang mi yi bdag nyid min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-14: de bzhin mkhas pa pad mo bzhin du mi chags spyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-15: 'di la gnas pa nyon mongs sna tshogs rab tu 'da'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-16: de dag nyon mongs spyod med byang ba'ang thob pa min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-17: lam la gnas kyang de 'dra'i nyon mongs spyod med min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-18: rgyal ba'i ye shes mngon 'dod de bas zad pa min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-19: 'jig rten bzo dang las gnas rnam pa sna tshogs dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-20: mkhas pas gtsug lag rgyus la gnas te shes byas dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-21: bsam gtan mngon shes stobs sgom ldan par gyur pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:169b-22: de bas gsal 'gyur ting 'dzin sna tshogs mngon par sgrub //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-0: nyan thos rang rgyal spyod las yongs @170a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-2: bdun pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la mkhas pa gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-3: sngon chad bsam pas yin gyi 'di la ye shes kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-4: nar son mthu dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i bu bzhin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-5: shin tu zab dang ldan pas gong du rtsom byed de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-6: 'gog pa'i sems dang ldan yang mngon par mi byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-7: ji ltar rgya mtshor phyin cing gru chen zhugs gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-8: chu tshul thams cad mngon gyur gru la skyon mi gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-9: de dag sngon pas thabs dang shes rab mchog dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-10: shes dka' 'gro ba kun tu shes spyod yon tan mang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-11: sangs rgyas bye ba mang du bsam pa dag pas mchod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-12: gser sbram de nyid rin chen mang pos smras pa bzhin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-13: 'di la gnas pa'i mkhas pa'i shes rab mchog gi 'ong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-14: sred pa'i chu rnams ji ltar nyi bzhin yongs su skem //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-15: sa mchog 'di la gnas pa dbang sgyur rgyal por 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-16: ye shes dam pa'i 'bras bu ston la mthu yod mkhas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-17: 'dod na brtson 'grus dam pa'i stobs dang ldan gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-18: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshang bdag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-19: phyogs rnams kun tu shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas mthong /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-20: yan chad smon lam yon tan mchog can tshad kyang med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-21: 'di ni sa mchog bdun pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-22: rang rgyal dbang la spyod pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170a-23: 'jig rten kun gyis shes par dka'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-0: thabs dang @170b shes rab sbyor ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-1: ring du song ba zhes bya ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa'o ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-4: mkhas pa'i spyod pa de 'dra dam pa thos nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-5: lha yi tshogs dang lha yi dbang po kun dga'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-6: byang chub sems dpa' 'gro phan brtson pa mang po //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-7: bde bar gshegs dang rgyal sras rnams la mchod byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-8: me tog phreng ba rgyal mtshan ba dan yid 'ong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-9: spos dang phye ma rin chen na bza' rgyan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-10: dbyig gis spras pa'i gdugs rab khrag khrig du ma //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-11: phreng ba'i sprin gyi dam pa'i char yang mngon 'bebs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-12: lha yi bu mos yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-13: du ma'i sil snyan gar gyi mchog dang ldan byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-14: bde bar gshegs dang rgyal sras mchod pa'i don du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-15: thub pa'i yon tan rmad du byung brjod byed; ;thams cad gzigs pa rkang gnyis khyu mchog gtso bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-16: sangs rgyas spyod yul 'gro la phan phyir ston mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-17: dbyangs sprin yid du 'ong ba rab tu 'byung ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-18: rnga dang sil snyan sna tshogs rnams la 'di byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-19: skra yi rtse la bde gshegs brgya phrag stong snyed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-20: gangg'a khrag khrig bye ba'i rdul bas de mang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-21: zhing mchog dam pa mnyam pa med pa dag na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-22: khyu mchog rnams ni rdul bral chos rnams ston mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-23: spu gcig rtse la 'byams klas dam pa'i zhing mang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:170b-24: gling bzhi du ma rgya mtsho mtsho chen kun nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-0: khor yug bye ba de bzhin ri rab @171a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-2: so so'i tshul dang ldan par kun kyang snang gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-3: skra yi rtse mo de la 'gro rgyud drug po //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-4: yi dvags byol song mi dang sems dmyal lha dang; ;gnod sbyin srin po klu dang lha min mang po //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-5: sna tshogs las kyi yul la kun kyang spyod byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-6: rdul bral kun gyi zhing gi spyod yul kun tu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-7: 'khor lo dam pa'i mchog kyang de tshe 'khor gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-8: 'gro ba'i 'du shes sems dang de bzhin spyod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-9: bde gshegs gsung gi dam pa kun kyang bstan byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-10: sems can lus la bde gshegs zhing mar sna tshogs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-11: zhing la sems can rmad snyed lus kyang de bzhin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-12: lha dang mi yi lam rgyud de bzhin sna tshogs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-13: mkhyen nas bde bar gshegs pa chos rnams kun ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-14: shin tu yangs pa'i zhing la 'du shes phrar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-15: rdul gyi mtshan ma dag la 'du shes yangs gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-16: de la sogs pa bde bar gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-17: 'jig rten kun gyis brjod kyang zad par mi 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-18: che ba nyid dbyangs de skad du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-19: snyan pa'i dbyangs su grag gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-20: 'khor rnams rab tu dga' zhing zhi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-21: gsung ba'i mchog la lta zhing gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-22: 'khor rnams zhi bar shes gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-23: rnam grol zla bas yang smras pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-24: sa brgyad pa yi rnam pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171a-25: de lta 'jug pa bstan par mdzod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171b-0: byang chub sems @171b dang 'a rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171b-2: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas pa thabs dang shes rab kyis lam shin tu sbyangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171b-4: smon lam chen po shin tu btab pa'i stobs dang shugs can de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin tu brlabs pa rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang shugs thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171b-7: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171b-9: lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171b-10: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis mngon par 'phags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171b-11: snying rje dang snying brtse ba chen pos sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171b-12: ye shes kyi lam tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba de chos thams cad thog ma nas ma byung ba nyid la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:171b-20: dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172a-0: de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la'ang @172a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172a-1: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172a-2: des rnam pa thams cad du sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172a-4: rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172a-5: 'du shes dang bral zhing thogs pa med la nam mkha' dang 'dra zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172a-6: nam mkha'i rang bzhin du khong du chud pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ces bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172a-7: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag de la de lta bu'i bzod pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i gnas zab mo shes par dka' ba tha mi dad pa mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172a-9: 'du shes kyi bgegs thams cad las phyir log pa tshad med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172a-10: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa dben pa thams cad mngon du gyur pa shin tu thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172a-14: dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172a-15: sems can thams cad la dbang thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172a-16: mthar gyis 'gog pa'i bar du mnyam par bzhag pa ni rgyu ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172a-18: g-yo ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172a-19: 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172a-21: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mi g-yo ba 'di thob ma thag tu ched du bya ba thams cad dang bral te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172b-0: lhun gyis grub pa'i chos @172b nyid thob cing lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172b-2: sems kyi rtsol ba thams cad dang bral te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172b-3: shin tu dben pa'i chos nyid la gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172b-7: mi la la zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du bdag chu klung chen pos khyer ba snyam byed la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172b-8: de de nas ci phyin du 'bad cing rtsol ba chen po rtsom rtsom pa las de 'bad cing rtsol ba chen po de nyid kyis sad par gyur na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172b-9: de sad ma thag tu 'bad cing rtsol ba thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172b-11: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i chu klung chen po bzhir sems can mang po dod bar shes nas 'bad cing rtsol ba yongs su rtsom mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172b-12: de brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba 'di thob ma thag tu ched du bya ba thams cad bral ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172b-13: de'i gnyis po rgyu ba 'am mtshan ma rgyu ba dag kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172b-17: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes shing gnas pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172b-18: 'dod pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su mi rgyu ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:172b-20: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173a-0: rnam par shes pa'i yongs su rgyu ba rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du @173a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173a-1: yongs su mi rgyu ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173a-2: de sangs rgyas la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173a-3: byang chub la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173a-4: byang chub sems dpa' la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173a-5: rang sangs rgyas la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173a-6: nyan thos la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173a-7: mya ngan las 'das pa la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173a-8: dgra bcom pa la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173a-9: phyir mi 'ong ba la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173a-10: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173a-11: rgyun du zhugs pa la yongs su rgyu ba yang yongs su mi rgyun 'jig rten pa'i yongs su rgyu ba yongs su mi rgyu ba lta ci smos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173a-13: de ltar mi g-yo ba'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs dang shugs la gnas pa de'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyud de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173a-14: de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173a-18: sangs rgyas kyi chos rjes su rtogs par bya ba la 'di ni don dam pa'i bzod pa yang yin na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173a-23: sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa de khyod la med kyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173a-24: sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa de dag yongs su btsal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsoms shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173a-25: bzod pa'i sgo 'di nyid kyang ma gtong zhig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173b-2: khyod kyis de ltar zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa thob kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag zhi ba ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173b-3: rab tu zhi ba ma yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173b-4: nyon mongs pa sna tshogs yongs su rgyu bar gyur na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173b-5: de ltar rnam par rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su mnar ba la soms /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173b-7: rigs kyi bu khyod kyi sngon gyi smon lam sems can gyi don yongs su 'grub par bya bar btab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173b-8: ye shes kyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dran par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173b-11: 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173b-15: chos kyi gnas nyid 'di ni de bzhin du 'dug pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173b-16: 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyi tshe brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173b-17: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos nyid 'di 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173b-18: rigs kyi bu khyod nged kyi lus tshad med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173b-19: ye shes tshad med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173b-20: sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173b-21: ye shes mngon par bsgrubs pa tshad med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173b-22: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173b-23: dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa tshad med pa la ltos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173b-24: khyod kyis kyang de bzhin tu mngon par bsgrub par bya dgos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:173b-27: gang de ltar chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa de ni khyod kyi snang ba gcig pur zad de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174a-1: bu; de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos snang ba ni 'di 'dra ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174a-2: yongs su mtha' yas par song la yongs su mtha' yas par bsgrubs pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174a-3: de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis kyang bgrang bar dka'/
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174a-4: de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub pa skyed cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174a-7: phyogs bcu'i zhing tshad med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174a-8: sems can tshad med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174a-9: chos rnam par phye ba tshad med pa la ltos te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174a-10: de dag thams cad ma nor bar bgrang bar gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174a-12: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag; de ltar de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo de dag la sogs pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rnam par phye ba'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa'i las tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174a-13: gzhal du med pa dag nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174a-15: khyed kyis yid ches pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174a-16: khong du chud par bya na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174a-17: gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgor gzhug pa mdzad du zin na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174a-18: de nyid de'i mtha' las brgal ba'i mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174a-19: sems can thams cad kyis dgos pa'ang rgyun bcad par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174b-0: de ltar sangs rgyas @174b bcom ldan 'das de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' de la ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i las gang gis skad cig gcig tu mngon par bsgrubs pas kyang thog ma sems bskyed pa phyin chad sa bdun la zhugs shing rjes su song ba yongs su rtsom pa'i bar snga ma de dag gis brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174b-4: khrag khrig stong gi cha dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174b-5: khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174b-6: bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174b-11: rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174b-12: bsgrun pa tsam gyi bar du'ang mi chog pa de snyed du tshad med pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa las nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174b-15: sngon chad lus gcig gis mngon par bsgrub pas spyod pa mngon par bsgrub par gyur gyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174b-16: 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus rnam par phye ba tshad med pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174b-17: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i mthu yongs su sdud de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174b-18: dbyangs mngon par bsgrub pa tshad med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174b-19: ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa tshad med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174b-20: skye ba mngon par bsgrub pa tshad med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174b-21: zhing yongs su sbyong ba tshad med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:174b-22: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:175a-0: sangs rgyas mchod cing bsnyen bkur @175a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:175a-2: chos kyi tshul khong du chud pa tshad med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:175a-3: mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs dang shugs tshad med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:175a-4: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa rnam par phye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:175a-5: tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba'i lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:175a-7: yid kyi las kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi mthu mi sgul ba'i tshul gyis yang dag par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:175a-11: rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'i gru ni rgya mtsho chen por ma phyin gyi bar du ched du bskyod cing 'gro bar bya ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:175a-12: rgya mtsho chen po la zhen ma thag tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bsu bas ched du bskyod mi dgos pa yin /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:179b-25: las kyi rnam par smin pa'i byin gyi rlabs dus bzhin du ma nor bar bstan pa'i phyir las kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo //
