K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180a-9: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180a-10: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180a-11: mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir ye shes kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180a-12: mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir chos kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180a-13: de byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bcu po 'di dag thob ma thag nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180a-14: tshad med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180a-15: yangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180a-16: mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180a-17: des de lta bu rjes su song zhing de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180b-0: ngag gi @180b las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180b-1: yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med cing ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ye shes rjes su 'brang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180b-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dbang bsgyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180b-3: snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i thabs mkhas pas shin tu rnam par phye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180b-4: smon lam gyis shin tu mngon par bsgrubs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis shin tu brlabs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180b-6: sems can gyi don bya zhing sbyor ba rgyun ma chad pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par phye ba yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa'i phyir yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180b-11: de ltar des byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba 'di thob pas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir bsam pa'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180b-12: lam dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu brtan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180b-13: sems can gyi don yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:180b-14: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i phyir byams pa chen po'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181a-0: nyams pa med pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir gzungs kyi stobs shin @181a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181a-2: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i bye brag la mkhas pa'i phyir spobs pa'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par spyod pa'i rnam pa la mkhas pas mngon par shes pa'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba thams cad yongs su mi gtong bas smon lam gyi stobs shin tu brtan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181a-5: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181a-6: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam pa thams cad du mngon du gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs shin tu brtan pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181a-7: de de lta bu'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pas bya ba thams cad kyang yang dag par ston la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181a-8: bya ba thams cad la kha na ma tho ba'ang med pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181a-10: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi sa brgyad pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181a-11: mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir mi g-yo ba zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181a-12: ye shes mi zlog pa'i phyir mi 'gyur ba zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181a-13: 'gro ba thams cad kyis shes par dka' bas na thob par dka' ba'i sa zhes bya'o; ;kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir gzhon nu'i sa zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181a-14: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin dbang bsgyur bas skye ba'i sa zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181b-0: gzod bya ba med pas yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa @181b zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181b-1: ye shes kyis rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas pas mthar thug pa'i sa zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181b-2: smon lam shin tu mngon par bsgrubs pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181b-3: gzhan gyis rnam par mi 'khrugs pas byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181b-4: sngon gyi mtha' mngon par bsgrubs pas lhun gyis grub pa'i sa zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181b-6: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i ye shes mngon par bsgrubs pa dang ldan zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181b-7: sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rjes su song ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181b-8: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyis shin tu gsal bar gyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam dang spyod pa dang tshul gyi rjes su song ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181b-10: sangs rgyas kyi yul la mngon du gyur pa de ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis shin tu brlabs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181b-13: 'jig rten gyi mgon pos rab tu bsu ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181b-14: lag na rdo rje rtag par rjes su 'brang ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181b-15: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs yongs su ma btang ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181b-16: lus rnam par phye ba tshad med pa mngon par grub pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181b-17: lus kyi spyod pa'i stobs thams cad dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181b-18: mngon par shes pa chen po'i rnam par smin pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181b-19: ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa la dbang bsgyur ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:181b-20: lung bstan pa tshad med pa yang dag par nod pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182a-0: yongs su smin pa'i tshul bzhin du 'gro ba rnams la mngon par 'tshang @182a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182a-1: rgya ba yongs su ston pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182a-2: de de lta bu'i sa dang ldan zhing theg pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs pa shin tu rnam par dpyad pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa chen po dang ldan pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par shes rab snang ba'i 'od zer gtong ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182a-3: chos kyi dbyings chags pa med pa'i lam du zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lam rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182a-5: yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa rang gi sems bskyed pa la dbang bsgyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182a-6: sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182a-7: bdud kyi lam thams cad yongs su bzlog pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang spyod yul gyi rjes su zhugs pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas shing mu med pa dag tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis spyod pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba thob pa yin zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182a-10: de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-0: sangs rgyas mthong ba mchod cing bsnyen @182b bkur ba rgya chen po yang yongs su mi gtong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-1: de bskal pa re re dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa re re dag tu yang sangs rgyas du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-3: sangs rgyas brgya phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-4: sangs rgyas stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-5: sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-6: sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-7: sangs rgyas khrag khrig du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-8: sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-9: sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-10: sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-11: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma la rim gro byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-12: bkur sti byed do; ;bsti stang byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-14: mchod pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyang yang dag par 'bul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba sngon du 'gro ba'i chos snang ba nye bar bsgrub pa yang yang dag par len to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-16: de sngon pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod rab tu thob pas 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba yongs su dris pa shin tu bstan pas mi 'phrogs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-17: de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-18: bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-19: bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-20: bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-21: bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-22: bskal pa khrag khrig du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:182b-23: bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183a-1: pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183a-2: bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183a-3: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar shin tu byang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183a-5: shin tu 'od gsal zhing dang bar gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183a-9: gser gyi sa le sbram de nyid mgar ba mkhas pa des yongs su zin par gyur nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183a-10: 'dzam bu'i gling gi bdag po'i mgul lam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183a-11: mgo la btags na sems can 'dzam bu'i gling pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyi rnam pa kun gyis mi thub mi 'phrogs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183a-13: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag nyan thos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183a-14: rang sangs rgyas thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bar gyis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi sgo shin tu rnam par phye bas sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i mun pa rab tu sel to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183a-18: stong la dbang ba'i tshangs pa ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byams pas bkang zhing 'od kyis snang bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183b-0: de bzhin du byang chub @183b sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas rgyas par bkang zhing sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba mthar gyis zhi bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183b-1: lus kyang shin tu tshim par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183b-2: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183b-3: lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi sgrub pa ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183b-5: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mdor bstan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183b-7: rgya cher ni bskal pa mu med pas bstan pa'i mthar thug par shes par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183b-8: de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phal cher stong gi bdag po tshangs pa chen por 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183b-10: gzhan gyis zil gyis mi non pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183b-11: don mthong zhing dbang thob par 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183b-12: sems can rnams la nyan thos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:183b-13: rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin; 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba yongs su dris pas mi 'phrogs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184a-0: don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba @184a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184a-1: gang ci rtsom yang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184a-2: de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184a-9: yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184a-10: sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184a-11: chos yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184a-12: dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184a-13: byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184a-16: pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184a-17: stobs yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184a-18: mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184a-19: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184a-20: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184a-21: de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184a-22: de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184a-23: sangs rgyas stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184a-24: de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams stong @184b gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed skyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du 'gro ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed snang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184b-3: sems can stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184b-4: bskal pa stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gnas par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184b-6: phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184b-7: chos kyi sgo stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par 'byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184b-8: lus stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184b-9: lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir brtson /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184b-10: 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184b-11: de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:184b-22: mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-0: @185a *// bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-1: bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-2: bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-4: bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-5: de dag sa bdun shes rab thabs kyis lam sbyangs shing;/
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-6: shin tu tshogs bsags smon lam chen po rab btab pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-7: mi yi dam pas byin brlabs dge ba'i rtsa ldan zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-8: ye shes mngon 'dod mkhas pa brgyad pa yongs su gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-9: bsod nams ye shes nyer bsags snying rje byams ldan zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-10: tshad med sems kyi rjes srong mkhas dang 'dra ba'i blo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-11: drang srong chen po chos thos rtogs pa'i stobs ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-12: mi skye ba yi bzod pa phra zhing zhi ba rab tu 'thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-13: snga nas ma skyes mi skye mtshan nyid med pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-14: ma byung 'jig pa med cing rgyu ba med pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-15: dngos po skye 'jig med pa'i de nyid rtog med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-16: yid dang sems kyi rgyu ba med cing nam mkha' 'dra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-17: de dag 'di 'dra'i bzod ldan spros pa med gyur pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-18: mkhas pa zab spyod zhi ba'i gnas rab thob pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-19: dgra bcom rang rgyal 'gro ba kun gyi shes par dka'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-20: mtshan ma sna tshogs 'dzin pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185a-21: de ltar gnas pa'i yid dang sems dang rtog pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185b-0: dge slong 'gog @185b dang ldan ltar rnam par mi rtog thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185b-1: rmi lam chus khyer gnyid sad bzhin du rtsol dang bral //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185b-2: tshangs pa'i gnas kyi 'dod pa ji bzhin gnyis kyang med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185b-3: sngon gyi byin gyis bde gshegs yang dag bskul ba mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185b-4: 'di ni bde gshegs dbang bskur bzod pa dam pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185b-5: nged kyi ye shes stobs yangs sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185b-6: de dag khyod la med kyi de la brtson 'grus rtsom //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185b-7: ci phan khyad kyi nyon mongs 'bar ba kun zhi yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185b-8: 'jig rten nyon mongs mes tshig de dag mi lta'am //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185b-9: sems can phan phyir spyad pa'i sngon gyi smon lam soms //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185b-10: 'gro ba mthar rgyur ye shes don zhugs shes par gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185b-11: chos nyid de bzhin nyid 'di mi rtog rtag tu 'dug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185b-12: sa 'di rgyal ba nyan thos rang rgyal kun gyi ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185b-13: 'dis ni 'jig rten dag tu stobs bcu mi brjod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185b-14: gzhan du ye shes yangs pa dus gsum tshad kyis brjod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185b-15: de ltar de la mtshungs med lha dang mis mchod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185b-16: ye shes sgo mo rnam mang nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185b-17: rgyal ba'i chos sgrub pha rol mtha' yas gzhug mdzad pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185b-18: de la sngon gyi byang chub spyod pas char mi 'gro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185b-19: khyu mchog de dag ye shes sa mchog 'di thob nas; ;phyogs rnams kun tu skad cig gcig gis rgyas 'gengs pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:185b-20: ye shes zhugs dang ldan zhing mngon shes mchog thob pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186a-0: rgya mtsho cher phyin gru chen rlung gis bkur ba @186a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186a-2: ched du bskyod sems bral zhing ye shes las la gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186a-3: zhing rnams 'byung zhing gnas pa rnam par dpyod pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186a-4: khams rnams bzhi po kha dog tha dad yangs pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186a-5: phra zhing che dang rnam par phye la yang dag 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186a-6: stong gsum shin tu rdul phra kun la 'jug byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186a-7: khams bzhi 'gro ba'i lus rnams rnam par phye ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186a-8: rgyud drug rin chen rnam par phye ba'i rdul phran rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186a-9: rnam par phye zhing ye shes yul gyis ma lus 'brang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186a-10: ye shes rnam bsgoms yid ldan lus rnams thams cad du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186a-11: 'gro ba'i don phyir rang gi lus rnams gzud par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186a-12: stong gsum thams cad sna tshogs gzugs kyis khyab byas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186a-13: 'jig rten mtha' yas dag tu sna tshogs lus kyang ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186a-14: bar snang mkha' la nyi zla rlung gi rgyu 'gro yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186a-15: so so'i dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan chu dkyil rab tu snang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186a-16: de bzhin mi g-yo'i chos la ye shes dam pas rgyu; ;bsam dag 'gro ba rnams la mkhas pa'i gzugs brnyan snang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186a-17: 'gro ba'i bsam pa bzhin du lus kyi rnam phye ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186a-18: mi dang lha yi 'khor rnams kun tu ston par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186a-19: nyan thos rang rgyal bde gshegs sras kyi lus rnams dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186a-20: bde bar gshegs sku yan lag brgyad pa rab tu ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186a-21: sems can zhing dang de bzhin las kyi rnam smin lus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-0: 'phags lus @186b sna tshogs de bzhin chos dang ye shes lus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-1: nam mkha'i lus dang mnyam pa nyid du khyu mchog ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-2: rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 'gro ba tshim par bya phyir ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-3: dbang bcu dri ma med pa'i ye shes dpyod pa thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-4: ye shes spyod dang las rnams snying rje mthun pa'ang thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-5: las rnams ji snyed rgyal ba'i chos rnams yongs su bsgrub //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-6: sdom pa gsum la gnas shing mi g-yo ri rab bzhin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-7: rgyal sras rnams kyi stobs bcu bskyod par mi nus pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-8: de dag kun nas bdud rnams kun gyi yong mi zlog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-9: sangs rgyas byin brlabs brgya byin tshangs pas phyag kyang bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-10: lag na rdo rje'i dpung rnams rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-11: sa phyogs 'di la gnas pa'i yon tan mtha' yas te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-12: de dag bskal pa khrag khrig stong gis zad mi nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-13: de dag sangs rgyas bye ba bsnyen bkur yang byed pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-14: rgyal po'i mgo la 'dug pa'i rgyan bzhin shin tu gsal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-15: sa phyogs 'di gnas byang chub sems dpa' shes ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-16: stong gi bdag po tshangs chen yon tan mang por 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-17: theg pa gsum ston yongs su mi 'khrugs mi 'phrogs te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-18: 'od bzang byams pa'i bsam pas 'gro ba'i nyon mongs sel //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-19: skad cig gcig tu stong phrag bcu yi zhing rnams kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-20: rdul khams ji snyed de snyed ting 'dzin ldan pa thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:186b-21: phyogs bcu'i sems can gtso bo de snyed mang po mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-0: yan chad smon lam mchog gi rgyan can @187a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-2: 'di ni mdor bsdus rgyal sras kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-3: sa brgyad shin tu bstan pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-4: rgya chen bskal pa bye bar yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-5: thams cad mthar phyin mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-7: mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'o ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-8: bam po lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-9: sa yi dam pa 'di bshad tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-11: tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-12: bye ba'i zhing rnams g-yos par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-13: thams cad gzigs pa'i sku las kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-15: des ni zhing rnams snang bar byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-16: sems can rnams kyang bde bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-17: byang chub sems dpa' stong snyed kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-18: bar snang gnas la 'khod gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-19: lha rdzas lhag pa'i mchod pa yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-20: gsung ba'i mchog la mchod pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-21: lha yi rgyal po dbang phyug dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-22: dbang sgyur rnams kyang dga' bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-23: mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-24: yon tan rgya mtsho mchod pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-25: de nas lha yi bu mo stong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-26: dga' zhing dbang po bder gyur pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-27: sbyar legs snyan pa'i glu yi dbyangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-28: ston pa mchod pa'i don du len //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-29: rol mo'i sgra dbyangs de dag las //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-30: drang srong chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-32: snyan pa'i dbyangs su grags par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187a-33: zhi dul rab zhi dri ma thams cad med gyur cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-0: sa yi @187b mchog dang ldan pas spyod pa legs spyod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-1: phyogs bcur 'gro la phan par spyod pa'i khyu mchog rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-2: mkha' dbyings 'dra ba'i yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod pa ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-3: mi yi gnas dang lha yi gnas dang klu gnas su //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-4: phyogs bcur bsod nams stobs kyis rgyan rnams mang po byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-5: de las yang du rgyal sras ye shes la mos pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-6: rgyal ba'i yon tan bsngags pa rgya chen rab tu ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-7: zhing gcig ma g-yos rdul med zhing rnams thams cad du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-8: 'gro la phan byed zla ba lta bu'i 'od ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-9: thams cad dbyangs su 'du shes sems zhi yid rab kyis; ;so so skad bzhin sgra skad brgya yang rnam par brjod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-10: sems can gang rnams blo zhan sems yid dmar gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-11: de la mkhas pa khyu mchog nyan thos spyod pa ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-12: sems can gang rnams sems rno rang rgyal theg brtson pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-13: de la rdul med rang rgyal theg pa'i ye shes sten //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-14: sems can gang rnams phan sems snying rje brtse yid can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-15: de la de dag rgyal sras spyod pa'i mchog kyang ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-16: sems can gang rnams blo mchog dam pa'i yid mos pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-17: de la mkhas pa tshad med sangs rgyas sku ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-18: ji ltar sgyu mkhan 'gro ba rnams la sgyu ston pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-19: lus mang bye ba sna tshogs de dag dngos po med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-20: de bzhin rgyal sras mkhas pa ye shes sgyu mkhas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:187b-21: spyod pa thams cad ston kyang de dag dngos po med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188a-2: snyan pa'i dbyangs su brjod byas nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188a-3: lha yi bu mo mi smra bar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188a-4: zhi la mos pas rgyal ba lta //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188a-5: 'khor rnams rnam par dang bas na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188a-6: bde gshegs sras la yang smras pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188a-7: dam chos spyod pa'i spyod pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188a-8: brgyad pa'i gong du yang gsungs shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188a-9: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188a-10: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag; de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa la gnas pa ni de lta bu'i blo tshad med pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dpyad pas de nas gong du rnam par thar pa zhi ba la mos par zhe non cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188a-11: de nas gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes shin tu rdzogs pa rnam par dpyad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug par bya ba la 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188a-13: ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i che ba nyid rnam par dbye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188a-14: gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin rab tu dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188a-15: mngon par shes pa rgya chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188a-16: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188a-19: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su mi 'phrogs pa sbyang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188a-21: khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188b-0: snying rje chen @188b po'i mthu phyung ba yongs su mi gtong bar byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa yongs su gnon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188b-1: de byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188b-3: mi dge ba dang; lung du ma bstan pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188b-4: zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188b-5: zag pa med pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188b-7: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188b-9: bsam du med pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188b-11: ma nges pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188b-13: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188b-16: 'dus byas kyi chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188b-17: 'dus ma byas kyi chos mngon par 'du bya ba yang yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shas [*shes?] so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188b-18: de de lta bu'i shes par bya ba khong du chud pa'i blos sems can thams cad kyi sems thibs po rab tu rgyu ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188b-19: nyon mongs pa thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188b-20: las thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188b-21: dbang po thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188b-22: mos pa thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:188b-23: khams thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:189a-1: nyal ba'i thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:189a-2: skye ba thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:189a-3: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:189a-4: phung po gsum du rnam par gnas pa thibs po rab tu rgyu ba yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:189a-5: de ni sems can rnams kyi sems rnam pa tha dad pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:189a-6: sems rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:189a-7: sems skad cig tu myur du 'gyur zhing 'jig pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:189a-10: sems mtha' yas shing thams cad du dbang byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:189a-11: sems 'od gsal zhing dang ba dang /
