K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:194a-12: nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas khong du chud pa rnam par phye ba bzhin du bstan pas chos ston to; ;spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos kyi tshig re re la yang bskal pa mtha' yas par rgyun mi 'chad par chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:194b-0: gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag @194b par shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:194b-6: tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:194b-7: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:194b-8: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rtog par bya ba rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:194b-9: don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas sems can gyi spyod pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:194b-10: bsam pa ji lta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:194b-11: dbang po ji lta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:194b-12: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:194b-13: nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:194b-14: ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rjes su bsgrags pas chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:194b-15: spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'od gsal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:194b-16: spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la mos pas chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:194b-18: de ltar tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod thob cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:194b-19: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa la gnas pa chos smra ba chen po'i go 'phang la gnas pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:194b-20: don dang ldan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:194b-21: chos dang ldan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195a-0: ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa @195a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195a-1: dang ldan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195a-2: snang ba dang ldan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195a-3: blo gros bzang po dang ldan pa'i gzungs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195a-4: dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195a-5: grags pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195a-6: gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195a-7: chags pa med pa'i sgo'i gzungs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195a-8: mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195a-9: don sna tshogs kyi mdzod dang ldan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195a-10: de gzungs de dag la sogs pa gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu yongs su tshang bar thob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195a-11: gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag la mkhas pas de snyed du tshad med pa nyid dang ldan pa'i spobs pa rnam par phye ba'i sgos chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195a-12: de de ltar tshad med pa'i gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pas tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las chos nyan cing thos nas kyang brjod par mi byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195a-13: ji skad du thos pa yang tshad med par rnam par phye bas shin tu ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195a-14: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcus chos khong du chud par byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las ji lta ba de bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa las gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong grangs @195b med pa phrag bcus chos khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195b-1: de smon pa tsam gyis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las chos kyi sgo snang ba ches mang du yang dag par 'dzin gyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195b-2: nyan thos shin tu mang du thos pa dang ldan pa thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa rnams kyis ni bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang gzung ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de ltar mi zin to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195b-3: de ltar de lta bu'i gzungs thob cing spobs pa thob pas chos kyi gtam bya ba'i phyir 'dug na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195b-4: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195b-5: chos kyi stan la 'dug cing sems can rnams la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par phye zhing chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195b-6: de'i chos kyi stan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195b-7: byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa ma gtogs par thams cad las 'phags shing snang ba tshad med pa dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195b-8: de 'dod na chos kyi stan la 'dug cing dbyangs gcig gis 'khor thams cad du sgra skad sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yang dag par go bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195b-9: 'dod na sgra skad sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195b-10: dbyangs kyi yan lag tha dad pa rnam par phye bas 'khor thams cad mngon par go bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:195b-11: 'dod na 'od zer gyi sgo nye bar bsgrubs pas chos kyi sgo shin tu brjod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196a-0: 'dod na ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas dbyangs rnam par phye ba shin tu brjod @196a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196a-1: do; ;'dod na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs su snang ba ji snyed yod pa'i gzugs su snang ba de dag las chos kyi sgra 'byung bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196a-2: 'dod na dbyangs kyi yan lag gcig gi sgras chos kyi dbyings thams cad khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196a-3: 'dod na sgra dang dbyangs thams cad chos kyi sgrar byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196a-4: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i glu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196a-6: dkrol ba'i sgra thams cad las chos kyi sgra 'byung bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196a-7: 'dod na yi ge gcig gi sgra las chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu phye ba'i sgra 'byung bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196a-8: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas shing brjod du med pa'i sa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196a-11: rlung gi phung po rdul shin tu phra rab rnam par phye ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba re re las chos kyi sgo brjod du med pa 'byung bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196a-12: gal te de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams 'ongs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196a-13: skad cig yud tsam thang gcig tu dri ba yongs su 'dri zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196a-14: de dag re res kyang sgra rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pas yongs su dris par gyur la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196a-15: gcig gis gang dris pa de gzhan mi 'dri bar gyur na yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196a-16: de la byang chub sems dpa' des sems can de dag thams cad kyi sgra tshig so so dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196b-0: yi ge'i 'bru @196b yan chad ma lus par bzung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196b-1: bzung nas kyang tshig gcig mngon par brjod pas sems can de dag thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa tshim par byed pa nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i bar du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis skad cig thang gcig yud tsam du dri ba yongs su dris te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196b-3: de dag re re zhing yang sgra rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pas 'dri bar gyur la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196b-4: gcig gis ci dris pa de gzhan mi 'dri bar gyur na yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196b-5: de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' des skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ma lus par bzung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196b-6: sgra gcig brjod pas de dag thams cad khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196b-7: de 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag kyang rgyas par bkang zhing sems can rnams la bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196b-9: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196b-10: chos kyi gtam la zhugs pa'i tshe'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs len cing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyi sems can thams cad la nye bar gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196b-11: yang de 'di lta bu'i ye shes snang bas 'dzin pa yongs su rtsom ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:196b-12: gal te skra'i rtse mo'i go gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa de snyed du tshad med par gyur pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du chos bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197a-1: gshegs pa de dag re res kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197a-2: de snyed kyi sems can tshad med pa la chos rnam pa tha dad par shin tu bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197a-3: sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud re re la yang de snyed du chos nye bar bsgrub pa tshad med par nye bar bsgrub par gyur la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197a-5: skra'i rtse mo'i go gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings thams cad du de ltar gyur kyang de dag thams cad zin par 'gyur na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams de tsam dag gi sems can rnams kyi lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197a-7: de de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyin mtshan du yid la bsam pa gzhan med par sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la zhugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob cing byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa zab mo rab tu thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197a-8: de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan zhing mnyam par bzhag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba yongs su mi spong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197a-9: bskal pa re re zhing sangs rgyas du ma nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197a-10: sangs rgyas brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig lta zhing mthong nas kyang rim gro dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197b-0: sangs rgyas mthong zhing mchod @197b pa bya ba rgya chen po yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la zhu ba yongs su zhu ba yang byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197b-2: chos kyi gzungs rab tu bstan pa las shin tu byung ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197b-3: de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sngon pas kyang shin tu byang zhing mi 'phrogs par 'gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197b-7: gser gyi sa le sbram de nyid mgar ba mkhas pas rgyan du byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197b-8: yongs su zin pa 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i yan lag gi dam pa mgo 'am mgul du btags na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197b-9: khams kyi rgyal po thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197b-10: gling bzhi pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rgyan gyi rnam pas mi thub cing mi 'phrogs pa yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197b-12: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros 'di la gnas pa'i byang sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197b-15: sa 'og ma la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs shing mi thub pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197b-16: de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba snang ba des ni sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197b-17: sems kyi thibs po snang bar byas te de nyid nas phyir ldog go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:197b-20: dper na; stong gnyis la dbang ba'i tshangs pa chen po ni stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi thibs po dma' bar gzhol ba yongs su snang bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198a-0: @198a *// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snang ba de yang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198a-1: sems kyi thibs po snang bar byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198a-2: de nyid nas phyir ldog go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198a-3: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198a-4: lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi sgrub par ni ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198a-6: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa mdor bstan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198a-8: rgya cher ni bskal pa mu med pa'i bstan pa'i mthar thug par shes par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198a-9: de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phal cher tshangs pa chen por gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198a-10: stobs dang mthu chen po thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198a-11: stong gnyis la dbang zhing zil gyis gnon la gzhan gyis zil gyis mi non pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198a-14: sems can rnams la nyan thos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad ston pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198a-17: sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su dris pa bstan pas mi 'phrogs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198a-21: don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198b-0: de @198b thams cad ji ltar na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198b-1: sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198b-8: yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198b-9: sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198b-10: chos yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198b-11: dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198b-12: byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198b-15: pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198b-16: stobs yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198b-17: mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198b-18: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198b-19: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198b-20: de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob cing de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198b-21: sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198b-22: de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:198b-23: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed skyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199a-1: rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du 'gro ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed snang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199a-3: sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199a-4: bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gnas par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199a-6: phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199a-7: chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par 'byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199a-8: lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199a-9: lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yang dag par bstan pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199a-10: de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199a-11: smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199b-10: mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199b-11: bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199b-12: bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199b-13: bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199b-14: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas kyang bgrang bar dka'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199b-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199b-16: bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so; ;de dag tshad med stobs kyi blo yis rnam dpyod cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199b-17: ye shes phra ba'i dam pa 'gro bas shes dka' ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199b-18: de bzhin bde gshegs gsang ba'i gnas la yang dag 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199b-19: 'gro ba'i don byed de dag sa dgu yongs su gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199b-20: de dag gzungs mchog ting 'dzin che ba nyid mchog dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199b-21: mngon shes yangs dang de bzhin zhing 'jug mtha' yas dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199b-22: stobs dang rtogs pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i brten gnas dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199b-23: smon lam snying rje'i bsam pas mkhas pa dgu la 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199b-24: sa dgu ldan pa de dag rgyal ba'i mdzod 'dzin cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199b-25: dge ba'i chos dang mi dge lung du ma bstan dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199b-26: zag dang bcas dang 'jig rten pa dang 'phags pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:199b-27: bsam du rung dang bsam du mi rung mkhas pas shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-0: nges pa'i chos dang ma nges @200a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-2: theg gsum phun sum tshogs pa'i bya ba yongs su 'jal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-3: 'dus byas rnam par phye dang grangs dang rgyu ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-4: 'jig rten ji ltar mngon byed de la rab tu 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-5: de dag de 'dra'i shes ldan blo mchog phra ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-6: sems can sems kyi thibs po yongs su rtog pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-7: rnam shes sna tshogs myur du 'gyur zhing ldog pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-8: rnam shes mtha' yas 'byung la rtag tu mkhas pa 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-9: nyon mongs mtha' yas sbyor dang grogs su 'gyur ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-10: kun nas 'khor dang bag nyal 'gro rgyud mtshams sbyor dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-11: las rnams sna tshogs rnam par phye la'ang de bzhin 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-12: rgyu dang 'gog dang de bzhin 'bras bu 'jig pa'ang yang dag 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-13: dbang po rno dang tha ma 'bring dang yangs pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-14: tha dang sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' la'ang yang dag 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-15: mos pa dge dang mi dge sna tshogs du ma dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-16: stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi kun la yang dag 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-17: khams kyi rnam pa nyon mongs lta ba srid pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-18: thibs por gyur ba snga phyi med cing 'chad med dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-19: bag nyal bsam pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyud rnams kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-20: sems rnams kun rgyu 'brel cing rgyun chad mi 'gyur ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-21: bsam pa bag nyal rgyud yod dngos po ma yin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200a-22: yul la mi gnas bsam pa yongs su 'bral mi 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-0: shes pa dka' @200b ba'i bsam gtan yul las phyir mi ldog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-1: rdo rje lta bu'i lam gyis chod 'gyur gzhan gyis min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-2: rgyud drug skye ba rnam par phye la rab tu 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-3: sred rlan ma rig mun pa de bzhi las kyi zhing; ;rnam shes sa bon can 'byung myu gu ming dang gzugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-4: khams gsum sngon mtha' med par de dag rab tu 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-5: de dag bag chags tshul dang nyon mongs las dang sems //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-6: 'dod chags bral bas lam gyi rgyud du 'byung ba min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-7: sems can phung po gsum du nges pa yang dag shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-8: lta bar bying ba shes pa'i lam dang de dag ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-9: de 'dra'i shes ldan sa mchog 'di la gnas pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-10: sems can bsam pa mos pa dbang po'i tshul bzhin du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-11: chos rnams rnam par phye zhing shin tu ston pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-12: tha dad yang dag don shes nges tshig spobs pa yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-13: de dag chos smra'i tshul la gnas pa rab tu thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-14: seng ge khyu mchog dpe 'dra ri yi rgyal po 'dra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-15: bdud rtsi sprin chen zhim pa'i char yang rab tu 'babs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-16: klu yi dbang pos rgya mtsho rgyas pa byed pa bzhin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-17: don gyi don shes de bzhin chos nyid rab tu shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-18: nges tshig rjes su song zhing spobs pa rab tu thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-19: de dag grangs med stong phrag bcu yi gzungs thob bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-20: chos rnams 'dzin pa rgya mtsho sprin chen char 'dzin bzhin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-21: de dag de 'dra'i ting 'dzin gzungs gsal thob gyur pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:200b-22: skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas mang po stong yang mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201a-1: chen chos rnams thos nas yang du ston byed de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201a-2: tshig gi dkyil 'khor rnam dag dbyangs kyi yan lag ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201a-3: 'dod na stong gsum 'jig rten khams su gtogs pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201a-4: sems can bsam sems sna tshogs tshul bzhin smin byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201a-5: thams cad bsam pa dbang po ji bzhin tshim par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201a-6: gling bzhi rgya mtsho'i sprin bzhin yang dag rab tu 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201a-7: de bas gong du legs ldan brtson 'grus rab thob pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201a-8: skra rtse'i go gcig bsam gyis mi khyab sems pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201a-9: sems can sna tshogs mang la bde gshegs chos ston pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201a-10: thos nas sa bon kun 'dzin sa bzhin yongs su 'dzin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201a-11: phyogs rnams bcu po'i sems can mang po ji snyed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201a-12: de dag thams cad 'khor gcig 'dus par 'khod gyur kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201a-13: de dag bsam pa skad cig gcig gis bsam byas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201a-14: sgra skad gcig gis de dag thams cad tshim par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201a-15: 'di la gnas pa chos rgyal lha mi mchog tu 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201a-16: rgyal ba'i sras po chos kyis yongs su skyong ba yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201a-17: nyin mtshan kun tu rgyal ba rnams dang rtag par 'grogs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201a-18: zab yangs ye shes rnam par thar pa ldan par gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201a-19: de dag yang du sangs rgyas khrag khrig bsnyen bkur byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201a-20: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyan bzang yongs su byang ba bzhin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201a-21: de yi 'od kyang nyon mongs thibs po snang ba byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-0: tshangs pa'i 'od kyis stong @201b gnyis 'jig rten ji bzhin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-1: 'di la gnas pa legs ldan tshangs chen 'jig rten du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-2: skye 'gyur theg gsum ston la mkhas shing mthu yod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-3: 'gro ba kun la phan phyir ci tsam gang yang rung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-4: yon tan shes ldan bde gshegs ye shes ldan pa bsngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-5: grangs med zhing du gtogs pa'i rdul phran du yod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-6: de snyed ting 'dzin skad cig gcig tu brtan pas thob; ;phyogs rnams kun gyi rgyal ba mthong zhing gsung yang nyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-7: yan chad smon lam ldan pa tshad med rnam par 'phrul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-8: 'di ni sa rab dgu pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-9: ye shes chen pos rnam par spyod; ;zab cing blta dka' shin tu phra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-10: rgyal ba'i sras kyis bstan pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-11: legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa'o ///
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-13: bam po lnga bcu gnyis pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-14: spyod pa bla na med pa 'di thos nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-15: gtsang gnas lha rnams bye ba rab tu dga'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-16: dbang po tshim par bar snang mkha' la gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-17: bde bar gshegs la rje sar mchod pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-18: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba bsam yas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-19: bar snang mkha' gnas rab tu dga' gyur cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-20: spos sprin tshad med yid du 'ong ba dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-21: 'gro ba'i nyon mongs sel ba dri zhim bdug pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-22: lha yi dbang po dbang sgyur rab dga' zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-23: bar snang gnas las lha 'khor khrag khrig dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:201b-24: rim gro bcas par gos rnams 'dor bar byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-0: @202a *// yid 'ong gos brgya yongs su bskor ba byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-1: lha yi bu mo mang po shin tu dga'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-2: bde bar gshegs la rjes sa mchod pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-3: rol mo brdung ba bye ba khrag khrig byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-4: 'di 'dra'i sgra dbyangs kun las byung bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-5: zhing mchog gcig na bde bar gshegs pa bzhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-6: zhing rnams kun tu sku gzugs rab tu bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-7: sku gzugs khrag khrig sna tshogs yid du 'ong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-8: chos dbyings rgya chen yongs su rgyas par gang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-9: spu gcig rtse nas bde gshegs 'od bkye ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-10: 'gro ba'i nyon mongs yongs su zhi bar 'phro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-11: zhing gi rdul khams zad par nus 'gyur gyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-12: de dag bgrang bas shes par mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-13: la las sangs rgyas mtshan rab mnga' bar mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-14: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dam par la las mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-15: zhing rnams la lar spyod pa mchog mdzad cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-16: dag cing zhi bar rkang gnyis dam pa mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-17: dga' ldan gnas na mgon po bzhugs pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-18: 'pho dang gshegs par de bzhin rab tu snang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-19: zhing rnams bye bar yum gyi skur bzhugs dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-20: zhing rnams la lar skye ba de bzhin snang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-21: 'gro ba'i don du mgon po 'byung mdzad dang; ;byang chub dam pa mchog tu 'tshang rgya ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-22: chos kyi 'khor lo mya ngan 'da' ba dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-23: zhing mang khrag khrig kun na de bzhin snang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202a-24: sgyu ma'i mkhan po mkhas par lobs gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-0: @202b ji ltar 'tsho phyir gzugs mang ston pa bzhin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-1: de bzhin ston pa ye shes mchog mkhyen pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-2: sku gzugs kun tu 'gro ba rnams la ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-3: stong pa zhi ba rang bzhin mtshan nyid med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-4: chos nyid bar snang mkha' dang mnyam par yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-5: sangs rgyas ston pa don dam de nyid du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-6: sangs rgyas spyod yul mchog gis yang dag bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-7: bde gshegs spyod yul rang bzhin ci 'dra ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-8: sems can kun gyi chos nyid de 'dra ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-9: mtshan dang mtshan gzhi mnyam pa nyid kyis 'dra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-10: mtshan nyid med pa chos rnams kun gyi mchog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-11: bde gshegs ye shes don du su gnyer bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-12: rtog dang rnam rtog yongs rtog yongs su spangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-13: dngos dang dngos med mnyam nyid shes par gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-14: myur du mi yi gtso bo mchog tu 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-16: snyan pa'i dbyangs su brjod byas nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-17: lha yi bu mo mi smra zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-18: zhi la dga' bar bde gshegs lta //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-19: 'khor rnams zhi bar shes gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-20: rnam thar zla ba 'jigs med pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-21: rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-22: rgyal sras de la yang smras pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-23: bcu par yang dag 'phar ba yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-24: rnam pa yon tan spyod yul dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-25: mtshan ma dag dang cho 'phrul rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-26: mkhas pas kun kyang bstan par mdzod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:202b-27: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203a-0: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa'i bar du shes @203a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203a-1: par bya ba tshad med pa yongs su brtags pa'i blos rnam par dbye ba shin tu rnam par phye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203a-2: chos dkar po shin tu rdzogs pa bsags par bya ba'i tshogs mtha' yas pa shin tu bsags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203a-3: bsod nams dang ye shes kyis tshogs yongs su zin pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203a-4: snying rje chen po shin tu yangs pa thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rnam pa tha dad pa la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203a-6: sems can gyi khams thibs pos nye bar spyod pa la rab tu zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i 'du shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203a-8: yid la byed pa can stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203a-10: sangs rgyas kyi chos la lhag par dmigs pa'i rjes su song ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203a-11: rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203a-13: byang chub sems dpa' ye shes de lta bu dang ldan zhing dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa de la byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dri ma med pa zhes bya ba mngon du 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings rnam par phye ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203a-15: snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba dang; 'od zer gyi me tog rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203a-16: rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203a-17: rgya mtsho'i rgya zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203a-18: nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203b-0: chos @203b thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203b-1: sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203b-2: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du bzhugs pa zhes bya ba mngon du 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203b-3: de la de dag la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag grangs med pa phrag bcu mngon du 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203b-4: de ting nge 'dzin de dag thams cad la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203b-5: de ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203b-6: ting nge 'dzin gyi dgos pa de dag thams cad la'ang rab tu spyod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203b-7: ting nge 'dzin brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu'i tha ma la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi khyad par gyis mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203b-8: de mngon du gyur ma thag tu stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i tha gru dang mnyam pa'i rin po che'i padmo chen po rin po che thams cad kyis rnam pa thams cad du spras shing brgyan pa; 'jig rten thams cad kyi spyod yul las 'das pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203b-9: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203b-10: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang spyod yul gyis yongs su grub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203b-11: chos kyi dbyings la shin tu gnas par snang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203b-12: lha rdzas kyi yul las shin tu 'das pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203b-13: nor bu rin po che bee d'u rya'i chu ba chen po can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:203b-14: tsan dan gyi rgyal po mtshungs pa med pa'i snying po can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204a-0: @204a *// aasma garbha rab kyi ze ba can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204a-1: 'dzam bu chu klung gis gser ltar snang ba'i lo ma can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204a-2: 'od zer tshad med pas shin tu rgyas pa'i lhun can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204a-3: rin po che thams cad kyi nang yongs su spras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204a-4: rin po che mu med pa'i dra bas kun nas yog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204a-5: stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rin po che'i padmo chen po'i 'khor dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204a-6: byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyang de dang rkyen du 'tsham zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204a-7: de'i tshul dang mthun par gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204a-8: de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi khyad par gyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob ma thag tu rin po che'i padmo'i rgyal po chen po de la 'dug par snang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204a-9: rin po che'i padmo'i rgyal po chen po de la byang chub sems dpa' de 'dug ma thag tu rin po che'i padmo'i rgyal po chen po de'i 'khor rin po che'i padmo ji snyed byung ba de snyed kyi byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' de yongs su bskor te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204a-10: rin po che'i padmo chen po de dag la 'khod nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204a-11: byang chub sems dpa' de nyid la lta zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204a-12: de dag re re yang ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu bcu la snyoms par 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204a-13: byang chub sems dpa' de dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204a-14: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus par g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204b-0: ngan @204b song thams cad rtse zhil bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204b-1: chos kyi dbyings thams cad snang bas rgyas par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204b-3: zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sgra grag par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204b-4: skal ba dang spyod pa mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang 'du bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi lha dang mi'i rol mo brdung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204b-6: dkrol ba'i sgra yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204b-7: sems can thams cad kyi bde ba yang skye bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204b-8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mchod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204b-9: rim gro yang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kyang rnam par dmigs par 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204b-13: byang chub sems dpa' de ni rin po che'i padmo'i rgyal po de la 'dug ma thag tu rkang pa'i mthil gnyis kyi 'og nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204b-14: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po yan chad snang bar byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204b-15: sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:204b-16: pus mo'i lha nga gnyis nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205a-0: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur byol song gi skye gnas kyi gnas @205a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205a-1: thams cad snang bar byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205a-2: sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205a-3: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205a-4: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205a-5: sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205a-6: g-yas g-yon gyi rtsib logs gnyis nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205a-7: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur mi'i gnas rnams snang bar byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205a-8: sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205a-9: lag pa'i mthil gnyis nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205a-10: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur lha dang lha ma yin gyi gnas rnams snang bar byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205a-11: sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205a-12: phrag pa gnyis nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205a-13: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi gnas snang bar byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205a-14: chos snang ba'i sgo yang nye bar bsgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205a-15: rgyab dang mgul nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste; byung nas kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205a-16: zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul gyi sgo'ang nye bar sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205b-0: kha'i sgo nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs @205b med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205b-1: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ba yan chad sa dgu pa thob pa'i bar dag snang bar byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205b-2: shes rab dang thabs kyi tshul gyi sgo yang nye bar bsgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205b-3: smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcur 'byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205b-4: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur bdud kyi gnas thams cad zil gyi mnan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205b-5: dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams snang bar byas nas de dag gi lus su nub par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205b-6: yan lag dam pa'i spyi gtsug nas 'od zer stong gsum brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205b-7: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205b-8: 'jig rten lan bcur bskor ba byas nas steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings la 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205b-9: 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor du byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro bya ba 'od shin tu gsal ba zhes bya ba rab tu byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:205b-11: mchod pa dang rim gro de la sems dang po bskyed pa nye bar bzung ba yan chad sa dgu pa thob kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gro byas pas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206a-2: khrag khrig stong gi cha dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206a-3: khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206a-4: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206a-8: rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206a-9: bsgrun pa tsam gyi bar du'ang mi chog go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206a-10: 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po de las phyogs bcu na me tog tu gdags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206a-21: nor bu rin po cher gdags pa ci yod pa de dag thams cad las lhag cing 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbang gis grub pa dag sprin chen po'i char bzhin du mngon par 'bab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206a-22: mchod pa de dag sems can gang gis mthong ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206a-23: mchod pa dang rim gro'i rnam pa de lta bu dag byas nas kyang 'od zer de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206a-24: 'jig rten lan bcur bskor ba byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas @206b rnams kyi zhabs kyi mthil gyi 'og tu nub par 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206b-1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206b-2: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa che ge mo zhig tu de lta bu'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i dus la bab par thugs su chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206b-4: der phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu la gnas pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa 'ongs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206b-5: byang chub sems dpa' de la kun nas bskor nas mchod pa chen po byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206b-6: byang chub sems dpa' de nyid la lta zhing ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu bcu la so so nas mnyam par gzhog go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206b-7: byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa rnams kyi dpal gyi be'u dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206b-9: bkra shis las bdud kyi dgra las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer chen po gcig 'od zer gyi 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu dang ldan par 'byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206b-10: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu snang bar byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206b-11: cho 'phrul mu med par yang dag par bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206b-12: byang chub sems dpa' de'i dpal gyi be'u dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206b-14: bkra shis su nub par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206b-15: 'od zer de dag der nub ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de'i stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:206b-16: mthu yang brgya phrag stong gyur pas kyang lhag par mngon par 'phel bar snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:207a-1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi 'khor grangs med pa dang ldan pa 'byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:207a-2: de dag gis phyogs bcu thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par snang bar byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:207a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po bstan nas; byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig mang po yang dag par bskul nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:207a-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad rnam pa drug tu bskyod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:207a-6: ngan song thams cad kyi lam gyi rgyud dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:207a-8: shi 'pho rab tu zhi bar byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:207a-9: bdud kyi gnas thams cad zil gyis mnan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:207a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gdan yang dag par bstan nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:207a-11: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor brgyan pa'i mthu rab tu bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:207a-12: 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:207b-0: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad snang bar byas nas phyir log ste @207b byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi steng nas bskor ba byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:207b-1: rgyan chen po bstan nas 'od zer de dag byang chub sems dpa' de'i yan lag gi dam par nub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:207b-2: de'i 'khor gyi 'od zer rnams kyang de ltar tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mgor nub par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:207b-3: 'od zer de dag gis phog ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sngan chad ma thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu bcu rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:207b-4: 'od zer de dag kyang dus gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' de'i yan chad dam pa la 'char bar 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:207b-5: byang chub sems dpa' de yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul la mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:207b-6: stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs nas ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su bgrang ba yang 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:207b-10: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu thu bo gzhon nu btsun mo dam pa las btsas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:207b-11: rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos lha'i glang po rin po che la gser gyi khri dam pa'i steng du bzhag ste; steng du bla re bres shing gdugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:207b-16: glu'i dbyangs la sogs pa'i rgyan chen po byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208a-1: chen po bzhi las chu blangs pa gser gyi bum pas bcus te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208a-2: chu des gzhon nu de'i spyi bo nas mngon par dbang bskur na dbang bskur ma thag tu de ni rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208a-3: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs nas ni 'khor los bsgyur bar bgrang ba rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208a-5: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dbang bskur ma thag tu ye shes kyi dbang mngon par bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208a-6: stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs nas ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi grangs su 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208a-8: 'di ni gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba brgya stong du ma rtsom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208a-9: de de ltar mngon par dbang bskur zhing yon tan dang ye shes rnam par 'phel ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208a-12: de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos kyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208b-0: 'dod pa'i khams @208b yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208b-1: gzugs kyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208b-2: gzugs med pa'i khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208b-4: sems can gyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208b-5: rnam par shes pa'i khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208b-7: 'dus ma byas kyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208b-8: nam mkha'i khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208b-10: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i khams bstan pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208b-11: mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208b-13: nyon mongs pa yang dag par bsgrub pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208b-14: 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang 'du ba yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208b-15: nyan thos kyi spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208b-16: rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208b-17: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208b-21: chos kyi sku yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208b-22: rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208b-23: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208b-24: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:208b-25: bzlog pa bstan pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-1: na chos thams cad rnam par phye ba la 'jug cing shin tu brtag pa yang dag par bsgrub pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-2: de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i blos gong du sems can rnams kyi sprul pa'i las yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-3: nyon mongs pa'i sprul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-4: lta ba'i rnam pa'i sprul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sprul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-6: chos kyi khams kyi sprul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-7: nyan thos kyi sprul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-8: rang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-11: sprul pa thams cad kyi rnam par dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-12: rnam par mi dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-13: de sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-14: chos kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-15: dge 'dun gyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-16: las kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-17: nyon mongs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-18: dus kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-19: smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-20: mchod pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-21: spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-22: bskal pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-23: ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209a-24: gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes 'di lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209b-0: @209b spyod pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209b-1: skye ba dang 'pho ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209b-2: sku tshe phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209b-3: mngon par 'byung ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam; mngon par byang chub pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209b-4: rnam par 'phrul pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209b-5: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209b-6: sku tshe'i tshad byin gyi rlabs pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209b-7: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209b-8: bstan pa gnas pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes de dag thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du des rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209b-9: gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba la 'jug pa'i gnas 'di lta te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209b-13: dus dang dus ma yin pa thugs su chud pa'i gsang ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209b-14: byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa'i gsang ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209b-17: theg pa tha dad pa gsang ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209b-18: sems can gyi spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209b-19: dbang po rnam par phye ba gsang ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:209b-20: las dang bya ba la 'jug pa gsang ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210a-0: spyod pa dang mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rang bzhin brjod pa thugs su chud pa gsang ba de dag thams @210a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210a-1: cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du des rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210a-2: gang 'di dag bskal pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes 'di lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210a-3: bskal pa gcig la bskal pa grangs med par yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210a-4: grangs med pa'i bskal pa la bskal pa gcig tu yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210a-5: bskal pa grangs med pa la bskal pa grangs med par yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210a-6: bskal pa gcig la bskal pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210a-7: bskal pa la skad cig tu yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210a-8: bskal pa la bskal pa ma yin par yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210a-9: bskal pa ma yin pa la bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210a-10: sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal pa sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210a-11: sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal pa sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210a-14: da ltar byung ba la da ltar byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210a-19: da ltar byung ba'i bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210a-20: bskal pa ring po la bskal pa thung ngur yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210a-21: bskal pa thung ngu la bskal pa ring por yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210b-0: bskal pa thams @210b cad la ming du btags par yang dag par 'jug pa de dag thams cad kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du des rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210b-1: gang 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis thugs su chud pa'i ye shes 'di lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210b-2: skra'i rtse mo la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210b-3: rdul shin tu phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210b-4: zhing mang po mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210b-6: sems mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210b-7: thams cad du khyab pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam; snrel zhi'i spyod pa la 'jug pa yang dag par ston pa'i ye shes sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210b-8: lugs dang mthun pa'i spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210b-9: lugs dang mi mthun pa'i spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210b-10: 'jig rten bsam du rung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210b-11: bsam du mi rung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210b-12: rnam par shes par rung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210b-13: rnam par shes par mi rung ba'i spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210b-14: nyan thos kyis shes par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210b-15: rang sangs rgyas kyis shes par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:210b-16: byang chub sems dpas shes par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211a-0: de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen par bya ba'i spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes de dag thams cad kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba @211a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211a-1: bzhin du des rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211a-3: de ltar na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes shin tu yangs pa tshad med pas sa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas khong du chud pa'i ye shes kyang tshad med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211a-5: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211a-6: bsgribs pa med pa zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211a-7: rnam par dag pa rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211a-8: sgo kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod ces bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211a-10: 'khor lo thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211a-11: dus gsum gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211a-12: chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211a-13: rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor snang ba zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211a-14: yul ma lus pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bcu po de dag la sogs pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo brgya stong grangs med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas rab tu thob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211a-19: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin brgya phrag stong dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211b-1: mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa brgya phrag stong yang rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211b-2: de ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i blo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211b-3: tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba'i dran pa mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211b-4: de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa las skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po tshad med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211b-6: chos kyi sprin chen po yang dag par 'dzin to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211b-13: rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po'i sprin las rnam par bkye ba'i chu'i phung po chen po ni rgya mtsho chen po ma gtogs par sa'i phyogs gzhan gyis bzod pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211b-16: gzung bar mi nus so; ;kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211b-17: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211b-18: chos kyi snang ba chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211b-20: chos kyi sprin chen po de dag ni sems can thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211b-22: rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211b-23: sa dang po nye bar bzung ba yan chad sa dgu pa'i bar la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang bzod pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:211b-26: bdag gir bya bar sla ba ma yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212a-1: sa chos kyi sprin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag thams cad la mos par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212a-3: yang dag par 'dzin te; ;bdag gir byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212a-7: rgya mtsho chen po ni klu'i rgyal po chen po gcig gi sprin chen po yang bzod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212a-11: klu'i rgyal po chen po gnyis dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212a-12: gsum nas tshad med pa'i bar gyi sprin chen po dag kyang skad cig yud tsam thang cig gis bzod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212a-16: rgya mtsho chen po de tshad med par rgya che zhing yangs pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212a-18: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las kyang skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos snang ba chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212a-20: chos kyi sprin chen po tshad med pa rnams bzod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212a-25: gsum nas tshad med pa'i bar dag las kyang skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212b-0: chos kyi sprin chen po tshad med pa bzod @212b do; ;yang dag par 'dzin to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212b-4: sa 'di yang chos kyi sprin ces bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212b-5: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig las byang chub sems dpa' skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212b-8: chos kyi 'od chen po dang; chos kyi sprin chen po bzod par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212b-10: yang dag par len cing bdag gir byed pa de dag bgrang bar nus sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyed cig las byang chub sems dpa' skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212b-15: chos kyi sprin chen po bzod cing yang dag par len pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212b-16: yang dag par 'dzin cing bdag gir byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212b-17: zhes grangs kyis shin tu bstan pa'i tshul du bgrang bar sla ba ma yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212b-18: 'on kyang dpe tsam du bstan par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:212b-22: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa; bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213a-0: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa'i tshul du ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las sems can gcig cig thos pa @213a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213a-1: 'dzin pa'i gzungs rab tu thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213a-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje padmo'i bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dge slong rnam par rgyal ba chen po zhes bya ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring ba nyan thos chen po thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog tu phyin par gyur la; rnam pa de lta bu'i thos pa 'dzin pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213a-5: sems can gcig po de ldan par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213a-6: sems can gcig po de ci 'dra ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi sems can thams cad dang ldan par gyur la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213a-7: gcig gis gang bzung ba de bzhin gyis bzung na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213a-9: de la ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213a-10: sems can de dag gi thos pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa de dag tshad med cing mang ba yin mod /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213a-13: sems can de dag gi thos pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa de ni mang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213a-15: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213a-17: khyod kyis khong du chud pa dang yid ches par bya na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213b-0: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las kyang skad cig yud tsam thang cig @213b tu chos kyi snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213b-2: sprin chen po chos kyi dbyings dus gsum gyi mdzod ces bya ba bzod cing yang dag par len to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213b-7: sprin chen po yang dag par 'dzin pa'i shes pa de la thos pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213b-9: brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213b-12: bye ba stong gi cha dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213b-13: bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213b-14: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213b-18: dpe dang; rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213b-19: bsgrun pa tsam gyi bar du yang mi chog go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams snga ma dag na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de snyed kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213b-21: de dag pas kyang ches mang zhing tshad med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213b-23: sprin chen po chos kyi dbyings dus gsum gyi mdzod ces bya ba bzod cing yang dag par len to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213b-24: yang dag par 'dzin to; ;bdag gir byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:213b-25: de bas na sa 'di yang chos kyi sprin ces bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214a-0: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems @214a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214a-1: dpa' ni rang gi smon lam gyi stobs dang shugs kyis snying brtse ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214a-2: snying rje chen po'i sprin chos kyi snang ba chen po rab tu sgrog pa'i 'brug sgra shin tu sgrog pa mngon par shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214a-4: mi 'jigs pa'i glog rnam par 'gyur ba 'od zer chen po'i rlung gis shin tu bskyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214a-5: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi sprin gyi dra ba stug pos kun nas khebs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214a-6: lus sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi glog yang dag par ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214a-7: chos kyi sgra chen po rab tu sgrog pa bdud kyi 'khor thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa yongs su bslang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214a-8: skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten snga ma de dag na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang; de dag pas kyang ches mang zhing tshad med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rgyas par bkang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214a-9: dge ba'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi char chen pos bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi mi shes pa las langs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rdul gyi me lce thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214a-10: de bas na sa 'di'ang chos kyi sprin ces bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214a-12: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu yang dga' ldan gyi gnas na @214b bzhugs pa nas bzung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214b-2: yum gyi skur bzhud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214b-8: chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214b-9: mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan pa'i bar du sems can gyi bsam pa'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214b-10: 'dul ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las thams cad byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214b-11: de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis nas 'jig rten gyi khams snga ma de dag na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag pas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa'i bar dag tu yang dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa nas bzung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214b-12: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan pa'i bar du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214b-14: de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan zhing shin tu brtags pa'i mngon par shes pa chen po thob pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214b-15: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams dog pa yangs par byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214b-16: yangs pa yang dog par byin gyis rlob bo //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214b-18: rnam par dag pa kun nas nyon mongs par byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:214b-19: de bzhin du rgya chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215a-6: gzhi mnyam pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang khyu mchog gi mthu phyung bas mngon par bsgrub pa de dang der byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215a-7: de 'dod na rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams khor yug gi 'obs dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa gcig kyang byin gyis rlob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215a-8: rdul shin tu phra ba de yang mi 'phel la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215a-9: bya ba de dag kyang yongs su rton to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215a-10: rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215a-13: lnga nas 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i bar du thams cad kyang khor yug gi 'obs dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad dang ldan par byin gyis rlob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215a-14: rdul shin tu phra ba de yang mi 'phel la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215a-15: bya ba de dag kyang yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215a-16: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis kyi rgyan yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215a-17: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i bar gyi rgyan yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215a-18: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi rgyan 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis su yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215a-19: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa dag tu yang yongs su ston to //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215b-1: sems can gyi khams ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu sdud de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215b-2: sems can de dag la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215b-3: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215b-4: sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par sdud de /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215b-6: 'dod na skra'i rtse mo gcig la sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rgyan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa gcig ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215b-7: 'dod na sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rgyan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa brjod du med pa'i bar du ston to //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215b-10: lus re re la yang de snyed kyi lag pa yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215b-11: lag pa de dag gis kyang phyogs bcur sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215b-12: lag pa re res kyang me tog gi phung po chu klung gangg'a'i bye ma snyed sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mngon par 'thor ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215b-13: me tog ji lta ba bzhin du spos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:215b-21: de bzhin du rgyan thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216a-0: lus re re la yang de snyed kyi mgo byin gyis rlob @216a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216a-1: cing; mgo re re la yang de snyed kyi lce byin gyis brlabs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216a-2: de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yon tan shin tu rjod pa byed do; ;sems bskyed pa re re la yang phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par 'gro ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216a-3: sems bskyed pa tsam gyis kyang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa tshad med pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i rgyan gyi bar du byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216a-4: dus gsum gyi lus tshad med pa yang byin gyis rlob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216a-5: rang gi lus la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang rgyan tshad med pa byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216a-7: 'du ba thams cad kyang rang gi lus la byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216a-8: rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang ba spu'i khung bu gcig nas gtong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216a-9: sems can rnams la yang gnod par mi byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216a-10: 'dod na chu'i phung po yan chad 'jig rten gyi khams gcig byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216a-11: der yang pad mo chen po byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216a-12: pad mo chen po de'i 'od rnam par phye bas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa rgyas par gang bar byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216b-0: de la yang byang chub kyi shing chen po yongs su ston pa nas rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du yang dag par @216b ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216b-1: rang gi lus la phyogs bcu'i nor bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216b-3: nyi zla'i 'od byin gyis rlob pa nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216b-4: snang ba dang 'od thams cad kyi bar du byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216b-5: kha'i dbugs kyis kyang phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa g-yo bar byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216b-6: sems can rnams 'jigs par yang mi byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216b-7: phyogs bcur rlung gis 'jig pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216b-9: chus 'jig pa yang byin gyis rlob la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216b-10: 'dod na sems can thams cad bsam pa bzhin du gzugs kyi lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216b-11: gnas yongs su brgyan par byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216b-12: rang gi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byin gyis rlob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rang gi lus byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216b-15: rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216b-17: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rdzu 'phrul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216b-19: gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:216b-20: de nas 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' la la dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:217a-2: gtsang ma'i gnas su gtogs pa kha cig 'di snyam du sems te de ltar de ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:217a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba'i spyod yul yang de ltar tshad med na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:217a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa ci 'dra ba zhig yod snyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:217a-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas 'khor de dag gi sems dang bsam pa'i rgyud shes nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:217a-6: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:217a-9: 'khor 'di dag the tshom du gyur na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:217a-10: de dag gi the tshom gcod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul rnam par phye ba cung zad cig mi bstan tam ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:217a-11: bam po lnga bcu gsum pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:217a-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po de'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:217a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi lhun dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:217a-14: rang bzhin yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:217a-17: rang bzhin yang dag par ston pa la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de nyid kyi tshe /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:217b-7: der sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon du grub par shes so //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:217b-10: der byang chub kyi shing stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcur khyab pa'i lhun can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:217b-11: stong gsum khrag khrig yongs su tshang ba tsam du yangs shing tshad med pa'i yal ga can rtse mo shin tu mtho ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:217b-12: de dang rkyen du 'bab par de'i drung gi snying po byang chub la seng ge'i khri rgya chen po byung nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:217b-13: de la de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par shes pa'i blo gros thams cad kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba snying po byang chub tu gshegs te bzhugs pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:217b-14: de ltar de na rgyan ji snyed snang bar gyur pa de dag ni bskal pa khrag khrig yongs su tshang bas kyang brjod par dka'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:217b-15: des cho 'phrul chen po 'di bstan nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:217b-16: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:218a-3: gnas gtsang ma'i ris su gtogs pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad so so'i gnas ji bzhin du bkod pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:218a-5: rmad du gyur nas mi smra bar byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po de nyid la sems shing 'khod par gyur to //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:218a-22: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la shin tu goms pa ni /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:218b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dra ba brgya stong shin tu mang pa rab tu 'thob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:218b-3: de bas byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:218b-4: lus kyi las ni byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kyi go 'phang thob cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:218b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros la gnas pa dag gis kyang shes par sla ba ma yin no //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:218b-9: yid kyi las kyang shes par sla ba ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:218b-10: rdzu 'phrul shes par sla ba ma yin no //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:218b-12: ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul la 'jug pa shes par sla ba ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:218b-13: ye shes kyi yul shes par sla ba ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:218b-14: rnam par thar pas rnam par rol pa shes par sla ba ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:218b-15: 'phrul pa'i las shes par sla ba ma yin no //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:218b-17: mtha'i las shes par sla ba ma yin pa nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:218b-18: mdor bsdu na gom pa 'dor zhing 'degs pa'i las kyi bar du yang byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kyi go 'phang thob cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:218b-19: byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang shes par sla ba ma yin te /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:219a-2: rgya cher ni bskal pa brgya stong grangs med pas kyang bstan pa'i mthar thug par mi 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:219a-21: de ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes tshad med pa mnga' ba rnams kyi chos nyid byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid kyis 'jal ba ni /
