K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230a-18: gzhal yas sems skyes sa mchog rab tu thob gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230b-0: sdig @230b pa thams cad bsal phyir rdul med rab tu dga'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230b-1: smon lam stobs dpyad dkar chos yang dag bsags byas nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230b-2: snying rje brtse ldan sa yi gong ma yongs su gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230b-3: 'gro phyir byams sems tshul khrims thos dang yon tan ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230b-4: dri med dri bral rang bzhin yongs dag bsam pa yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230b-5: 'jig rten thams cad me gsum 'bar bar mthong gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230b-6: gsum pa rnams yangs blo yis 'gro ba'i don du gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230b-7: sdug bsngal mi rtag nad pa zug rngus mi bde ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230b-8: khams gsum rtag tu sdug bsngal brgya yi me 'bar bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230b-9: 'dus byas nyes mthong rgyal ba'i legs pa mngon mos shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230b-10: ye shes 'od 'phro yangs ldan 'od 'phro yod pa gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230b-11: dran dang blo ldan lam gyi ye shes thob gyur cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230b-12: sa mchog de la sangs rgyas brgya stong bsnyen bkur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230b-13: mi yi gtso bo'i yon tan rtag tu dran byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230b-14: 'gro ba kun gyis thub dka' rgyal bar dka' ba gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230b-15: ye shes blo gros thabs dang shes rab blo dpyod pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230b-16: 'gro don mtha' yas sna tshogs bya ba bstan byas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230b-17: stobs bcu'i mchod pa sems can don rnams bsgrub byas te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230b-18: mi skye mngon sum mtha' yas sa drug yongs su gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230b-19: 'jig rten kun tu 'gro bas shes dka' spyod byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:230b-20: bdag bral byed med yod dang med pa rnam bsal ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231a-0: @231a *// rang bzhin stong chos yan lag bcu gnyis rab 'byung zhes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231a-1: phra zhing rno ba'i sems ldan bdun pa yongs su gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231a-2: thabs dang shes rab sems yangs rab tu thob gyur cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231a-3: ring du song ba gdul dka' ring du song ba gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231a-4: rang bzhin dul zhing zhi phyir du ma'i sems spangs te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231a-5: de nas nam mkha' 'dra ba'i mi g-yo yongs su gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231a-6: de la mkhas pa'i ye shes las rnams sna tshogs phyir //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231a-7: zhi ba de las bslang zhing mi yi mchog tu bsnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231a-8: dbang bcu ldan zhing 'jig rten yang dag nyid dpyod pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231a-9: rang bzhin chen po 'gro phyir legs pa'i blo gros gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231a-10: 'di la shin tu phra bar 'jig rten kun dpyad cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231a-11: sems can thibs po'i spyod ldan nyon mongs las dpyad de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231a-12: de dag gdul ba'i spyod pas yon tan mang po gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231a-13: bde gshegs mdzod thob don gyi dam pa rab tu ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231a-14: dkar chos rim gyis de 'dra'i spyod pa ldan gyur pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231a-15: sa dgu'i bar du bsod nams ye shes tshogs thob cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231a-16: rgyal ba rnams kyi stobs mchog don dam mngon 'dod pa; ;ye shes yon tan dbang bskur sangs rgyas kun las 'thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231a-17: brgya stong phrag bcu'i ting 'dzin grangs med gang yod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231b-0: spyod yul shes pas chos nyid shes @231b yangs thob gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231b-1: de yi rjes la thams cad mkhyen par dbang bskur 'thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231b-2: yul yangs ting 'dzin de dag thob pas de mi sgul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231b-3: gang tshe de yis kun mkhyen dbang bskur thob pa'i tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231b-4: padmo rgya chen rin chen kun gyis brgyan pa 'byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231b-5: de yi tshul mthun lus kyi dbus su gnas par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231b-6: rgyal ba'i sras kyis yongs bskor de la lta zhing gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231b-7: de yi 'od zer khrag khrig mtha' yas stong phrag mang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231b-8: phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal kun kyang zhi bar byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231b-9: mgo yi gtsug nas 'od zer bye ba stong byung zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231b-10: phyogs rnams kun gyi mi yi gtso bo'i 'khor du rgyu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231b-11: steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings la 'od zer dra bar gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231b-12: sangs rgyas mchod phyir brtson par rgyal ba'i zhabs su 'dong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231b-13: de tshe rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras rnams kyis kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231b-14: chos rab don du rgyal sras dbang bskur thob par mkhyen //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231b-15: mchod pa'i don du rgyal sras mtha' yas kun kyang 'ong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231b-16: de'i tshe kun mkhyen dbang bskur mi mchog mdzod spu nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231b-17: dbang bskur 'od zer dam pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231b-18: 'od zer mchog gis bskor cing spyi bo'i gtsug tu nub //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231b-19: gang tshe rgyal mchog bu yi thu bo srid mchog la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:231b-20: dbang bskur zhing du sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232a-0: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad kun nas g-yo bar @232a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232a-2: mnar med bar gyi sdug bsngal de tshe zhi zhing 'dug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232a-3: gang tshe kun mkhyen dbang gis mngon par dbang bskur ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232a-4: de phyir mkhas pas chos sprin sa mchog thob ces bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232a-5: mkhas pa 'di la gnas pa'i shes rgyud tshad med de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232a-6: sa rab 'di la gnas pa 'gro kun gtso yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232a-7: gzugs dang gzugs med de bzhin 'dod pa'i khams yangs dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232a-8: sems can khams dang zhing dang chos khams yangs pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232a-9: grangs dang grangs med nam mkha'i khams kyi bar du ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232a-10: chos dbyings yangs pa thams cad ma nor khong du chud //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232a-11: 'di la gnas pa mthu chen sprul pa'i las kun dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232a-12: de bzhin byin rlabs rgyal ba'i ye shes phra ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232a-13: mi mchog gsang ba bskal pa'i grangs rnams shes bya dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232a-14: skra rtse gcig tu 'jig rten khams rnams gzung ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232a-15: mi yi gtso bo 'byung dang sku tshe 'tshang rgya dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232a-16: 'khor lo dam pa bskor dang mya ngan 'da' ba'i rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232a-17: thams cad rab shes gong du rnam thar zhi ba dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232a-18: sngan chad ma thob kun kyang de tshe rab tu 'thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232a-19: 'di la gnas pa'i mthu che rgyal ba'i chos kyi sprin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232a-20: thams cad khong du chud byed dran pas kun kyang 'dzin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232b-0: klu rnams kun gyi sprin char rgya @232b mtsho 'dzin pa ltar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232b-1: de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos sprin char chen kun kyang 'dzin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232b-2: rgyal ba gcig las chos gang mthu chen nges thob pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232b-3: de la phyogs bcu mtha' yas zhing gi sems can rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232b-4: thams cad bde gshegs nyan thos thos pa 'dzin gyur kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thos pa'i grangs char nyer mi 'gro /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232b-6: ye shes spyod pa'i stobs kyis sngan chad spyad pa'i mthus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232b-7: skad cig yud tsam gcig tu khrag khrig zhing bkang zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232b-8: bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs nyon mongs kun kyang zhi bar byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232b-9: de phyir rgyal bas 'di ming chos kyi sprin ces gsungs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232b-10: 'di gnas mthu chen lha yi 'jig rten gtsor gyur pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232b-11: phyogs rnams kun tu mi yi gtso bo'i yul yang ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232b-12: rnam 'phrul khrag khrig stong phrag du ma yang ston te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232b-13: byang chub spyod pa de sems 'gro ba myos par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232b-14: mkhas pa legs ldan 'di gnas gom pa bor ba tsam //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232b-15: sa dgu'i bar du gnas pas shes par mi nus na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232b-16: sems can gzhan gyis shes par mi 'gyur smos ci dgos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232b-17: dus gsum nyan thos rang rgyal kun gyis de bzhin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232b-18: 'di gnas thams cad mkhyen par 'gro ba kun la ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232b-19: shes pa dus gsum kun tu thogs med zhi chos can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:232b-20: zhing rnams kun tu rgyas bkang chos rnams kun gyi bar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233a-1: ba kun gyi yon tan brjod cing ston par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233a-2: mkhas pa 'di la gnas pa sangs rgyas mchod byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233a-3: phyogs rnams kun tu zhing dang chos kyi dbyings bkang ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233a-4: rgyal ba mngon du mchod pas mchod byed 'phrogs pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233a-5: yon tan kun ldan sa yi lha yi lha zhes bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233a-6: mkhas pa 'di gnas shes rab snang bas 'gro kun gyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233a-7: mun pa kun bsal chos kyi tshul yang rab tu ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233a-8: dbang phyug dam pa'i mthu yis 'gro ba'i 'dod chags sel //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233a-9: de bas rgyal sras nyon mongs sel la mkhas zhes bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233a-10: 'di la gnas pa de dag khams gsum dbang phyug 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233a-11: ye shes tshul shes theg pa gsum po ston la mkhas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233a-12: skad cig yud tsam gcig gis ting 'dzin gcig min 'thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233a-13: phyogs bcu kun tu rgyal ba'i dam pa gcig min ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233a-14: 'di ni bdag gis rgyal sras sa rnams mdor bstan gyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233a-15: rgya cher bskal pa brgya phrag stong gis bstan mi nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233a-16: yon tan 'di 'dra'i sangs rgyas ye shes sa 'di la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233a-17: gnas pa rtag tu ri yi rgyal po bzhin mi g-yo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233a-18: rgyal sras thog ma gtsug lag kun gyis mi g-yo ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233a-19: sman gyi rnam pa kun gnas ri rgyal gangs bzhin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233a-20: tshul khrims thos pas gnyis pa spos ngad spos dang 'dra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-0: rnam 'dal @233b me tog ji bzhin gsum pa shes par bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-1: lam la mos bzhin mi 'khrugs 'od 'phro thob pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-2: drang srong gnas bzhin mkhas pa rnams kyi rten gyur pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-3: gnod sbyin gnya' shing 'dzin bzhin bsam yas lnga pa thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-4: rta rna'i shing tog 'dra bar drug pa'i 'bras bu ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-5: bdun pas 'dzin klu bzhin shes rab chen pos thob /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-6: khor yug dbang ldan bzhin du brgyad pa dbang can 'thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-7: dgu pa dri ma sel ba dpal can lha min bzhin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-8: bcu pa rgyal ba'i legs ldan ri rab lha gnas 'dra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-9: dang po smon lam sngon 'gro gong ma tshul khrims tshogs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-10: gsum pa spyod pa'i yon tan bzhi pa gcig gi dngos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-11: lnga pa dge mang drug pa shin tu zab pa'i dngos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-12: brgyad pa blo gros yangs pa kun tu gcig min rgyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-13: dgu pa mkhas pa ye shes phra zhing zab dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-14: 'gro rgyud thams cad ye shes ldan pas rab tu gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-15: bcu pa rgyal ba rnams las yang dag chos 'dzin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-16: rgyal sras spyod pa mi sgul rgya mtsho de 'dra'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-17: spyod pa bcu 'das thog ma'i sems rab skye bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-18: dka' thub brtul bas gnyis pa gsum pa bsam gtan gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-19: dag pas bzhi pa shin tu byang bas lnga pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-20: drug pa rnon pos rtogs pa bdun pa mi phyed sa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:233b-21: brgyad pa mthu chen rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan ldan pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234a-1: ldan pas thibs po'i spyod pa shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234a-2: bcu la rgyal bas dbang bskur rgyal po dbang thob bzhin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234a-3: yon tan rin chen dag pas de bzhin rim du 'phar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234a-4: phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing rnams bshig ste bgrang bar nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234a-5: rnam shes gcig gis 'gro ba kun sems shes par rung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234a-6: nam mkha'i dbyings kun skra yis gzhal bar nus srid kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234a-7: rgyal ba'i yon tan bskal pa khrag khrig bshad mi nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon par gnang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234a-9: yid dga' bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos de skad ces smras pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234a-10: bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang na bzhugs shing mngon par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234a-11: zhag bdun pa gnyis la bab pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234a-12: lha'i rgyal po dbang byed kyi gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che'i snying po can na bzhugs pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234a-13: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos bshad pa la mngon par dgyes pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234b-1: gtsang ma'i ris su gtogs pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang mngon par dga'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234b-2: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234b-3: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234b-6: bam po lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234b-7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la sogs pa thams cad kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234b-9: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234b-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234b-11: de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'khod pa bcu 'thon par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234b-12: byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'khod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:234b-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas pa sha stag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:235a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de @235a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:235a-1: dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:235a-2: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu snang ba mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:235a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zab mo'i mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:235a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:239b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la 'di skad ces smras so //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:240a-7: de bas na khyed kyis rang gi lus kun tu lta ba'i mig dang ldan par byin gyis rlobs la /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:240a-10: phyogs 'byams klas pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis rlobs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:240a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thams cad du mi gnas pa 'di la gnas pa thams cad yongs su bsal ba'i lta bas ltos shig mngon par zhen pa thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:240b-1: bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas sems shing rtog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:240b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong yod pa la 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod pa mthong bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:240b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:240b-5: de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:240b-6: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:240b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:240b-8: seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:240b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs byin pa ri dvags ae na ya'i byin pa lta bu gnyis la 'jig rten gyi khams chags pa med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:240b-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rgya mtsho chags pa med cing dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:241a-0: de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' zab mo'i chos mdzod kyi snying pos @241a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:241a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:241a-3: seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:241a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs pus mo gnyis kyi lha nga la 'jig rten gyi khams sa la [*le?] sbram yod pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:241a-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'bar ba dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:241a-7: de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi gzi brjid mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i dul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:241a-8: seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i snying po can la 'dug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:241a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku sta zur gyi dkyil 'khor la 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:241a-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba sna tshogs kyi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:241b-0: de'i sangs rgyas kyi @241b zhing nas byang chub sems dpa'i sprin sgra zab mo rnam pa tha dad pa'i mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:241b-1: seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:241b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:241b-3: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:241b-5: de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje mi phyed pa'i gtsug gi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:241b-6: seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i snying po can la 'dug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:241b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi 'od zer snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:241b-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi be'u rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:242a-1: to; ;de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' ngag gi lam mi g-yo bar kun tu 'gro ba'i 'od zer snang ba'i gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:242a-2: seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:242a-4: de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'bar ba'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:242a-5: chos ston to; ;de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' grags pa snyan par kun tu rnam par grags pa'i 'od kyi gzi brjid mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:242a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:242a-7: seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyis snying po can la 'dug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:242b-0: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal gyi gsung @242b gi dbyangs la 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:242b-1: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dpag tu med pa'i gzi brjid kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:242b-3: de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:242b-4: byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rgyal po mi g-yo ba'i 'od zer snang ba'i gzi brjid mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:242b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:242b-6: seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:242b-7: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi smin mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:242b-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dus gsum du mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:242b-10: de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' kun nas blta ba'i gzugs rnam par dmigs pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po snang ba'i gzi brjid mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:243a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye @243a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:243a-1: ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:243a-2: seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:243a-3: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu la 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi spyi'u tshugs kyi lhun yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:243a-4: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:243a-6: de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu rnam par dag pa thub pa med pa'i 'od zer snang ba'i gzi brjid mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:243a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:243a-8: seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:243a-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:243a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:243a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:243b-0: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong bar gyur @243b nas; byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad las byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:243b-1: byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang gzungs chos thams cad kyi sa la sogs pa gzungs sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thob par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:243b-2: byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdul dang bral ba'i snying po la sogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:243b-3: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad las byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang stobs kyi glog la sogs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi glog sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:243b-5: chos kyi sgo 'di dag ni bsam pa rdo rje dam pa lta bur byas te yongs su chub par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:243b-6: rim gro chen po dang ldan pa'i bsam pas yongs su bsrung bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams ma gtogs par gzhan gyi @244a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244a-1: rna lam du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos de skad ces smras pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yid dga' ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos smras pa la mngon par dga'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244a-5: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244a-6: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244a-7: kun tu bzang pos bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244a-9: bam po lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244a-10: bcom ldan 'das thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas pa pho brang 'od thams cad kyi snying po can na de bzhin du mnyam par bzhag par bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan khrag khrig brgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244a-11: thams cad kyis mi phyed pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas thob pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku shin tu dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244a-13: gnas med pa la rten pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244a-14: mi gnyis pa'i zhi gnas dang yang dag par ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244a-15: tshad med par khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244a-16: mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan gyi rgyud dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244a-17: 'gro ba thams cad kyis rnam par dmigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244b-0: @244b dus la bab pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244b-1: skad cig gcig gis byung ba'i mtshan nyid med pa la spyod pas bzhugs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa la rab tu gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244b-3: mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu lta ba rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244b-5: 'gro ba thams cad bde bar byed pa'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244b-6: bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'joms pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244b-7: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par bsgrubs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244b-8: 'gro ba thams cad du rab tu zhi bar gnas pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mi gnas pa la gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244b-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244b-10: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gtsug dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244b-11: gzhal du med pa'i blo gros dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244b-18: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244b-19: chags pa med pa'i blo gros dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:244b-22: mchod sbyin byas pa'i blo gros dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245a-1: la dbang po'i blo gros dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245a-5: skad cig gcig gi blo gros dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245a-11: sangs rgyas kyi mthu'i blo gros dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245a-12: don rnam par dmigs pa'i blo gros dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245a-14: ye shes snang ba'i blo gros dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245a-17: dngos po med pa'i mthar phyin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245a-20: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245a-23: sangs rgyas kyi rim gro la brtson pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245a-26: mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245b-0: shin tu @245b rnam par snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245b-8: smon lam khyad par du thogs pa med pas 'gro ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245b-9: ye shes kyi snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245b-11: nang gi blo gros yang dag par grub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245b-12: thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245b-13: sa'i stabs kyis rnam par gnon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245b-18: ri bo chen po'i dpal dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245b-19: rin po che chen po'i dpal dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245b-21: khams chen po'i rgyal po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245b-22: dkyil 'khor mnyam pa khong du chud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245b-23: gzi brjid gzhan gyis mi pham pa dang; klu chen po'i lta ba'i dpal dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245b-24: mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245b-25: phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245b-26: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo yang dag par 'dzin pa'i dpal dang; dran pa'i yul nyams pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245b-27: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros kyis rnam par rtogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245b-28: mtha' dang dbus med pa'i blos rnam par rol pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245b-29: mdzod zad mi shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245b-30: ye shes nyi ma'i dpal dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245b-32: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:245b-33: blo dam pa'i char 'bebs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246a-2: blta na don yod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246a-3: rdo rje'i mngon par shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246a-4: ye shes rdo rje'i blo gros dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246a-5: kun tu mig gi dpal dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246a-6: sangs rgyas kyi don gyi nyi ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246a-7: sangs rgyas kyi rdo rje yang dag par gzung ba'i bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig gi yul kun tu ye shes kyi rgyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246a-9: de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246a-10: sngon bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246a-11: dge ba'i rtsa ba la grogs su gyur pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246a-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig de'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246a-13: sangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las langs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246a-14: bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246a-15: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mos btud de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246a-16: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246a-17: gal te bdag gis zhus nas zhus pa'i lung bstan par bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye bar gnang na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246a-18: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs gcig cig zhu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246a-19: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246b-0: @246b bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu mig la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246b-1: kun tu mig khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246b-2: ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems tshim par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246b-3: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246b-4: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246b-7: rnam par thar pa du dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246b-8: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:246b-9: smon lam du ldan pa rnams ting nge 'dzin dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:251b-17: snam bu rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:251b-18: 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252a-2: dkrol ba thams cad kyi sgra mang po byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252a-3: lha'i nga ro snyan pa mang po rab tu byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snang ba chen pos khyab par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sems can rnams rnam par dag par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252a-6: ngan song gi lam gyi rgyud gsum rnam par zhi bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rnam par dag par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252a-8: byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la zhugs par gyur to /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252a-9: byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yongs su grub par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252a-10: byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252a-11: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252a-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252b-0: byang @252b chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni bdag nyid che ba la rnam par spyod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252b-1: mtshungs pa ma mchis pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252b-2: yongs su mi chod pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252b-3: slar mi ldog pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252b-4: mnyam pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252b-5: gzhan gyis mi zlog pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252b-6: chos thams cad tha mi dad pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252b-7: chos thams cad dang ma 'dres par rnam par spyod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252b-8: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi byin gyis rlabs mkhas pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252b-10: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni chos thams cad kyi dbang dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252b-12: rnam par thar pa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252b-15: de khyod kyis ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252b-16: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni yon tan grangs med pas rnam par dag pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252b-17: yon tan mtshungs pa med pas rnam par brgyan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252b-18: yon tan tshad med pas rin po che dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252b-19: yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'byung gnas rgya mtsho'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252b-20: yon tan dpag tu med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252b-21: yon tan mu med pa'i sprin to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:252b-22: yon tan sa mtshams med pas bsngags shing bstod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253a-0: chos rin po che zad mi shes @253a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253a-1: pa'o; ;byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253a-2: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yon tan brjod cing bsngags pa mi zad pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253a-4: kun tu bzang po khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253a-6: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253a-7: smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu bstan pa gang gis 'das pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253a-9: da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253a-11: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin bcu shin tu bstan pa la mkhas pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253a-12: ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po bcu shin tu bstan pa spobs par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa rab tu thob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253a-16: rjes su 'gro ba snang ba zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253a-17: 'di lta ste; byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po rab tu thob pa yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253b-0: zhing 'byams klas pa gcig nas gcig tu @253b brgyud pa'i rjes su song ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253b-2: lhag pa'i bsam pa gtsang mas spyod pa zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253b-4: 'das pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253b-6: ye shes rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253b-8: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rnam par bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyan ces bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253b-10: sems can gyi lus tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253b-12: sems can gyi khams la dbang ba zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa rab tu thob pa bcu pa chags pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po 'di bcu ni 'das pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253b-17: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:253b-20: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis ting nge 'dzin bcu po 'di dag la bsten cing bsgoms te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254a-0: shin tu brtsams pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' @254a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254a-1: yin yang sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254a-6: thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254a-7: thams cad gzigs pa zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254a-8: chags pa med pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254a-9: bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul can zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254a-10: chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug ces bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254a-11: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob pa de ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rjes su song ba yang yin la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254a-12: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas phyir log pa yang yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254a-13: sems can thams cad kyi khams su rab tu song ba'ang yin la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254a-14: sems can med pa'i mtha' yang khong du chud pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254a-15: chags pa med pa'i lus kyi snying po'i rjes su song ba'ang yin la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254a-16: chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang 'jug par spyod pa yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254a-17: chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pas kyang rnam par dag la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254a-20: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang rjes su 'brang ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rnam par mthong ba yang yin la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254b-0: spyod pa thams cad kyi @254b yang rjes su song ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254b-2: yi ge la rab tu spobs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas rnam par dag pa'ang yin la; byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par phye ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la'ang rab tu gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254b-4: rtag par dus gsum skad cig tu zhugs pa'ang yin la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254b-5: dus gsum thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par gzhol ba'ang yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254b-6: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos ston pa'ang yin la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254b-7: thabs kyis chos thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog pa'i lus dang yang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254b-10: da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rnam par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i tshul la yang rab tu zhugs la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254b-11: sangs rgyas gcig mngon par sangs rgyas pas sangs rgyas thams cad du'ang shin tu ston pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254b-12: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi rnam pa'i tshul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254b-13: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes rnam par sbyang ba'i tshul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254b-14: thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal mtshan gzhan gyis mi pham pa'i tshul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:254b-15: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255a-1: dpa'i mngon par shes pa rnon po dang 'grogs pa'i tshul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255a-2: gzungs dang spobs pa thams cad kyi tshul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255a-3: dus gsum tha mi dad pa'i tshul lo; ;'das pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255a-5: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255a-6: sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu dgod pa'i tshul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255a-7: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu bstan pa'i tshul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mthu mi zad pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi stobs thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255a-9: 'pho ba med pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur ba'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad med pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255a-10: chos kyi rgyal srid la 'gro ba dbang bskur ba'i phyir dbang mtha' yas par bsgyur ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255a-11: stobs bcu shin tu yangs pa'i tshul thob pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad du tshad med pa'i ye shes thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255a-12: rab tu zhi ba'i mtha' la zhugs pas nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems rab tu bsgoms pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255a-13: shugs dang ldan pa'i rtsal ba dog pas snying rje chen po'i seng ge yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255b-0: yon tan dang @255b bsngags pa thams cad dang ldan pas chos kyi sgron ma la yang dag par gzhol zhing mi zad pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255b-1: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255b-2: chos shes shing khong du chud pas gnas kyi mthar phyin pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255b-5: brda thams cad la sna tshogs su shin tu bstan pa byed par mkhas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255b-6: chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa mkhas pa la zhugs pas mtshan ma med pa la mos pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' chen pos rnam par dag pas rigs dang rgyud rnam par dag pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255b-8: gzhi med pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyis chos kyi gzhi rab tu dbye ba'i snying po'i rjes su song ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255b-9: chos yongs su gtong ba la brtson pas dus thams cad du mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255b-10: shes par bya ba thams cad khong du chud pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255b-11: sems can gyi nang na mkhas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255b-12: skye dgu thams cad shin tu dag par byed pas mtha' yas pa rnam par spyod pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255b-13: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rnam par sangs rgyas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255b-14: 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i spyod pa yang dag par ston pas byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi thabs la mkhas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:255b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis zad mi shes pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256a-1: mkhyen pa'i yul rnam par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba la mkhas pas cho 'phrul chen po ston pa yin gyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256a-2: de bas na kun tu bzang po byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bcu bo 'di dag rgya cher spros te bshad pas bstan par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di dag thams cad nyan par 'dod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256a-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256a-5: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang gsol ba btab par shes nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256a-6: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256a-9: bcu bo 'di rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma lus par mthar thug pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256a-12: sangs rgyas skye ba khong du chud pa'i ye shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256a-13: sems can dri ma med pa mngon par bsgrubs par bya ba'i ye shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256a-14: 'jig rten gyi khams mig yor lta bur shes pa'i ye shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256a-15: chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i ye shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256a-16: byang chub sems dpa' rab tu gzung ba la mkhas pa'i ye shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256b-0: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i thabs yongs @256b su gnon pa'i ye shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256b-1: don thams cad dang ldan pa'i chos kyi lhag mthong la mkhas pa'i ye shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256b-2: byang chub kyi sems kyi mthu'i rjes su song ba'i ye shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256b-3: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam dang byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256b-6: de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma lus par mthar thug pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256b-12: sems can thams cad nye bar gzung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256b-13: yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256b-15: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256b-17: sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur zhing mchod pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256b-19: sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar bya ba'i mig tshad med pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:256b-21: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:257a-1: par gzung zhing nyams pa med par bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:257a-3: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i bye brag tha dad pa rnam par dbye ba la mkhas par khong du chud pa bskyed pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:257a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub kyi mtshams sbyar ba'i stobs la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:257a-7: thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas pas shin tu phra bar dmigs shing yongs su mnan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu bstan pa'i phyir sems ba skyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:257a-9: sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:257a-11: khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:257a-13: sangs rgyas kyi tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa mngon du bya bar lhag pa'i bsam pa yang dag par gtang zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:257a-14: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par blang ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:257b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi @257b dkyil 'khor du 'jug cing lus sna tshogs kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:257b-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'o //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:258a-15: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo gcig tu byin gyis brlabs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:258a-16: padmo gcig po de rang gi skyil mo krung gis rgyas par khyab par byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:258a-17: rang gi lus de las kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:258a-18: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der yang gling bzhi pa khrag khrig phrag brgya ston to; ;gling bzhi pa khrag khrig brgya po re re zhing yang bdag gi lus re re byin gyis rlob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:258b-0: lus de dag re re la'ang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams @258b khrag khrig brgya brgya ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:258b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi gling bzhi pa re rer yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa khrag khrig brgya brgya yang dag par ston te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:258b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de dag re re la yang mos pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya brgya mngon par bsgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:258b-3: mos pa de dag re re la'ang dbang po sna tshogs rnam par phye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya brgya yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob par bya ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:258b-4: dbang po sna tshogs rnam par phye ba de dag re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig brgya brgya phyir mi ldog pa'i lam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i chos la rab tu gzhog go /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:258b-7: mnyam par bzhag pa'ang nyams par 'gyur ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:258b-11: lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:258b-12: de'i rang bzhin gyi lus ni dpag tshad bdun brgya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:258b-13: de'i sprul ba'i lus ni dpag tshad brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:258b-14: de'i lus phyed rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na 'dug kyang lus kyi stod gyen du 'phags pa ri rab kyi rtse mo dang mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:259a-0: lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan de sprul pa'i lus dpag tshad brgya stong phrag drug @259a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:259a-1: cu rtsa brgyad pa des sngon gyi lus 'jig par mi byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:259a-2: sngon skyes pa'i phung po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:259a-4: skye mched kyang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro; ;lus chen po de yod pas kyang sprul pa'i lus la gzhan du 'du shes par mi 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:259a-5: lus snga ma shi 'phos pa'i 'du shes kyang med la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:259a-6: gsar du skyes pa'i lus kyis kyang nyams dga' ba rab tu thob pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:259a-7: sprul pa'i lus des mthu dang dbang byed par dbang sgyur bar yang yang dag par ston pa na rmongs shing 'khrul bar 'gyur ba'ang med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:259a-8: lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan de ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:259a-13: dregs pa dang ldan yang rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:259a-14: rgya mtsho'i nang gi khyim na 'dug bzhin du rnam pa de lta bu'i sprul pa'i lus kyis mngon par 'phags na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:259b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam par rab tu rtogs pa 'jig rten thams cad na dpe med pa mig yor dang mnyam par rab tu zhugs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas skyes pa'i sprul pa rnam par dmigs pa lta bur khong du chud pa sgra dbyangs rnam par dmigs pa thams cad ri'i brag ca lta bur @259b shes pa yang dag pa'i chos rab tu mthong ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:259b-1: chos ji lta ba bzhin gyi lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:259b-2: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing dang ba'i chos la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:259b-3: sems kyi rang bzhin dngos po med par rab tu rtogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:259b-4: lus kyi yul tshad med pa la gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:259b-5: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes snang bas byang chub kyi spyod pa rnam par sbyangs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te; de ting nge 'dzin chen po de la gnas pas cung zad du 'khrul pa'ang med na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:259b-6: blong zhing rmongs par 'gyur ba med pa lta ci smos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:259b-7: de lus kyi stod lha'i 'jig rten du 'phags par byin gyis rlob cing lus kyi smad 'dod pa'i khams na 'dug par byin gyis rlob kyang shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas rab tu sbyar ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po des /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:259b-8: lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan de yang rang gi lus kyi nang du rlag pa des lus chen po ston cing spyoms pa'i skye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:259b-9: rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyang lus kyi nang du rlag par byin gyis rlob bo //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:260a-0: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang lus su 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad @260a *//

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:260a-10: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes rjes su 'gro ba snang ba zhes bya'o; ;kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:260a-11: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams re re la byin gyis rlob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:260a-12: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag re re yang lus rnam par dmigs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yang dag par ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:260a-13: lus de dag re re las kyang 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'gyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:260b-0: 'od zer re re la yang kha dog stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig @260b rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yang dag par ston te /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:260b-3: de la yang byang chub sems dpa' des 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu shes so //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:260b-12: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams la de ltar 'jug kyang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:261a-0: @261a *// bam po lnga bcu drug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:261a-4: lha'i bu nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe ri rab ri'i rgyal po 'khor bar gnas pa'i rin po che'i ri bdun la 'char bar 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:261a-5: ri bdun po de dag la shar nas ri mtshams kyi gnas bdun po shin tu rub pa de dag tu'ang snang ba'i tshul gyis kun tu 'char ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:261a-6: de yang rin po che'i ri bdun po gser gyi mdog can de dag la nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan snang bas ri bdun gyi nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan ri mtshams bdun po de dag tu snang ba'i tshul gyis 'char bar 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:261a-7: ri mtshams bdun po de dag kyang gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:261a-8: de dag las kyang ri bdun po de dag la gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du nyi ma'i 'od 'char zhing rnam par dmigs par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:261a-9: de ltar na gcig gis gcig snang bar bya ba'i tshul du ri mtshams de dag tu nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan shar cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:261a-10: rin po che'i ri de dag la nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan 'byung bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:261a-11: de'i phyir rin po che'i ri rnams las nyi ma 'char zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:261a-12: de ltar gcig nas gcig tu snang ba rnam par dmigs pa brgyud pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug pa med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:261a-13: de ltar snang ba yang dngos po yang ma yin /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:261b-5: phyi rol na gnas pa yang ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:261b-6: de dag dang bral bar gnas pa yang ma yin no //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:261b-10: chos rnams kyi rang bzhin yang yongs su mi spong ngo //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:261b-13: byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig rten gyi khams la rnam par rtog pa'ang ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:261b-14: byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshan ma rnam par 'jig par byed pa ma yin no //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:262a-0: byang chub sems dpa' de de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin gnas pa de @262a *//

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:262a-17: sprin chen po las char 'bab pa yang ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:262a-18: gnam stong pa las char 'bab pa yang ston to //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:262a-20: de ltar bstan pas nyi ma gcig po 'jig par mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:262a-21: nyi ma gcig pos kyang nyin zhag dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:262a-25: sgyu ma bstan pa'i dus kyis kyang yun ring po rnam par dmigs pa zad par mi 'gyur ro //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263a-4: yud tsam thang cig tu bcas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263a-6: dus mtshams su bcas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263a-13: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263a-18: tshad med par bcas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263a-19: sangs rgyas skye bar bcas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor du bcas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263a-21: 'dul ba'i sems can du bcas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263a-22: sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul ba'i yul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263a-23: thams cad du byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263a-24: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par bcas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263a-28: gnas snod du mas gang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263a-30: sems can gyi ris bsam gyis mi khyab par bcas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263a-34: rin po che sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263a-35: rin po che du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263a-36: las dang rnam par smin pa sna tshogs rnam par dag par bcas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag la 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu @263b 'jug pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263b-2: 'jig rten du gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263b-7: rab tu shes par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263b-8: khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263b-9: de la yang dag par 'jug pa yang mi zad pa'i ye shes kyis thob par gyur par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma nor bar lta'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263b-10: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag rnam par 'jig par mi byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263b-11: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam par 'jig par mi byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263b-14: chos thams cad la srog med pa'i chos la yongs su rab tu zhugs pa ste; byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263b-15: byed pa med pa'i chos la rab tu zhugs pas spyod pa thams cad la rlom sems med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263b-17: 'jig rten thams cad nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la brtson pas bdag med pa la spyod pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:263b-19: lus thams cad la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lta bas sems can med pa la spyod pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264a-0: skye ba dang 'jig pa thams cad chos kyi rgyud kyi rgyu las byung @264a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264a-1: ba'i chos su rtogs pas gang zag med pa la spyod pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264a-3: chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag par blang ba la zhugs pas shed can dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264a-4: shed las skyes pa med pa la gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264a-6: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pas byed pa po med pa la spyod pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264a-8: chos thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa rnam par phye ba gcig gis spyod pas rnam par mi rtog pa la spyod pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264a-10: chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i chos nyid kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264a-12: thabs kyi rnam grangs la mkhas shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264a-13: sems can gdul ba la brtson pas snying rje chen po la spyod pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264a-14: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi khams gcig rnam par gzhog pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264a-15: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dgod pa grangs med pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264a-16: bskal pa grangs med pa'i rgyud rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i 'jug pa grangs med pa yang dag par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264a-18: sangs rgyas grangs med pa'i rjes su yang dag par 'brang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par @264b rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis chos bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de la bdag yang dag par spyod par mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264b-2: 'di nas kyang bdag gud du g-yo ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264b-3: de dag dang bdag tu tha dad pa med par yang rab tu shes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264b-4: chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas kyang rgyun chad pa med par rab tu 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264b-5: ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug cing phyir mi ldog pa'ang rab tu shes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264b-7: sgyu ma'i mkhan po des 'di la gnas shing sgyu ma thams cad ston kyang sgyu ma'i sprul pa des /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264b-8: sa 'di skyon can du'ang mi 'gyur la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264b-9: sgyu ma'i sprin de dag gis kyang sa 'di rlan par mi 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264b-10: sgyu ma'i nyi ma des mun pa'i grangs su bya ba 'di dag bsal bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264b-11: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yul la zhing du 'jug pa'ang byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264b-12: 'jig rten ma yin pa'i yul la 'jig rten yang rab tu shes /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264b-13: gzugs med pa'i yul la gzugs su byin gyis rlob pa yang shin tu ston te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264b-14: gcig gis gnyis pa 'jig par mi byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264b-15: gnyis pas kyang gcig 'jig par mi byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:264b-16: de ni des 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad sgyu ma'i dra bar chos kyi rang bzhin la 'jug pas rab tu shes shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265a-0: ye shes kyi rang bzhin la 'jug pa @265a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265a-1: dang; las kyi rang bzhin la 'jug pas khong du chud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265a-2: las kyi rang bzhin ye shes kyi rang bzhin du rab tu bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265a-3: ye shes kyi rang bzhin du las thams cad rab tu spyod pas de'i phyir rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265a-6: sgyu ma'i mkhan po de ni sgyu ma'i rnam pa ston na sa med par yongs su ston pa ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265a-7: skye bo'i tshogs sna tshogs med par yongs su ston pa yang ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265a-8: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nam mkha'i rang bzhin med par 'jig rten thams cad la yongs su 'jug pa'ang ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265a-9: 'jig rten gyi rnam pa med par nam mkha'i rang bzhin la 'jug pa'ang ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265a-11: nam mkha'i rang bzhin yang 'jig rten dang tha mi dad /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265a-12: 'jig rten gyi rnam pa yang nam mkha'i rang bzhin dang tha mi dad de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265a-13: byang chub sems dpa' de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin de la 'jig rten gyi yul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265a-14: las sna tshogs kyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs la rab tu 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265a-18: khong du chud par byed do; ;rtog par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265b-0: sems skad cig gis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i @265b 'jig pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265b-1: 'du ba'i rnam pa yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265b-2: bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rnam pa la brtson par bya ba'ang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265b-3: skad cig gcig gis bskal pa de dag gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i dus thams cad dbang du byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265b-4: sems kyi skad cig re re la bskal pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265b-5: dus rnam par dmigs pas mang du byed pa de yang lus las gzhan du mi byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265b-6: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pa sgyu ma la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu slob cing yongs su grub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ye shes sgyu ma'i mthar phyin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265b-7: 'jig rten sgyu ma'i grangs kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265b-8: chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265b-9: 'jig rten dang 'gal ba med pa'i ye shes sgyu ma'i mthar phyin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265b-10: dus gsum sgyu ma tha mi dad par khong du chud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265b-11: mngon par shes pa sgyu ma nges par rtogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265b-12: sems sgyu ma mtha' yas shing mu med pa la rab tu zhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265b-13: sangs rgyas thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du yang dag par mos par byas pa'i phyir te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:265b-14: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rab tu 'jug cing rnam par spyod kyang thams cad du chags pa med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266a-4: sgyu ma byed pa ni mig 'phrul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266a-5: sgyu ma thams cad ston kyang yongs su ston pa yang med do /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266a-6: de la rmongs par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266a-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i pha rol tu'ang phyin la chos la zhugs pas rlom ba yang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266a-10: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266a-12: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266a-13: shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 'das shing der sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go ;'jig rten gyi khams de dag ji snyed 'das pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266a-14: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu'ang 'jig rten gyi khams la lar nyi ma rangs par snyoms par 'jug go /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-1: la lar nyi ma gung gi thun gyi dus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-2: la lar phyi dro'i thun gyi dus /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-4: la lar yud tsam gcig gi dus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-5: la lar thang gcig gi dus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-7: la lar yud du yan man gyi dus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-8: la lar zla ba gcig gi dus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-10: la lar lo brgya stong gi dus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-11: la lar lo bye pa brgya stong gi dus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-12: la lar lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi dus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-13: la lar bskal pa gcig gi dus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-14: la lar bskal pa brgya'i dus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-15: la lar bskal pa stong gi dus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-16: la lar bskal pa brgya phrag stong gi dus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-17: la lar bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi dus /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-19: la lar bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i dus; la lar bskal pa mu med pa'i dus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-20: la lar bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i dus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-21: la lar bskal pa grangs med pa'i dus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-22: la lar bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-23: la lar bskal pa gzhal du med pa'i dus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-24: la lar bskal pa bgrang du med pa'i dus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-25: la lar bskal pa sa mtshams med pa'i dus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-26: la lar bskal pa brjod du med pa'i dus su snyoms par 'jug kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:266b-27: byang chub sems dpa' des chos sgyu ma de dag ring du gnas par sems par mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267a-1: su 'brang bar yang mi sems te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267a-2: byang chub sems dpa' de dus rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs de dag la mngon par chags par yang mi byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267a-4: par zhen pa yang mi byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267a-5: dbang du yang mi byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267a-8: chos thams cad la nyams pa med par gzhol bas byams pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267a-9: ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pas ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267a-13: lha'i bu nyi ma ni nyin par snang bar byed cing 'gro yang nyin par dang yang 'grogs pa med /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267a-14: mtshan mo dang yang mi 'grogs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267a-15: 'gro ba'i tshe yang nyin mor snang la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267a-16: nub nas kyang mtshan mor snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267a-17: 'on kyang nyin par yang skyed pa med la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267a-18: mtshan mo yang bshig pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267a-19: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag tu snyoms par zhugs shing grangs su brjod pas rnam par ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267a-21: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes zhing 'byams klas pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267b-1: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267b-2: sems can gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi skur mngon par mos par byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267b-3: des de bzhin gshegs ba shin tu mang pos mthong bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la spos kyi rnam pa'i mchog thams cad kyis mchod pa byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267b-5: me tog sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba thams cad kyis mchod pa byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267b-6: zhing yangs pa'i rnam pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod pa byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267b-7: rgyan gyi rnam pa 'gro ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267b-8: 'gro ba thams cad kyi rin po che sna tshogs tshad med pas kun tu yog pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267b-9: rgyan rnam par phye ba'i tshogs kyi rnam pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267b-10: nor bu rin po che sna tshogs dam pa'i gtsug lag khang gi rnam pa grangs med pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267b-11: lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i mnab stsal dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:267b-12: zhal zas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnam pa dam pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:268a-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa ma lus pa sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur @268a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:268a-2: mchod pa'i rnam par gtogs pas sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gro bya ba'i tshul dang ldan par mchod pa byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:268a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi zhabs la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing lus thams cad kyis rab tu 'bebs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:268a-4: rje sar zhu ba rnams kyang byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:268a-5: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang shin tu rtogs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:268a-6: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yang rab tu 'dzin to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:268a-7: sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid kyang khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:268a-8: de bzhin nyid la yang yang dag par 'jug pas rab tu 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:268a-9: snying rje chen po'i rjes su 'brang ba'ang rab tu byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:268a-10: chags pa med pa'i stobs rab tu spel ba la'ang mngon par mos shing /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:268a-12: sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo'i rjes su yang rab tu 'brang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:268a-13: skad cig gcig gis mthar yang rab tu 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:268a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag 'byung ba'i tshe'ang skye ba mi dmigs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:268a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe'ang 'jig pa mi dmigs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:268a-19: g-yeng ba'i sems kyis yul rnam par dmigs pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:268b-0: dmigs @268b pa gang las kyang ma byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:268b-1: sems rnam par mi dmigs pa'i tshe yang dmigs pa gang las kyang 'gag par mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:268b-3: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag 'byung ba'i tshe /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:273b-8: byang chub sems dpa' de ni chos thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i rgya bcus btab pa yin te /
