K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:288b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:288b-10: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:288b-11: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:288b-12: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan yongs su rdzogs shing dag pas rnam par dag la 'od gsal shing rgyan bzang bo shin tu mang bas rnam pa du mar brgyan cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:288b-13: rin po che bzang po sna tshogs kyis shin tu gang bar mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-0: de na bskal pa brgyar yang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod cing gnas @289a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-3: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-4: bskal pa tshad med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-5: bskal pa grangs med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-6: bskal pa dpag tu med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-7: bskal pa mu med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-8: bskal pa bgrang du med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-9: bskal pa mtha' yas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-10: bskal pa mtshungs pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-11: bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-12: bskal pa gzhal du med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-13: bskal pa brjod du med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-14: bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-15: bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-16: yongs su rgyun mi gcod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-17: de na de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de mnyam par bzhag pas snyoms par 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-19: de de ltar ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-21: 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par bsgrub pa dag kyang rab tu spyod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-22: der yang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-23: chos kyi dbyings khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-24: dus shes par bya ba rab tu rtogs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289a-25: chos bstan pa shin tu byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289b-0: chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa'i rgyud yongs su rdzogs @289b par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289b-1: chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang gis mig tha dad pa med pa'ang khong du chud pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289b-2: rna ba tha dad pa med pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289b-3: sna tha dad pa med pa la mkhas par gyur pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289b-4: lce tha dad pa med pa'i bslab pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289b-5: lus tha dad pa med pa shin tu grub pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289b-6: sems tha dad pa med pa'i rjes su song zhing khong du chud pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289b-7: de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas gzungs khrag khrig stong phrag bcu'i chos snang ba 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289b-8: spyod pa yongs su dag pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu yongs su 'grub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289b-9: dbang po thams cad mngon par shes pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu rab tu gnon to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289b-10: mngon par shes pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289b-11: ting nge 'dzin khrag khrig stong phrag bcu yongs su gnon to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289b-12: rdzu 'phrul khrag khrig stong phrag bcu yongs su 'grub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289b-13: stobs khrag khrig stong phrag bcu rnam par 'phel lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289b-14: bsam pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289b-15: byin gyi rlabs khrag khrig stong phrag bcu yang dag par ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289b-16: rnam par 'phrul pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:289b-17: byang chub sems dpa'i chags pa med pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu yang dag par 'grub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs khrag khrig stong phrag bcu @290a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs khrag khrig stong phrag bcus yongs su sbyor zhing kun tu 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrag khrig stong phrag bcus yongs su snang bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290a-4: don khrag khrig stong phrag bcu shin tu ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290a-5: smon lam khrag khrig stong phrag bcu dang yang dag par ldan no; ;yongs su bsngo ba khrag khrig stong phrag bcu shin tu ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu yongs su dag par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290a-7: chos kyi sgo khrag khrig stong phrag bcu rab tu snang bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i bstan pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dag pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu rnam par dag par byed de; byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yon tan gyi tshogs du ma dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290a-10: yon tan gyi tshogs tshad med pa dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290a-11: yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290a-12: yon tan gyi tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290a-13: yon tan gyi tshogs mtshungs pa med pa dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290a-14: yon tan gyi tshogs gzhal du med pa dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290b-0: yon @290b tan gyi tshogs brjod du med pa dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290b-1: yon tan gyi tshogs zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290b-2: yon tan gyi tshogs kun tu mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290b-3: yon tan gyi tshogs de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' shin tu sbyangs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290b-4: yang dag par byang bar byas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290b-7: yang dag par grub par byas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290b-8: yang dag par brjod pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290b-10: mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan par byas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290b-12: shar phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan mthun pa'i mtshan gcig la yang rnam par brtag cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290b-13: rnam par dbye ba'i rnam pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mnga' zhing mtshan gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du mtshan re re las rnam par brtag cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290b-14: rnam par dbye ba'i rnam pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mnga' ba sha stag gis byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290b-15: shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:290b-16: de bzhin du nub phyogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291a-1: dang; de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291a-2: de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291a-3: de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291a-4: de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291a-5: de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291a-6: de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan rnam par dgod pa gcig tu mthun pa sha stag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291a-7: byang chub sems dpa' de la byin gyis rlob pa mdzad cing zhal mngon par ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291a-8: byang chub sems dpa' de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa yang byin gyis rlob pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kyi thu bor brjod pa'i phyir lus tshad med pa yang rab tu brjod pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang rab tu bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan tshad med pa'ang shin tu brjod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i shangs mi bsnyengs pa'i dgongs pa dang ldan pa yang rab tu bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kyi thu bo'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa yang yang dag par bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul rjes su bsgrags pa yang rab tu bshad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub mtha' dang dbus med pa yang @291b dag par sbyang ba mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dgongs pas rnam par dag pa'ang thob par mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo phyir mi ldog pa yang yang dag par ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor mtha' yas pa yang rnam par dmigs pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ldem po dag mtha' yas pa la'ang rab tu gzhug pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang yang dag par brjod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnyam pa nyid la'ang yang dag par zhugs pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang rgyud dus kyi tshad dang mnyam pa yang rab tu brjod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rnam pa dang bye brag thams cad kyang shin tu bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam par dmigs par bya ba'ang rab tu brjod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing bstan pa yang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung chos kyi sprin gyi char yang rab tu 'bebs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par dmigs par bya ba yang yongs su bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291b-13: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yang rab tu brjod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:291b-14: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor kun nas 'dus pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang rnam par dmigs pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:292a-0: @292a *// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang byin gyis brlab par mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:292a-1: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyang yang dag par bstan to; ;chos thams cad mi 'pho zhing rgyun 'chad pa med pa yang khong du chud par mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:292a-2: chos kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba yang rab tu rdzogs par mdzad do; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan tshad med pa yang yongs su bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:292a-3: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad sbyang ba yang khong du chud par mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:292a-4: sems sgyu ma lta bu mthar thug pa med pa yang rab tu bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:292a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:292a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtshan tha dad pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:292a-8: mtshan re re zhing yang rnam par dbye ba'i bye brag sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mnga' ba mtshan de dag re re'i rnam par dbye ba'i rnam grangs kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:292a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mnga' ba dag gis mtha' dang dbus med pa'i tshul du lus kyang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:292b-0: chags pa med pa'i tshul du sems kyang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad @292b do; ;chos thams cad nyams pa med pa la gzhol bar dran pa'ang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:292b-1: chos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par blo gros kyang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:292b-2: chos thams cad shin tu 'dzin par rig pa'ang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:292b-3: chos thams cad yangs shing 'byams klas pa'i tshul du blo yang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:292b-4: mngon par shes pa rnon pos chos tha mi dad pa mkhas pas khong du chud par dbang po tshad med pa'ang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:292b-5: byin gyi rlabs kyis chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa'i tshul du spyod yul thogs pa med pa yang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:292b-6: bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rnam par dag par ye shes la 'jug pa'ang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:292b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par ston par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'ang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:292b-9: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rgya mtsho'i sgo bcu la shin tu rtogs pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:292b-11: 'di ltar sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bas rtogs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:292b-12: sems can rgya mtsho ming gis khong du chud pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:292b-13: chos rgya mtsho ye shes kyis rab tu rtogs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293a-0: zhing rgya mtsho la dngos po med par @293a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293a-2: mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i bsam pas rjes su 'brang ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293a-3: yon tan rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs pas rab tu rtogs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293a-4: ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho rnam par dmigs pas khong du chud pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293a-5: dbang po rgya mtsho rnam par phye ba la mkhas pa'i sa'i ye shes kyis khong du chud pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293a-6: sems rgya mtsho sems can gyi ris thams cad kyi sems tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293a-8: sems tshad med pa yongs su shes pas khong du chud pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293a-9: spyod pa rgya mtsho smon lam gyis yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293a-10: smon lam rgya mtsho mtha' las brgal bar 'byung ba rnam par dag pas yongs su grub par byed pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293a-11: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' de rgya mtsho'i sgo bcu la shin tu rtogs pa rnams so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293a-12: byang chub sems dpa' de ni mchog tu bya ba bcu 'thob pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293a-14: 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi phul du bya ba 'thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293a-15: lha thams cad kyi mchog tu bya ba 'thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293a-16: tshangs pa khyu mchog thams cad kyi nang na chags pa med pa 'thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293a-17: 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa 'thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293a-18: 'gro ba thams cad kyis mi thub pa 'thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293a-19: 'gro ba thams cad dang tha mi dad pa 'thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293b-0: lam gyi rgyud thams cad nas 'byung ba 'thob @293b pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293b-1: skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug 'thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293b-2: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang 'thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293b-3: 'byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad la stobs dang shugs 'thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293b-4: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas mchog tu bya ba bcu 'thob pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293b-5: byang chub sems dpa' de ni stobs bcus sems can gyi khams su nan tan byed pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293b-7: 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i stobs kyis 'byung ba'i ded dpon du 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293b-8: brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293b-9: chags pa med pa'i stobs kyis dri ma med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293b-10: zhi ba'i stobs kyis sgrib pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:293b-11: sems kyi rgyud yongs su bsgyur ba'i stobs kyis chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:298b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams @298b cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:298b-1: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas sems can thams cad dga' bar bya ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i phyogs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:298b-2: ji ltar chu klung chen po de dag gis lan bdun du bskor ba'i bar gyi gling rnams /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:298b-6: punda ri kas kun nas yog pa de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:298b-7: byang chub sems dpa' bar ma dor 'dul bar ma gyur ba'i sems can rnams la btang snyoms su gzhog pa yang ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis kun tu khyab pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:298b-8: sangs rgyas mthong bas rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:298b-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag cing rdul med pas yid du 'ong ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:298b-10: ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa rin po che'i shing gis yongs su 'khor ba de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:298b-11: byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba ston na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:298b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gis kun nas 'khor cing brgyan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:298b-13: ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang dpag tshad lnga bcu yod la dang zhing rnyog pa med pa dang gsal ba de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:298b-14: byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i sems kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis yongs su rgyas pas dang zhing rnyog pa med la gsal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:298b-15: mtha' dang dbus med pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:299a-0: ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa rin po che'i pha gus @299a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:299a-2: tsan dan dri zhim po'i bsung dang ldan pa de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:299a-3: byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i sems kyang ye shes rin po che khrag khrig stong phrag bcus shin tu brgyan cing khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam gyi ye shes dang ldan la dge ba'i rtsa ba dri zhim po thams cad dang ldan pa'o; ;ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang rin po che thams cad kyi gram bus yongs su brgyan cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:299a-4: nor bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par gyur pa de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:299a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes phra bas khong du chud pa'i dran pa yang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po ches rnam par brgyan cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:299a-6: de ltar byung ba'i chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas la rnam par spyod pas tshul dang dus shes par bya ba thams cad la zhugs pa yin; ji ltar klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa gtse ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:299a-7: mi bde ba thams cad las rnam par 'das pa de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:299a-8: byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten gyi gtse ba dang; 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:299a-9: 'jig rten thams cad du snang bar gnas kyang 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi gos pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:299b-0: ji ltar chu klung chen po bzhi @299b po de dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling mngon par brlan cing yongs su brlan nas rgya mtsho chen po la zhen par 'dong ba de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:299b-1: byang chub sems dpa' yang ye shes kyi chu klung chen po bzhis lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:299b-3: dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgur bcas pa mngon par brlan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:299b-4: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes rgya mtsho stobs bcus rnam par brgyan pa la zhen par 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:299b-7: smon pa'i ye shes kyi chu klung 'gro ba thams cad bskyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:299b-8: 'gro ba thams cad gdul ba'i phyir rgyun mi 'chad par 'gro ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:299b-10: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i chu klung byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pas rab tu dang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:299b-11: sems can gyi khams thams cad la phan 'dogs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:299b-12: mi zad pa'i rgyun gyi mthar thug pas dus gsum gyi ye shes rgya mtsho la zhen par 'bab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:299b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i mnyam pa med pa'i ye shes kyi chu klung ting nge 'dzin rin po che grangs med pas brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:299b-15: sangs rgyas thams cad lta zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la zhen par 'bab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300a-0: snying rje chen po'i ye shes kyi chu klung byams pa chen po'i dbang du 'gyur ba 'gro ba thams cad nas phyir mi ldog cing 'gro ba thams cad nye bar @300a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300a-2: thabs mkhas pa'i mtshams sbyor ba grangs med pas yongs su gdung ba zhi bar byed cing stobs bcu rgya mtsho la zhen par 'bab pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300a-3: ji ltar chu klung chen po bzhi po de dag mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho la zhen par 'dong ba de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300a-4: byang chub sems dpa' yang khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes zad mi shes pa'i mthar thug par 'gro zhing rnam par 'tshang rgya bar rnam par rol pas rnam par 'tshang rgya ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300a-5: ji ltar chu klung chen po bzhi po de dag rgya mtsho chen po zhen par 'dong zhing phyir mi ldog pa de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300a-6: byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi rgyun ma chad par byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam la rab tu brtson pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par bsgrub pa las phyir mi ldog cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300a-7: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub chos thams cad la bsgribs pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300a-8: chags pa med pa la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho zhen par 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300a-9: ji ltar chu klung chen po bzhi po de dag bskal par gnas shing skyo ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300a-10: yongs su skyo ba med par rgya mtsho la zhen par 'dong ba de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300a-11: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300b-0: smon @300b lam la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang phyi ma'i mtha' mur thug pa'i bskal par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas yongs su mi skyo bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtshor rgyun ma chad par rjes su gzhol zhing zhen par 'gro ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300b-1: ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa de rin po che sna tshogs kyi mdog ltar 'dug cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300b-2: dngul gyi bye ma'i mdog tu snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300b-3: gser gyi bye ma'i mdog tu snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300b-4: rdo rje'i bye ma'i mdog tu snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300b-5: bee d'urya'i bye ma'i mdog tu snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300b-6: nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis phog na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs su mngon zhing snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300b-7: nyi ma'i 'od zer dang phrad na mtsho chen po ma dros pa de dmigs pa thams cad kyi gzugs su gyur par snang yang lus kyi gzugs su snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300b-8: rin po che sna tshogs kyi rnam pa snang bar gyur pa de dag gcig gis gcig bdo zhing phan tshun du gnod par 'gyur ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300b-9: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pas rang gi lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu re rer yang de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:300b-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301a-3: de dag thams cad kyang mnyes par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshad med pa la'ang yid ches shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301a-5: khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301a-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301a-7: chos nyan pas kyang bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bye ba khrag khrig 'da' bar byed kyang yun ring po'i 'du shes kyang mi skye /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301a-8: yun thung ngu'i 'du shes kyang mi skye'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301a-9: ba spu'i bu ga de dag tu'ang de'i lus la mi bde pa med cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301a-10: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa de dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301a-13: sems can gyi khams sna tshogs 'khod pa de dag la'ang gnod pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301a-15: de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301a-16: sems shin tu phra bas mtha' dang dbus med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301a-17: las kyi rnam par smin pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301a-18: dpe med pa'i tshul la 'jug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301a-19: ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul rtogs par gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301a-20: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul rnam par sgrub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301a-21: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301a-22: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa tshad med pa bsgrub par dka' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su 'dzin pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301b-2: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301b-3: dmigs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301b-4: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pas skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301b-5: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de sems skad cig la snyoms par zhugs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301b-6: rnam par ldang yang yun ring po yang 'jig par mi byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301b-7: mngon par zhen par yang mi ltung /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301b-8: dmigs pa thams cad la'ang gnas pa med /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301b-9: de dngos po thams cad la yang mi gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301b-10: skad cig gi rgyud la yang rab tu 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301b-11: sems can gyi don yang yang dag par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301b-12: sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba mthong bas kyang ngoms par mi byed do; ;chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar dbyung bas kyang sgyid lug par mi byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301b-13: de la gzhag par bya ba yang gang yang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301b-14: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrubs ba'i rjes su yang rab tu 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301b-15: ye shes kyi sbrul pa yang byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301b-16: sems can gyi ris la 'jug par yang mtha' dang dbus med par 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301b-17: 'jug rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par dag pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:301b-18: 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pas rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302a-2: mtshan ma sna tshogs yongs su shes pa yang mi spong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang thabs la mkhas pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302a-4: shin tu rnam par dag pa la'ang rtog par mi byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302a-5: thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i sa yang rab tu 'thob par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302a-8: nam mkha'i rang bzhin ni dngos po thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'ang yin la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302a-9: dngos po thams cad las kyang rnam par 'das pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302a-10: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du'ang rgyu la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad las kyang rnam par 'das pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302a-12: sems can gyi khams yongs su dgrol ba la'ang brtson la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302a-13: sems can gyi 'du shes thams cad kyang med pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302a-14: chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyang ye shes kyi spyod yul du gyur la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302a-15: chos thams cad kyis snyems pa'i sems kyang med pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302a-16: sangs rgyas thams cad blta bas kyang mi ngoms la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302a-17: sangs rgyas thams cad la blta ba'i gnas kyang yongs su bsal ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302a-18: ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa thams cad la mkhas par bya ba'ang khong du chud la chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid khong du chud pas chags pa yang med pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302b-0: chos kyi tshig rnam par shes pa @302b mtha' yas pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302b-1: tshig med cing yi ge med pa yang khong du chud pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302b-2: brjod du med pa la yang shin tu spyod la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302b-3: dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa dang yang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302b-4: chos thams cad kyi yang mthar phyin la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302b-5: gzugs sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba rnams kyang yul du byed pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302b-6: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi mthar yang rab tu thug la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302b-7: snying rje chen pos sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su dgrol zhing gdul ba la yang rab tu brtson pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302b-8: sems can gyi khams 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med pa yang rab tu shes la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302b-9: chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa khong du chud pa las kyang mi g-yo ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302b-10: 'gro ba thams cad gdul ba yang rgyun mi gcod la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa 'khor gsum yongs su dag par khong du chud pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302b-12: chos rnam pa sna tshogs la'ang rnam par mi rtog la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302b-13: bstan pa sna tshogs la 'jigs pa med pas chos bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yang rgyun mi 'chad pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:302b-15: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba ste dgu pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i ye @303a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303a-1: shes bcu pa gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303a-3: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa med cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303a-4: dri ma med pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303a-5: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303a-6: lus kyi las chags pa med par yang dag par gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303a-7: ngag gi las chags pa med par yang dag par gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303a-8: yid kyi las chags pa med par yang dag par gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam pa nyid chags pa med par yang dag par gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303a-10: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ye shes chags pa med pa la yang dag par 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303a-11: sems can 'dul ba'i ye shes chags pa med par yang dag par gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303a-12: 'od zer kun tu dgye ba chags pa med pa rab tu 'gyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303a-13: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chags pa med pa rab tu gtong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303a-14: sprul pa mang po chags pa med pa rab tu 'gyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303a-15: chos kyi 'khor lo chags pa med pa rab tu bskor ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'ang rab tu 'thob par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303a-17: sangs rgyas kyi stobs rnams la yang yang dag par 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303a-18: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang rab tu 'thob par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303a-19: sangs rgyas kyi bzhengs pas rnam par ldang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303b-0: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba snang @303b bas nye bar spyod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303b-1: byang chub sems dpa' de ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303b-2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu rtog go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303b-3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su blta'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303b-5: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303b-6: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303b-7: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu lta'o; ;thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rjes su blta'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303b-8: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam par lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303b-10: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i sems chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i khong du chud pa chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303b-16: byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303b-17: byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs chen po dang; byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i rgyun chen po yongs su mi gcod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303b-23: sgyid lug par mi byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:303b-25: byang chub sems dpa'i rgyun mthar phyin par mi byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304a-0: de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos @304a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304a-1: la smon lam chen pos rab tu grub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304a-2: yang dag par 'jug pa'i 'byung gnas chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304a-3: 'jigs pa'i pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho chen po shin tu bslabs pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa khyad par can dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304a-6: thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes snang ba la shin tu bslabs pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304a-8: sems can thams cad kyi gtso bos byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304a-11: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i rjes su snyegs pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304a-12: sangs rgyas kyi chos 'gyur ba med pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304a-16: mi la la zhig gis nor bu rin po che sna tshogs tshon gyis bsgyur pa'i gos kyi steng du bzhag na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304a-17: nor bu rin po che de yang khong nas tshon gyis gyur par snang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304a-18: nor bu rin po che'i rang bzhin ni 'gyur ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304a-19: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ting nge 'dzin rin po che thob pa'i ye shes kyi sgos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su lta zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304a-20: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'ang rgyun mi gcod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304b-0: @304b ji ltar nor bu rin po che de kha dog thams cad ston kyang nor bu'i rang bzhin yongs su mi spong ba de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304b-1: byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rang bzhin thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan can yongs su mi spong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304b-3: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du yang dag par zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304b-4: 'gro ba thams cad dgrol bar smon pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304b-5: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par sbyong bas sgyid lug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304b-7: 'gro ba thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad par spyod pas skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304b-8: chos rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med cing tshad med pas yongs su yi 'chad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304b-9: sems can rnam par dag par bya ba'i dmigs pas rnam par 'phel ba thams cad ston pa'i las phyir 'gyod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304b-10: 'gro ba thams cad la rim gro bya bas snyoms pa med cing sgyid lug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304b-11: 'gro ba thams cad snang bar bya bas skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:304b-12: chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa las phyir mi ldog cing yongs su skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305a-0: nam mkha'i rang bzhin ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su 'dzin cing rten kyang ngal ba med cing dub pa med la @305a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305a-6: rnam pa tha dad par mi 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305a-9: rang bzhin rnam par mi spong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305a-11: de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin chos nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyang phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305a-12: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang smon lam chen po rgya che zhing yangs la tshad med pa dang ldan pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305a-13: sems can thams cad dgrol ba la nye bar gnas pa'i sgos skyo zhing dub pa'i sems mi skyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305a-16: mya ngan las 'das pa ni dus gsum gyi sems can mtha' dang dbus med pa de snyed cig yongs su mya ngan las zlo yang bar 'ga' tsam yang skyo ba med cing sgyid lug pa med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305a-17: yongs su yi chad pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305a-20: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi dben pa nyid de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305a-21: de bas na gang las kyang phyir nur bar bya ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305a-22: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'gro ba thams cad gdon pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305a-23: 'jig rten du skyes pas sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol ba la skyo ba'i sems mi skyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305b-0: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' de snyed cig byang chub kyi don du gnas @305b kyang skyo ba dub pa med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305b-3: da ltar byung ba rnams sangs rgyas kyi mnga' bsgyur ba la bsgrubs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305b-7: de ni zad pa med pa'i chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305b-8: de las gzhan du 'gyur ba med cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305b-9: 'dul ba'i chos la mngon par chags pa med pas phyir nur ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305b-10: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mang po bdag gis thob par byed cing khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305b-11: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de'i ting nge 'dzin de ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305b-12: 'od phyogs thams cad kyi mthas klas par 'dal ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305b-13: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od zer thogs pa med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305b-14: yon tan sna tshogs du ma'i snying po can gos brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung ba; rin po che brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305b-15: spos brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305b-16: rgyan dang lhab lhub du ma dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305b-17: gser gyi dra ba rgya chen pos kun nas yogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305b-18: dril bu'i dra ba'i sgra kun nas 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305b-19: blta na bzang zhing yid du 'ong ba rin po che sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305b-20: rin po che sna tshogs mang po ston pas dag cing bzang po spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305b-21: gnas shin tu bstan pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo ston pa'i yon tan can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:305b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos byin gyis brlabs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306a-0: dge ba'i rtsa ba dag pa thams @306a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306a-1: cad kyis yang dag par byung bas rnam par snang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal gyi byin dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs las byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306a-4: lus gcig tu gnas kyang phyogs bcu brjod du med cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306a-5: tshad med par byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i go 'phang dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306a-6: yon tan tshad med pa grangs med pa brgya stong rnam par dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306a-7: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mthun zhing gnas su gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306a-8: sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mthun zhing gnas su gyur pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306a-9: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snang ba 'byung bar byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306a-10: 'gro ba thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306a-11: 'jig rten thams cad kyi phyag bya zhing mdun du bya bar 'os pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306a-12: chos nyid sgyu ma lta bu'i mthun pa'i 'bras bu sprul pa kun tu 'gyed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306a-13: 'gro ba thams cad kyi dpe dang dpe med pa'i yon tan can te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306a-14: de la gnas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' skyil mo krung gcig tu gnas shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306a-15: de'i bdag nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306a-16: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par byang chub sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gcig gis yongs su khyab par 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306b-0: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste de ltar gnas pa'i @306b tshe ba spu'i khung bu gcig nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'od zer 'byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306b-1: ba spu'i khung bu gcig nas ji lta ba de bzhin du ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang 'od zer gyi sgo de snyed de snyed 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306b-2: 'od zer gyi sgo de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i snying po can kha dog du mar snang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306b-3: rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306b-4: yon tan gyi rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306b-5: rin po che'i dra ba rgya chen pos kun nas khebs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306b-6: me tog gi dra ba rgya chen pos yongs su khebs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306b-7: spos rin po che khrag khrig brgya stong kun tu gtong ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306b-8: rin po che'i rgyan yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306b-9: rin po che'i gdugs bsam gyis mi khyab pas bkab pa 'byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306b-10: rin po che de dag re re las kyang khang pa brtsegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:306b-11: khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re re las kyang seng ge'i khri padmo'i snying po can sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:307a-0: seng ge'i khri padmo'i snying po can de dag re re las kyang 'od sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba @307a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:307a-1: khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:307a-2: 'od de dag re re las kyang kha dog sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:307a-3: kha dog de dag re re las kyang snang ba'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:307a-4: snang ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag re re las kyang nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba sna tshogs kyi me tog sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:307a-5: me tog de dag re re las kyang rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:307a-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:307a-7: rgyan de dag re re las kyang khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:307a-8: khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi char rab tu 'bab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:307b-0: chos kyi tshig rnam par phye ba'i char de dag las kyang chos khong du chud par bya bar mdo'i tshul sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin @307b tu phra ba snyed yongs su brjod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:307b-1: mdo'i tshul yongs su brjod pa de dag re re las kyang chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:307b-2: chos kyi sgo rab tu bstan pa de dag re re zhing yang ye shes rdo rje lta bus gtan la phebs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:307b-3: chos kyi rnam grangs sna tshogs dang ldan pa bstan pa rgya chen po can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:307b-4: chos kyi tshig rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan par 'khor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:307b-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu bskor ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:307b-6: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de dag re re zhing yang sems can gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su smin par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:307b-7: sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba 'byams klas pa de dag re re zhing yang sems can gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'dul te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:307b-8: de ltar snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:307b-9: ting nge 'dzin gyi yul zil gyis mi non pa sprul pa'i sgyu ma sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:307b-12: brjod du med pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308a-2: yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308a-4: chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308a-10: mngon sum du khong du chud pas rab tu rtog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308a-14: chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas gzhi med pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308a-17: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu can; sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rjes su snyegs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i tshe gcig pa'i mngon sum du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i mig rdul med pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308a-21: shes rab kyi mig kun tu spyod pa can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308a-22: sha'i mig rdul dang bral zhing rdul med par yang dag par skyes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308a-23: sangs rgyas kyi spyan kun tu snang ba can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308a-24: ye shes kyi mig ces bya ba'i don gyi yul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308a-25: rnam pa rab tu ston pa can chos kyi sgo 'byed pa'i skyes bu dam pa yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems yongs su rdzogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308a-26: yul la thogs pa med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308a-27: ye shes kyi rnam pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308a-28: 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308a-29: skye ba med pa yang dag par byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308a-30: rnam par 'phrul pas skye ba kun tu ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308b-0: byin gyi rlabs @308b mi yul la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308b-1: yon tan mchog gis rnam par dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308b-2: bsam pa 'od gsal ba'i snying po can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308b-3: mos pa shin tu dag pas ye shes nam mkha'i dbyings kun nas khebs pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308b-4: 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis blta bar 'os pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308b-5: smon lam mngon du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308b-7: yon tan bsngags pa zad mi shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308b-8: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lhag mthong gi mdzod du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308b-9: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi 'byung gnas rgya mtshor gyur pa ye shes rin po che thams cad kyis shin tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308b-10: ye shes kyi skyes bu punda ri kar byung ba; sems can gyi don mtha' dang dbus med par rab tu sgrub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308b-11: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mu med pa la zhugs pa'i 'od zer gyis snang bar gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308b-12: ye shes kyi 'od yongs su snang ba; chos rnam par dag pa snang bas kun tu spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308b-13: shin tu dben pa'i sgor gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308b-14: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la thogs pa med par dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308b-15: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi thabs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308b-16: yon tan gyi spyod pa las byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308b-17: skyes bu dam pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshul rab tu shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i bcun spu la rab tu gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308b-19: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par dgongs pas rab tu zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:308b-20: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku'i byin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309a-1: khyab pa rtse gcig tu gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309a-2: dmigs pa med pa'i yul dang mtshan ma ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309a-3: shin tu yangs pa las yang dag par byung ba'i rgyud can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309a-4: chags pa med pa'i spyod yul du khong du chud pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis byang chub tshad med pa nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs shing sa mtshams med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis 'jig rten thams cad du sems can gyi don byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309a-5: thams cad mkhyen pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyu mthun pa'i ye shes tshad med pa'i yul rnam par non pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309a-6: dag cing drag shul che ba'i ye shes kyis grub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa dang yang dag par 'grogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309a-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rigs dag par byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309a-9: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad kyis kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul shin tu phra ba'i thabs shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309a-10: rtogs pa rdo rje lta bu'i stobs dang mthus byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309a-11: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rtogs par gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309a-12: sems can gyis thos par dka' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309a-13: mi gnyis pa'i sgor zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309a-14: chos kyi tshul mtshan nyid med pa la gzhol ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309a-15: mtshan ma'i rgyud kyis chos ston pa thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309a-16: sems can bsam pa bzhin du 'dul ba yang dag par ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309b-0: dad pa ji @309b lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba tshim par byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309b-1: chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin can ye shes mi zad pa'i yul shin tu non pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i mnyam pa nyid thub pa med pa rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i yon tan la 'jug pa thams cad kyi mtha'i rjes su 'gro ba rnam par phye ba thams cad la mkhas pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309b-5: chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309b-6: zhing thams cad rnam par dmigs par bya ba la rab tu gzhol ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309b-7: zhing dag par bya par dgang ba thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309b-8: sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas kyis byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309b-11: ma byon pa dang; da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rab tu brjod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309b-12: 'jig rten thams cad la rnam par lta ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309b-13: dge ba mtha' dang mu med pas yang dag par byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309b-14: 'jig rten gyi rtsom pa thams cad las rnam par 'das pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309b-15: sangs rgyas kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa shin tu byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309b-16: mtshungs pa med pa dang 'dra ba med pa'i dbang gis shes par gyur pa; mkhas pas khong du chud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309b-17: skyes bu dam pas yang dag par bsu ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:309b-18: ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyud yongs su 'dzin pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes @310a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310a-2: lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas 'bras bu yongs su grub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310a-3: lhag pa'i bsam pa che ba nyid la gnas pa rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310a-4: mnyam pa dang bstan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thob par bya ba rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310a-5: chos thams cad la chags pa med par gnas pa'i mtha'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310a-6: g-yo ba med par kun tu spyod pa; rlom sems thams cad rnam par 'jig pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310a-7: g-yo ba thams cad las yang dag par langs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310a-8: chos la gnas pas ye shes rnam par snang ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310a-9: mun pa med pa la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310a-10: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par zhugs pas snang ba thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310a-11: 'gags pa med par srid pa thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310a-12: srid pa thams cad khong du chud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310a-13: 'dus byas thams cad yul du gyur pa'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310a-14: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin dang ngo bo nyid can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310a-15: lus kyi las mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310a-16: ngag gis las mu med pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310a-17: yid kyi las mtha' dang dbus med pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310a-18: tha snyad dang yi ge'i rgyud brjod du med pa dang ldan pa; sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310a-19: 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad khong du chud pas chags pa med cing bcings pa med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310b-0: 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba'i @310b yul la shin tu bsgoms pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310b-1: chos kyi dbyings gzugs med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310b-2: nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bus yang dag par byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310b-3: chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur rnam par bsgoms pa la rab tu zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310b-4: chos kyi dbyings bstan pa la ye shes dbang du gyur pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul ma 'dres pa'i sgo mngon par sgrub pa stobs bcu'i sar shes par bya ba shin tu bslabs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310b-5: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi stegs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310b-6: chos thams cad la lhag mthong gi ye shes dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i chos de dang de dag rnam par dgod pa'i don khong du chud par bya ba la ye shes kyi mig gis zhi gnas kyis yang dag par non cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310b-8: ye shes chen po bsgom pas rnam par snang bar gyur pa'i khyad par can gyi smon lam dang ldan pa rab tu ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310b-9: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu tha dad pa med pa ston pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310b-10: de nyid chags pa med pa'i sgo'i tshul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310b-11: de nyid byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i 'byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310b-12: de nyid byang chub sems dpa'i mthus thams cad mkhyen pa'i brtson 'grus la 'jug pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310b-13: chags pa med pa la gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhing rnams kyi zhing ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310b-14: sems can med pa'i mtha' la gnas par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:310b-15: sems can gyi khams rnams 'dul ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311a-0: dmigs pa thams cad mi dmigs par bya ba'i phyir @311a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311a-1: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311a-2: rtog pa thams cad las rab tu dben par bya ba'i phyir gnyis su med pa shin tu ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311a-3: gnyis su med pa'i don du mngon par 'du bya ba med pa thams cad kyi mngon par 'du byed pa rab tu brjod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311a-4: gzugs su dmigs pa med kyang gzugs kyi grangs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311a-5: tshor ba'i yul med kyang tshor ba'i yul du brjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid ched du brjod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311a-6: phyin ci log thams cad kyang byang la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311a-7: 'du shes kyi gnas thams cad kyang yongs su ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311a-8: mngon par 'du bya ba med par yang ston la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311a-9: 'du byed thams cad kyang rab tu brjod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311a-10: 'du byed thams cad kyang rnam par mi dmigs la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311a-11: chos thams cad rnam par shes par yang rab tu brjod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311a-12: chos kyi 'khor lo yang byin gyis rlob la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311a-13: chos thams cad brjod du med par yang rab tu ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311a-14: chos thams cad la'ang rgyu ba med la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311a-15: chos kyi 'khor lo yang shin tu bskor ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311a-16: chos thams cad la'ang rnam pa tha dad pa med la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311a-17: rnam par dbye ba yang yongs su ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311a-18: chos thams cad la skye ba med par yang ston la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311a-19: gzugs rnams 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid du'ang brjod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311b-0: chos thams cad shin tu phra bar @311b yang khong du chud la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311b-1: phra ba rnams shin tu yangs par yang ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311b-2: bla na med pa'i chos kyang sbyin par byed la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311b-3: gong ma'i go 'phang shes par bya ba'ang rab tu ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311b-4: chos thams cad brjod du med par yang brjod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311b-5: brjod pa'i tshig dang yi ge'i rgyan rnam par dag pa yang rab tu ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311b-6: phyi dang nang gi chos med par bstan pa la'ang shin tu mkhas la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311b-7: chos thams cad sems med cing btags pa'i rgyud ji lta ba bzhin du'ang rab tu ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311b-8: yongs su 'grub pa tshad med pas 'byung ba yang khong du chud la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311b-9: byang ba'i mthar phyin pas chos thams cad zag pa zad par yang rab tu ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311b-10: chos thams cad la nyon mongs pa med par yang khong du chud la /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311b-12: chos thams cad la slob dpon med par yang shin tu ston la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311b-13: bla ma la brten cing sten par yang rab tu ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311b-14: chos thams cad gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par yang shes la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311b-15: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi spyod yul yang rab tu brjod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311b-16: chos thams cad rgyu ba med par yang brjod la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311b-17: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang shin tu ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311b-18: chos thams cad 'byung ba med par yang rab tu shes la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311b-19: rgyu las 'byung ba'ang yongs su mi gtong ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311b-20: chos thams cad thog ma med par yang rab tu brjod la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:311b-21: sngon gyi mtha'i mu yang rab tu sbyong ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312a-1: thams cad 'ong ba med par yang khong du chud la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312a-2: 'ong ba'i mtha' yang rab tu brjod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312a-3: chos thams cad ma 'ongs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312a-4: da ltar byung ba med par yang rab tu ston la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312a-5: da ltar byung bar yang shin tu ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312a-6: bya ba med pa'i lam yang yongs su brjod la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312a-7: bya ba'i lam yang shin tu ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312a-8: chos thams cad rgyu med par yang rab tu shes la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312a-9: rgyu bsags par yang rab tu brjod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312a-10: chos thams cad mnyam pa med par yang ston la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312a-11: mnyam pa nyid kyi lam gyi lam gol ba'ang rab tu brjod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312a-12: chos thams cad tshig gi lam dang bral bar yang ston la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312a-13: dus gsum shin tu bstan pa'ang shin tu rtogs par byed pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312a-14: chos thams cad gnas pa med par yang ston la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312a-15: gnas shin tu gzhom pa la rab tu mkhas pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312a-16: chos thams cad lus med kyang 'das pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312a-18: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku yang rab tu thob par byed pa'o //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312a-22: sangs rgyas gcig par bstan pa yang rab tu ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312a-23: chos thams cad la brjod pa med par yang khong du chud la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312a-24: chos thams cad yongs su brjod pa'ang rab tu ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312b-0: chos @312b thams cad bltar med par yang ston la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312b-1: lta ba'ang rab tu brjod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312b-2: chos thams cad la mtha' med par yang ston la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312b-3: chos bstan pa'i rnam pas kyang rab tu brjod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312b-4: chos thams cad la yul med kyang ye shes kyi yul du rab tu brjod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312b-5: chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad khyad par med kyang 'bras bu'i khyad par rnam par sbyang ba rab tu ston pa'o; ;chos thams cad la 'byung ba med kyang spyod pas 'byung ba'i khyad par rab tu ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312b-6: chos thams cad kun tu khyab pa yin yang mdos yongs su brjod pa shin tu ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312b-7: chos thams cad la snang ba med kyang snang ba yongs su brjod pa'i phyir rnam par snang bar byed pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312b-8: de ltar rgya che ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312b-9: khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312b-11: rjes su snyegs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312b-12: shin tu sgrub par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312b-13: yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312b-17: chos thams cad de'i chos nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312b-19: ye shes kyi snying po'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos khong du chud par byed kyang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:312b-21: byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di snyed gcig go /
