K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i yul ni 'di tsam zhig go snyam du sems pa med do ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313a-9: bam po lnga bcu dgu pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313a-11: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams ni rnam pa de lta bu ste; de ltar tshad med pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams ni de lta bu'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313a-13: de dag ni gzhan dang gzhan gyis bskyed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313a-14: gzhan dang gzhan du byin gyis brlabs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313a-15: gzhan dang gzhan du rgyu ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313a-16: chos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo can ye shes kyi sgo brjod du med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313a-17: blos rnam par brtag cing rnam pa dbye bas khyad par gyi mtha' med pa nges par rtogs pa grangs med pas khong du chud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313a-18: ye shes bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pas rgya che ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313a-19: sangs rgyas mthong ba sna tshogs kyi mdzod du gyur pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313a-20: mtha' dang dbus med pa mos pas rnam par dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313a-21: dbang po shin tu yangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313a-22: mngon par shes pa rab tu rno ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313a-23: bsags pa med pa'i spyod yul can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313b-0: kun @313b tu lta bas rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313b-1: sangs rgyas thams cad lta bas grub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313b-2: kun tu bzang po'i lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrubs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313b-3: ye shes kyi rgyal po'i sku las byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313b-4: de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i ye shes tshad med pa rnam par 'phrul ba'i rnam par phye ba mtha' dang dbus med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313b-5: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes zad mi shes pa las gol ba med pa'i sgo can; sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313b-6: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung bas rnam par spyang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313b-7: sgo thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu skyes pas dpe med par brjod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313b-8: dmigs pa shin tu phra bas chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313b-9: chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus par dmigs pa shin tu phra bar byin gyis rlob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313b-10: 'phags par gsung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pas shin tu snang bar byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313b-11: dbang gi dmigs pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa; chos kyi sgo thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313b-12: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313b-13: thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam gyis grub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313b-14: ting nge 'dzin thams cad mkhas par khong du chud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:313b-15: sems sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-0: sems skad cig re re la byang chub sems dpa' @314a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-1: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la gnas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-2: ting nge 'dzin brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba phrag brgya la snyoms par zhugs kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-3: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang yul gyi rgyan gyi snang bas yongs su snang bar bya ba rnams kyis mtha' dmigs par mi rung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-5: chos thams cad ni byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-6: thams cad kyang khong du chud par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-7: zhing rnams ni mu med pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-8: thams cad kyang khong du chud par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-9: sems can gyi khams thams cad ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-10: de dag ni rdo rje'i tshig khong du chud par bya ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-11: de dag gis khyad par thams cad kyang khong du chud par bya ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-12: sngon gyi mtha' ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-13: de dag kyang thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-14: phyi ma'i mtha' ni mu med pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-15: de dag kyang lhag ma ma lus par khong du chud par bya ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-16: da ltar byung ba'i dus ni mtha' dang dbus med pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-17: nam mkha' dbyings kyis klas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-18: chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-19: de yang ma lus par khong du chud par bya ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-20: sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-21: de dag kyang thams cad khong du chud par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314a-22: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni grangs med pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314b-0: de dag kyang thams cad @314b khong du chud par bya ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314b-1: sangs rgyas kyis thugs su chud pa dang dgongs pa ni yul mtha' yas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314b-2: yul brjod du med pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314b-3: de dag kyang thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314b-4: chos su dmigs pa thams cad ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314b-5: sems kyi rang bzhin mthar phyin pa med pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314b-6: de dag kyang thams cad lhag ma med par khong du chud par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314b-10: yid bzhin gyi nor bu las ni ji bsam pa thams cad 'byung yang de snyed du mngon par 'du byed pas stongs par mi 'gyur zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314b-11: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur yang rgyun chad pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314b-13: yid bzhin gyi nor bu de yang rgyun gcod par sems pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314b-14: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems sgyu ma lta bu la zhugs pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314b-15: chos kyi dmigs pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub kyang mthar phyin pa'i sems mi skyed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314b-16: ting nge 'dzin de dang de dag gi rgyun yongs su mi gcod do; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314b-17: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor yangs shing rgya che ba tshad med pa la zhugs pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314b-18: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa don yod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314b-19: nges par rtogs pa la gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:314b-20: mngon par bsgrub pa khong du chud pa'i ye shes kyi sgo dang ldan pas de la rgyas par 'gyur ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315a-1: byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315a-2: sems kyi sgo mu med pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315a-3: de dag gi sems ni ma skyes /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315a-5: skye bar mi 'gyur ba yin yang de dag gi sems skye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315a-7: skyes pa mtha' med pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315a-10: sems kyi rgyud yongs su rgyun chad pa med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315a-12: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa sgyu ma'i sgo mang po kun dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315a-13: 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs pa la'ang mur thug pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315a-14: tshad kyis gcal ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315a-16: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos de snyed du tshad med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi sgo khong du chud pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315a-19: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315a-23: klu'i rgyal po chen po de ma yin pa dag gis char phab na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315a-24: char pa'i thigs pa re re zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315a-25: ba ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam gyi rgyun du phab kyang char pa de la zad ces bya ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315a-26: sngar bab pa de nyid phyir 'bab ces bya ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315a-27: sprin gyi mngon par 'du bya ba la zad ces bya ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315a-28: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315b-0: sangs rgyas lta ba'i sgo @315b dang; phyogs su 'gro ba'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315b-1: sems kyi dbang gi rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315b-2: byin gyi rlabs kyi sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315b-5: mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul gyi sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315b-6: chos kyi tshul gyi sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i drung du 'gro ba'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315b-9: dbang po'i dra ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315b-10: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud tha dad pa'i bye brag brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sems kyi tshad kyis khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315b-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315b-12: 'jig rten gyi khams dngos po yod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315b-13: dngos po med pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315b-14: sems can gyi 'du shes khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315b-15: rjes su bsnyegs pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315b-16: dus rnam pa tha dad cing bskal pa mi mthun pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315b-17: bstan pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:315b-18: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316a-0: 'jig pa brjod du med pa'i yang @316a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316a-1: brjod du med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas khong du chud pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing spyi'u tshugs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316a-3: snrel zhir rgyu ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag tu sems kyi skad cig gcig gis byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i sgo la mtha' med do; ;zad pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316a-7: yongs su yi 'chad pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316a-12: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' de chos kyi sgos thug pa med par mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316a-13: nges par rtogs par bya bas yongs su yi 'chad par 'gyur ba med do; ;thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo zad par 'gyur ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316a-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar bya ba las phyir ldog pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316a-15: chos kyi 'khor lo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rab tu bskor ba la btang snyoms su byed pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316a-16: sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa yongs su dri ba la zad par 'gyur ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316a-17: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub blta ba la mthar thug pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316a-18: sems can gyi khams thams cad 'dul bar bya ba yongs su gtong ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316b-0: kun tu @316b bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316b-1: smon lam gyis 'byung ba rgyun chad par 'gyur ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316b-2: kha dog mtha' yas pa'i lus tshad med pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongs su bstan pas sa mtshams su 'gyur ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316b-6: me ni ji srid du shing yod pa de srid du 'bar te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316b-7: me 'bar ba la mthar thug pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316b-8: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ji tsam du sems can gyi khams la rnam par dpyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316b-9: ji tsam du chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316b-10: ji tsam du 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316b-11: ji tsam du nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi tshad mi dmigs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316b-12: ji tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316b-13: ji tsam du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316b-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316b-15: chos kyi bye brag rnam par phye ba la 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316b-16: ji tsam du sems can gyi khams kyi rgyud brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dge ba'i rtsa ba la gzhog cing nye bar 'tsho bar byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:316b-18: shin tu rnam par dag par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317a-0: ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba @317a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317a-1: dam pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yang dag par mthong zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317a-2: smon lam gcig tu nges pa med pa kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317a-3: smon lam la nges par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317a-4: kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul gyi ye shes kyi sgo la gzhog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317a-5: ji tsam du dus gsum la 'jug pa'i rgyud brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'byams klas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317a-6: snyoms shing rnam par rtog pa'i dus la 'jug pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'i tshul du 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317a-7: ji tsam du 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba dang; 'jig pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317a-8: gnas pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rnam par rtog pa'i dmigs pa kun tu rgyu ba 'byung zhing rgyun mi 'chad pa de tsam du ye shes kyi dmigs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317a-9: snying rje chen po las byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317a-10: smon lam chen pos sprul pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317a-11: 'gro ba thams cad ma lus par 'dul ba la brtson pa yang mthar thug ces bya ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317a-13: 'di ltar de ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317a-14: smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317a-15: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i khyad par ye shes kyis bsgrubs pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317a-16: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol bar bya ba la brtson pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-0: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin @317b gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-1: de lta bu'i yul de ltar rgya che ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-3: de ltar tshad med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-4: de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-5: de ltar 'od kun tu mtha' yas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-6: de ltar sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-7: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-8: de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis yongs su grub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-9: de ltar mi 'khrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa la mngon par brtson par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-10: yongs su yi 'chad pa med pas brtan par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-11: skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-12: bsam pa phyir mi ldog pa bskyed par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-13: gdon mi za bar 'byung bas sbyar bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-14: rtsom pa'i nan tan gyis mthun par spyad par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-15: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes yongs su gnon par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-16: sgyu'i sa la mngon par zhen pa med par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-17: 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad la mi gnas par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-18: chos thams cad la chags pa med par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-19: rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bsal bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-20: dngos po thams cad la chags pa med par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-21: dmigs pa thams cad la rtog pa med par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-22: chos khong du chud par bya ba la tshod 'dzin pa med par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:317b-23: chos kyi ye shes rtogs par khong du chud par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318a-1: la sangs rgyas su byang chub pas rmongs pa med par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318a-2: chos kyi snang ba yongs su bsgrub par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318a-3: 'gro ba thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bsdu par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318a-4: bdud kyi yul las sems can yongs su bskyod par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318a-5: chos kyi yul la sems can rab tu dgod par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318a-6: sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab tu gzud par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318a-7: smon lam gyi yul las phyir ldog pa med par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318a-8: 'byung ba'i yul la rtogs pas gzhag par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318a-9: rnam par dag pa'i yul la rab tu zhen par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318a-10: pha rol tu phyin pa'i yul khong du chud par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318a-11: sangs rgyas thams cad la shin tu mos par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318a-12: chos thams cad la dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid du yang dag par 'jug par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318a-13: chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa khong du chud par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318a-14: 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin snang bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318a-15: chos kyi 'thad pa rab tu brjod par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318a-16: ye shes kyi rang bzhin yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318a-17: go cha'i dam pa bgos pa yongs su mi spang bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318a-18: skal ba mnyam par spyod pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318a-19: sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dran pa la sems lhod pa med par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318b-0: chos kyi dbyings tha dad pa med pa la bdag rab tu sbyar @318b bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318b-1: sems sgyu ma lta bur rab tu shes par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318b-2: 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad rmi lam lta bur khong du chud par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318b-3: smon lam dang sangs rgyas blta bar bya ba thams cad mig yor lta bur shes par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318b-4: slob pa med pa'i chos 'byams klas pa thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318b-5: tshig gi lam thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur khong du chud par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318b-6: chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318b-8: skye ba thams cad 'khrul 'khor lta bur shes par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318b-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba thams cad lus med par khong du chud par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos dri bas yongs su skyo ba med par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318b-11: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad 'jig par bstan pa'i sa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318b-13: man ngag tu bya ba la btang snyoms med par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318b-14: gdul bar bya ba dus la bab pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318b-15: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la nan tan du byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318b-16: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318b-17: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba la rab tu brtson pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:318b-20: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319a-0: de ltar chos nyid 'khrugs pa med @319a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319a-2: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa rnam par sbyong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319a-3: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mos par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319a-4: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi stobs 'byams klas pa khong du chud par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319a-5: de ltar chags pa med pa'i sems kyis rab tu 'byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319a-6: phyogs mtshams med pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rnam pa tha dad pa dag tu skal ba mnyam par rnam par dgod pa la 'gro ba rnams rab tu dgod pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dang bcas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad ma lus pa de dag gi phyogs gcig gi de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319a-9: mtshan gcig pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319a-10: phyogs gcig nas ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs bcu'i phyogs 'byams klas pa'i rgyud thams cad nas kyang de bzhin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319a-11: phyogs 'byams klas pa'i rgyud gcig nas ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad nas kyang de bzhin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319a-12: phyogs re re nas kyang mtshan re re'i sgos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin @319b tu phra ba snyed kyis zhal mngon par bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319b-1: de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i phyogs bcu ma lus par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis zhal mngon par bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319b-3: byang chub sems dpa' de ye shes chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319b-4: snyoms par 'jug pa kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul la yang dag par gnas pa'i rnam pa de lta bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rmongs pa med cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319b-6: chos thams cad la rab tu gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i blo gros nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319b-8: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par gzhol zhing chos rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi don khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir blo gros nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319b-9: chags pa med pa la rtogs par gzhog pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319b-10: rig pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319b-11: ye shes 'byams klas pas khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319b-12: blo gros rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi yul gyi mthas klas pa thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319b-13: byang chub sems dpa' de chos kyi snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:319b-14: 'od thams cad kyis mun pa med pa'i ye shes 'byams klas pa las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir shes rab nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320a-1: chub sems dpa' de thabs mkhas pa 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pas sems can 'dul ba la bsgribs pa med par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320a-2: ye shes nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320a-3: byang chub sems dpa' de chos kyi rgyud mtha' yas pa brjod pa la zad mi shes pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bskyed pa'i phyir spobs pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320a-4: byang chub sems dpa' de 'gro ba thams cad du lus brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rgyud dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320a-5: kha dog mtha' yas pa rnam pa tha dad pa rnam par ston par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320a-6: sprul pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320a-7: byang chub sems dpa' de sems can sna tshogs thams cad la dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs dang skad sna tshogs ston par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320a-8: lce yangs pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320a-9: byang chub sems dpa' de mthong ma thag tu ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320a-10: thos par byed pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la rmongs pa med par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320a-11: rmongs pa med par nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320a-12: des byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yongs su grub pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320a-13: yongs su grub nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo yongs su rdzogs par bya bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320a-15: 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su dag par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320b-0: chags pa med @320b pa'i sgos yongs su 'byung bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320b-1: sems can thams cad 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su rtsom zhing byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320b-2: chos thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo yang dag par ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320b-3: cho 'phrul gyi sgo chos med pas sems can 'dul ba la rab tu 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320b-4: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i rnam pa la rab tu mkhas par sbyong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320b-5: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas yang dag par 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320b-6: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320b-7: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par phye ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i mthar thug pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320b-9: byang chub sems dpa' ni smon lam gyi khyad par de lta bu dang ldan pas yongs su grub bam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320b-10: ma grub na 'jig rten thams cad kyi slob dpon du 'gyur ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320b-11: chos kyi nyi ma 'jig rten du shar ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320b-12: ye shes kyi zla ba 'jig rten thams cad du snang bar byung ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320b-13: ye shes dam pa'i ri rab mi g-yo pa 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320b-14: ye shes kyi rgya mtsho tshad med pa 'jig rten thams cad du yang dag par gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320b-15: bsgrub pa rgyun mi 'chad pas 'jig rten thams cad du chos kyi nan tan byed pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320b-16: 'jig rten gyi khams sa mtshams med pa thams cad du rab tu snang ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:320b-17: rnam par dag pa yangs shing mtha' yas pa 'gro ba thams cad brjod pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321a-1: mtha' dang dbus med pa dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321a-3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i smon lam chen po la rab tu brtson par gzhog pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321a-4: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i brtson 'grus yangs pa rgya chen po'i smon lam chen po la rab tu gzhog pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321a-5: spyod pa chen po dang ting nge 'dzin yangs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la sems can gyi khams yang dag par gzhog cing rab tu sbyor ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321a-6: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i ngang tshul can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321a-7: de lta bu'i ye shes can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321a-8: de lta bu'i chos thob par gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321a-9: de lta bu'i chos kyi snang bar gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321a-10: de lta bu'i chos la gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321a-11: chos de lta bu mthong bar gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321a-12: mngon par shes pa de lta bu'i yid dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321a-13: cho 'phrul dam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321a-15: phul du byung ba de lta bus yang dag par grub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321a-16: rtag tu brtson pa'i snying rje chen pos mngon par 'phags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321a-17: chos kyi don bzang po la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321a-18: bde ba'i lam yang dag par ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321a-20: ye shes yangs pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321a-21: rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa shin tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321a-22: thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul la don yod par rjes su song ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321a-23: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321b-0: rnam par thar pa'i tshul shin tu phra ba bsam @321b gyis mi khyab pa rab tu bsgoms pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321b-1: chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyud dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321b-2: tshul rmongs pa med par khong du chud pa kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la rnam par rtse zhing spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321b-3: seng ge bsgyings pa'i ye shes kyi grub pa la shin tu gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321b-4: sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med pa rnams kyi chos kyi bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa rab tu yangs pa chen po bcu 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321b-6: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dran pas gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321b-7: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid tshad med pas gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321b-8: sems can thams cad gdul ba'i snying rje chen pos gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321b-9: zhing rnam par dag pa'i gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir gnas pa rnam par dag pas gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul la mos pa rnam par dag pas gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321b-13: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub tha dad par mi byed pas gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321b-14: chags pa med pa'i mtha' bsgribs pa med pas chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321b-15: rang bzhin mtshan nyid med pas gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'das pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:321b-18: da ltar byung ba thams cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pas gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i 'phrin las @322a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322a-4: da ltar byung ba chags pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings shin tu ston pa'i ye shes sngon du 'gro bas gnas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322a-7: da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi skye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322a-9: snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322a-11: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322a-12: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa skad cig gcig gis mthar 'jug pas gnas pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322a-13: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa de dag ni tshad med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322a-22: 'gro ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa dag ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322a-23: chos thams cad kyi ye shes rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322a-24: byang chub sems dpa' de lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bus gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322a-25: de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322a-26: chos rnam par dag pa yang rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322a-27: bsam pa'i stobs kyang rnam par 'phel bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322b-0: sems can rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa yang yang @322b dag par ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyang rnam par 'phel bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan mi khom pa khom par byed pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322b-3: shin tu 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su grub pa yang rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322b-5: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi gzungs kyis 'das pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322b-7: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322b-8: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar sems can gyi khams thams cad la yang dag par lta'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322b-9: tshig gi lam gyi rgyud kyis sems can thams cad 'dul ba yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322b-11: de ni ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po de lta bu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos nyid de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322b-12: des byang chub sems dpa' de sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'byams klas pa thams cad la mchog tu bya ba rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322b-13: de'i phyir chos 'byams klas pa thams cad ston pa la mkhas pa'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322b-14: de'i phyir 'jig rten thams cad du chos kyi dam pa 'jigs pa med par rnam par dag pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322b-15: de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i ye shes rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322b-16: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshul thams cad la mkhas pa'i dam pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322b-17: de'i phyir tshul thams cad kyi rgyan rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:322b-18: de'i phyir 'jig rten thams cad du chos kyi dbugs phyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323a-0: @323a *// de'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi dus dang dus ma yin pa rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323a-1: de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar bya ba rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323a-2: de'i phyir sems can thams cad la bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323a-3: de'i phyir don thams cad bsgrub par yon tan thams cad la yan lag rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323a-4: de'i phyir theg pa'i dam pa rab tu brtson par byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323a-5: sems can thams cad la mnyam par gzhag pa rnam par dag pa rab tu brjod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323a-7: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don la gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323a-8: snying rje chen po de lta bu rnam par 'phel bar byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323a-9: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bsten par 'dod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323a-10: sangs rgyas thams cad blta bar 'dod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323a-11: chos thams cad snang bar bya bar 'dod pa; zhing thams cad du 'gro bar 'dod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323a-12: phyogs thams cad du rgyu bar 'dod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323a-13: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par 'dod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323a-14: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323a-15: sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas par 'dod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323a-16: ye shes mnyam pa nyid la 'dug par 'dod pas chos 'di dag la las de lta bur brtson zhing las gzhan med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323a-19: yid rtse gcig tu gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323a-20: de ltar gnas pa la brtson pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323a-21: de ltar khong du chud pa'i yid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323b-0: de ltar mnyam @323b pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323b-1: de lta bu'i yid bde ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323b-2: de ltar las su rung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323b-5: de ltar rnam par spyod pas nan tan du bya zhing mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323b-7: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni log par smra ba ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323b-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gzhan du smra ba ma yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323b-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ji skad du smras pa de bzhin du byed pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323b-13: rdo rje ni gcig tu mi rung bar brjod pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323b-14: mi tshogs pa'i rang bzhin yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323b-15: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos 'di dag las brjod pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323b-16: 'di lta bu'i chos la gnas pa yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323b-19: gser ni kha dog shin tu bzang bar brjod pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323b-20: gser gyi kha dog bzang po rnam par dag pa yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323b-21: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang de ltar dge zhing bzang ba'i chos kyis brjod pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323b-22: de ltar dge zhing bzang ba'i chos la gnas pa yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323b-25: lha'i bu nyi ma ni snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brjod pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323b-26: snang ba yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323b-27: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'gro ba thams cad du snang bas brjod pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:323b-28: byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324a-0: ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni rin po che bzhi'i phung pos rgya mtsho las shin tu 'phags par @324a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324a-2: rgya mtsho las shin tu 'phags pa yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324a-3: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten thams cad las dge ba'i rtsa bas shin tu 'phags par brjod pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324a-4: 'jig rten thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324a-7: sa chen po ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su rton par brjod pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324a-8: rton pa'i rang bzhin yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324a-9: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'gro ba thams cad yongs su 'grel bar brjod pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324a-10: snying rje chen po yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324a-13: rgya mtsho chen po ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su brjod pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324a-14: rgya mtsho'i chu yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324a-15: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su brjod pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324a-16: sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i smon lam yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324a-19: 'phong gi slob dpon ni mda' gzhu dang 'phong la zo bdog bde bas ji srid du mda' gzhu dang ldan zhing mda' gzhu la brtson pas brjod par bya ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324a-20: 'phong gi tshul du bya ba yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324a-21: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ji tsam du ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang; yul gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu la mngon par brtson zhing yongs su sgrub pa de tsam du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis snang bar 'gyur ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324b-0: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i @324b rgyal po ni ji tsam du tshe ring ba de tsam du bde ba myong ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324b-1: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing rnam pa 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin chen po la snyoms par 'jug pa de tsam du sems can gyi khams rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324b-2: shin tu rnam par dag pa yang rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324b-5: ji tsam du sa bon btab pa de tsam du rnam par 'phel lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324b-6: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la brtson pa de tsam du sems can gyi khams rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324b-9: sprin chen po ni ji tsam du char 'bebs pa de tsam du dbyar gyi dus la sa bon rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324b-10: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ji tsam du chos kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324b-12: rnam pa 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin chen po la snyoms par 'jug pa de tsam du sems can rnams shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324b-13: shin tu mthar thug par 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324b-14: shin tu bde ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324b-15: mchog tu bya ba shin tu 'thob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324b-16: shin tu pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324b-17: 'jig rten thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324b-18: skye dgu thams cad kyi bya ba thams cad la the tshom shin tu gcod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:324b-19: sbyin bsreg yongs su bzung zhing sbyin pa yongs su sbyong bas bsod nams rmad du byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-1: mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo la rab tu gzhog pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du skal pa shin tu mnyam par 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-3: sems can thams cad khams gsum las bsgral ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-4: ye shes shin tu rnam par dag par byed pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-5: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la sems can rnams dgod pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-6: chos kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba dam par 'gyur ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-8: byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyi mchos kyi dbyings rnam par phye ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par sbyong ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-12: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir ye shes sbyong ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-13: yongs su 'dul bas sems can sbyong ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-14: yongs su bsngo bas zhi ba sbyong ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-15: rab tu gzhog pas chos sbyong ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-16: zhum pa med pas mi 'jigs pa sbyong ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-17: rab tu bstan pas tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa sbyong ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-18: shin tu bstan pa mchos sbyong ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-19: chos thams cad las phyir mi ldog par gzungs sbyong ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-20: sangs rgyas kyi 'byung ba thams cad kyi don du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa sbyong ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-21: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa ni yon tan 'di dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-22: gzhan yang yongs su dag pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-23: ting nge 'dzin chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di dag gi dbang dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-24: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325a-25: rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu'i stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325b-0: ye shes @325b kyi sa'i sgrol ba'i mthu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325b-1: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi nye bar bstan pa'i stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325b-2: bdud kyi las thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i mthu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325b-3: dge ba'i las skal ba mnyam pa rnams kyi gzhung gcig pa'i mthu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325b-4: smon lam rnams kyi dag pa'i stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325b-5: ji ltar bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su grub pa'i stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325b-6: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams thub pa med cing zad mi shes pa'i mthus de ltar snyoms par 'jug pa la gnas pa ni yon tan mtshungs pa mnyam pa bcus sangs rgyas 'das pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325b-8: da ltar byung ba thams cad dang mtshungs pa mnyam pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325b-12: dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs pa mnyam pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325b-13: 'od dang 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa rnam par dag pas byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs pa mnyam pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325b-16: sprul pa sems can 'dul ba'i tshul bzhin du ston pas byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs pa mnyam pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325b-18: kha dog mtha' yas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325b-19: dbyangs thams cad rnam par dag pas byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs pa mnyam pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:325b-20: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa byin gyis rlob cing sems can gyi las dang spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa yang dag par ston pas byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs pa mnyam pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326a-0: sems can thams cad kyi tha snyad gzungs dam pas 'dzin @326a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326a-2: dran pa nyams pa med pa'i mthar thug par gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs pa mnyam pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326a-3: tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mi zad pas sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad shes pas ston cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326a-4: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs pa mnyam pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326a-5: mi 'jigs pas bag tsha ba med pa sengge nga ro sgrog cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326a-6: chos dang mthun par sems can thams cad khong du chud par byed pas byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs pa mnyam pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326a-7: dus gsum gyi tshig gi lam la 'jug pa skad cig gi mthar 'jug par byed pas byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs pa mnyam pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326a-8: sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul rnam par phye ba sems can rnams la yang dag par ston pas byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs pa mnyam pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326a-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig gis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326a-11: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de rnam pa de lta bu de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs pa mnyam pa yin na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326a-12: ci'i phyir sangs rgyas ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326a-13: ci'i phyir stobs bcu ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326a-14: ci'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326a-15: ci'i phyir kun tu gzigs pa ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326b-0: ci'i phyir chos thams cad kyi @326b dkyil 'khor la bsgribs pa mi mnga' ba gzigs pa ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326b-1: ci'i phyir chos thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas pa ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326b-4: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang mi gnyis par spyod pa ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326b-5: ci'i phyir gnas pa'i mthar gyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326b-6: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326b-7: smon lam rgyun gcod pa ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326b-8: ci'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar thug pa ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326b-9: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i rgyud nye bar len pa btang snyoms su mi gzhog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326b-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326b-11: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326b-13: khyod de skad du gal te byang chub sems dpa' de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs pa mnyam pa yin na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326b-14: ci'i phyir sangs rgyas ma yin ces zer ba de ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326b-18: nam byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326b-21: da ltar byung ba'i smon lam tha mi dad par zhugs pas yang dag par skyes pa'i yul thob par gyur pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i don du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rgyun ma bcad pas de byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:326b-23: nam de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs bcu la zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe stobs bcu zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:327a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:327a-3: nam ched du bya ba med par chos kyi dbyings shin tu bstan pa thams cad rtogs par gyur pa de'i tshe thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:327a-4: chos kyi dbyings thams cad shin tu bstan pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa rig par spyod cing mkhas par bya ba las phyir mi ldog pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:327a-5: nam byang chub sems dpa' de chos thams cad mi gnyis par yang dag par spyod pa yongs su shes par gyur pa de'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:327a-6: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo mnga' ba zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:327a-7: byang chub sems dpa' de chos thams cad gnyis pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:327a-8: gnyis ma yin pa la mkhas pas rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyud la 'jug cing chos gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhas pa la gnas pas de byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:327a-9: nam byang chub sems dpa' de kun tu gzigs pa'i yul ye shes kyi sgos khong du chud par gyur pa de'i tshe kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:327a-10: byang chub sems dpa' de kun tu gzigs pa'i yul mngon par sgrub cing sems dang ye shes sems skad cig tu rnam par 'phel bas yongs su skyo bar mi byed pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:327b-0: nam byang chub sems dpa' de chos snang ba'i sgo thams @327b cad kyis snang bar byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:327b-1: mun pa med pa'i sa la gnas pa de'i tshe bsgribs pa med par gzigs pa zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:327b-2: byang chub sems dpa' de bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes ston pa'i don du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas de byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:327b-3: nam byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshul mngon par khong du chud par gyur pa de'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:327b-4: chos thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:327b-5: byang chub sems dpa' de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshul mngon par sangs rgyas pa la spyod cing rtog la khong du chud pas de byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:327b-6: nam byang chub sems dpa' de de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas la spyod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:327b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mi gnyis par gyur pa de'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:327b-10: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang mi gnyis pa zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:327b-11: byang chub sems dpa' de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag yongs su sbyong zhing rnam par sgom pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:327b-12: nam byang chub sems dpa' de 'gro ba thams cad du gnas pa'i yang dag pa'i mtha' khong du chud par gyur pa de'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:327b-13: yang dag pa'i mtha' mkhyen pa zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328a-0: byang chub sems dpa' de gnas pa'i yang dag pa'i mtha' la rtogs par gzhog cing yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi @328a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328a-2: chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i rgyud la btang snyoms rab tu thob pa yang ma yin pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328a-3: de byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328a-4: nam byang chub sems dpa' de len pa med cing 'dor pa med la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328a-5: rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med par gyur pa de'i tshe smon lam yongs su btang ba zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328a-6: byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing shin tu yangs par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328a-8: phyir mi ldog par byed pas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328a-9: smon lam rgyun ma bcad pa zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328a-10: nam byang chub sems dpa' de chos kyi dbyings snang bar bya ba'i tshul gyis chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa rab tu shes shing mtshan nyid gcig gis chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid rab tu shes par gyur pa de'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328a-11: chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar thug pa zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328a-12: nam byang chub sems dpa' de phyir mi ldog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328a-13: pa'i btang snyoms dang ldan par gyur pa de'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i rgyud nye bar len pa la btang snyoms pa zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328a-15: byang chub sems dpa' de chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa rab tu shes pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa rab tu shes shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328a-16: chos thams cad mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i tshul gyis mtshan nyid sna tshogs rab tu shes la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328b-0: phyi @328b ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par skyo ba med cing yongs su yi 'chad pa med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328b-1: 'gro ba thams cad snying rje chen pos yongs su bskyab pa'i sems kyis sems can thams cad yongs su 'grel cing 'dul bas de'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328b-2: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328b-6: glang po'i rgyal po shugs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328b-7: ri gser gyi logs zhes bya ba'i rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi lung pa rin po che'i ra ba bdun gyis bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328b-8: rin po che'i shing thags kyi dra ba bdun gyis bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328b-9: rin po che'i dra bas kun nas yog pa na gnas te; glang po'i rgyal po shugs dang ldan pa de yang thams cad du dkar ba gangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328b-11: gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328b-12: gser gyi phyang phrul gyis klubs pa; gser gyi dra bas bkab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328b-13: dril bu'i dra ba brgyus pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328b-14: rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas sna kun nas bkab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328b-15: rin po che'i dril bu'i phreng ba kun nas brgyus pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328b-16: yan lag bdun shin tu gnas pa; mche ba drug dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328b-18: gzugs dang kha dog mi mthun pa med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328b-19: blta na skyo mi shes bar sdug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328b-23: yid bzhin du byed pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328b-24: de ni lha'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po brgya byin gyis bsgo na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:328b-25: gser gyi logs kyi ri lung pa nas mi snang bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329a-0: sum cu rtsa gsum du lha'i rgyal po brgya byin la rim gro bya ba'i @329a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329a-2: de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis glang po'i rgyal po shugs dang ldan pa la zhon par gyur pa na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329a-3: de'i tshe glang po'i rgyal po shugs dang ldan pa de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329a-4: rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa sna tshogs ston te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329a-5: mgo sum cu rtsa gsum mngon par sprul pa byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329a-6: mgo re re la yang mche ba drug drug mngon par sprul pa byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329a-7: so re re la yang rdzing bu bdun bdun mngon par sprul pa byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329a-8: rdzing bu re re zhing yang padmo bdun bdun mngon par sprul pa byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329a-9: padmo re re la yang lha'i bu mo brgya phrag bdun bdun mngon par sprul pa byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329a-10: lha'i bu mo de dag thams cad kyang lha rdzas kyi rol mo stong phrag du ma'i sgra 'byin pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la rim gror byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329a-11: lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang shugs dang ldan pa'i rim gro dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329a-12: sprul pa la longs spyod pa'i phyir chu klung phyogs mtshams zhes bya ba'i ngogs nas punda ri ka gcig gis khebs pa zhes bya ba'i bza' shing gi ra bar 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329a-13: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin punda ri ka gcig gis khebs pa'i bza' shing gi ra bar phyin nas glang po'i rgyal po shugs dang ldan pa las babs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329a-14: khang pa rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329a-15: snying po can na gnas shing lha'i bu mo mtha' yas pa dang rtse'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329b-0: de nas glang po'i rgyal po shugs dang ldan pas @329b lus sna tshogs kyi rdzu 'phrul brtul te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329b-1: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang punda ri ka gcig gis khebs pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba de na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329b-2: lha mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse dga' zhing dga' bar spyod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329b-3: de ltar glang po'i rgyal po shugs dang ldan pa rtse dga' zhing dga' bar spyod pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329b-4: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang lus mtshungs par gnas pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329b-5: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329b-6: glang po'i rgyal po shugs dang ldan pa'i lus zhes lus kyi khyad par med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329b-7: gzugs zhes gzugs kyi khyad par med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329b-8: kha dog ces kha dog gi khyad par med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329b-9: gzi brjid ces gzi brjid kyi khyad par med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329b-16: tshul gyis kyang khyad par gang yang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329b-17: glang po'i rgyal po shugs dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329b-18: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams su 'di dag ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329b-19: 'di dag ni glang po'i rgyal po shugs dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rnam par brtag tu med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329b-20: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329b-21: glang po'i rgyal po shugs dang ldan par 'dra'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329b-22: glang po'i rgyal po shugs dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329b-23: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams su 'dra'o; ;kye /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:329b-25: de ltar glang po'i rgyal po shugs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330a-0: gser gyi logs kyi ri rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi lung pa nas dga' ba sna tshogs mngon par @330a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330a-2: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi longs spyod kyi don du 'ongs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330a-3: lha'i dbang po brgya byin la mchod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330a-6: phu dud bya ba'i phyir sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang tha mi dad pa'i tshul gyis lha'i dga' ba la spyod pa de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330a-11: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun shin tu gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330a-12: 'od zer kun tu 'gyed pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330a-13: chos kyi dril gyi sgra kun tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330a-14: chos kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgreng ba'i rgyal mtshan can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330a-15: snying rje'i lung pa'i gnas na 'dug pa mthu bo che'i stobs kyi lus kyi khyad par can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330a-16: theg pa chen po'i smon lam gyi mche ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330a-17: drag shul gyi sengges bag tsha ba med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330a-18: ye shes kyi rgyud kyi chos kyi cod pa na btags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330a-19: gsang ba'i gnas thams cad nas rab tu byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330a-21: smon lam gyis skyo ba med pa'i byang chub kyi shing drung na mos shing spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330b-0: smon lam @330b gyi rgyun mi gcod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330b-1: byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330b-2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rdzing bu tha dad pa med par mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mngon sum du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330b-3: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330b-4: smon lam rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330b-5: blo rnam par sangs rgyas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par sgrub cing rgyun mi gcod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330b-8: phyir ldog par mi byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330b-9: snying rje chen po mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330b-10: smon lam chen po'i theg pas sems can thams cad kyi ris na kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la mngon par gnas shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330b-11: brtson 'grus yongs su mi gtong ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330b-12: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal yongs su bsal ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330b-13: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lam yongs su chad par mi byed kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330b-14: byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang mi rgya ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330b-15: rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sgo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330b-16: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sgo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330b-17: bsgom pa'i bsam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:330b-18: zhing 'byams klas pa sna tshogs kyi gnas su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331a-1: brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs 'byams klas pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag tu skye bar snang ngo; ;byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyad pa spyod par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung du mngon par sangs rgyas pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kun nas bskor ba dag gi zhabs kyi drung du 'gro bar snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331a-5: phyogs mtshams 'byams klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po rgya mtsho dag tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331a-6: skad cig gcig lon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331a-7: mngon par sangs rgyas nas yud tsam zhig lon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331a-8: mngon par sangs rgyas nas dus gzhan du gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331a-9: mngon par sangs rgyas nas nyi ma gcig lon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331a-10: mngon par sangs rgyas nas zla ba phyed lon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331a-11: mngon par sangs rgyas nas lo gcig lon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331a-12: mngon par sangs rgyas nas lo grangs med pa lon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331a-13: mngon par sangs rgyas nas bskal pa gcig lon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331a-14: mngon par sangs rgyas nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snyed lon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi zhabs kyi drung du nye bar 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331b-0: de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sangs @331b rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gro byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331b-4: sangs rgyas rnams la zhu ba byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331b-5: rnam par 'phel ba'i sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhing yongs su sbyong zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa mtha' yas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331b-7: ye shes brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes yangs pa sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par bsgrub pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu mtha' dang dbus med pa sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa la rnam par rtse ba sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i chos snang ba rnam par dag pa'i tshul sna tshogs kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331b-16: smon lam gyis thams cad du spyod par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:331b-17: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rdzu 'phrul dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:352b-4: kha dog tha dad pa ma yin pa yang rab tu shes so //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:352b-17: gzugs med pa'i khams kyang ma yin no //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:352b-19: skye ba yang ma yin no //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:352b-23: rnam par dag pa'ang ma yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:352b-24: rmi lam snang ba yang med pa'ang ma yin no //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:353a-1: po yang 'jig rten thams cad 'khrug pa med pa'i tshul gyis rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:353a-4: rmi lam rab tu dben pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:353a-5: rmi lam gyi rang bzhin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:353a-6: rmi lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:353a-7: rmi lam tha mi dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:353a-10: rmi lam gyi 'jig rten khong du chud pa lta bur rab tu shes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:353a-12: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmi lam lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa ste drug pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:353a-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa bdun pa gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:353a-16: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos nyid mngon par bsgrub pa'i bslab pa la shin tu bslabs pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:353a-19: sgra brnyan ni sgra sna tshogs grags par byed kyang 'pho ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:353a-20: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung nang na brjod pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:353b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung phyi rol na brjod pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes @353b so; ;de ltar shes pa de yang nang nas shes pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:353b-5: tshig kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:353b-6: sgra brnyan lta bur rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas grag par gyur ba'i chos nyid kyang 'khrug par mi byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:353b-7: sgro 'dogs par yang mi byed la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:353b-8: dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug cing bslab pa la'ang shin tu bslabs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:353b-11: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bud med 'grogs ma'i kha'i dbugs kyis lan gcig bus pas; kha'i dbugs yan lag stong dang ldan pa 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:353b-12: kha'i dbugs la rnam par rtog pa med kyang dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam pa stong du sgrog go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:353b-13: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rnam par mi rtog pa dang ldan pa'i dbyings la 'jug pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:353b-14: dbyangs kyi yan lag mtha' yas pa rnam par bsgom pa la mkhas pas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med par 'gro ba thams cad la phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la rab tu 'jug cing 'khor rnams la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354a-0: @354a *// lce shin tu yangs pa yang byin gyis rlob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354a-1: dbyangs chags pa med pa yang rab tu brjod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354a-2: zhing thams cad du 'gengs pa'i dbyangs kyang byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354a-3: sems can rnams kyis mtha' yas par khong du chud par yang byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354a-4: chos rnam par phye ba 'byams klas pa yang rab tu snang bar byed do; ;dbyangs thams cad la 'jug pa med pa yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354a-5: sgra rnam par dmigs pa yang rnam par dmigs pa med par rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354a-6: dbyangs sna tshogs kyang rnam par 'god do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354a-7: dbyangs kyi yan lag gi dkyil 'khor khong du chud pas kyang rab tu spyod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354a-9: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa ste bdun pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gzugs brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa brgyad pa gang zhe na /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354a-17: 'jig rten du rgyu ba med do //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354b-4: 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gro ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354b-5: 'jig rten las ldog pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354b-6: byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyang 'jig rten ma yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354b-7: 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang ma yin no //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354b-11: nyung ba yang ma yin te /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354b-13: 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354b-14: 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang ba'ang ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354b-15: chos kyi rgyud thogs par byed pa'ang ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354b-28: dngos po sna tshogs mtha' yas pa tshad med pa rnams kyi gzugs gang dang gang yod pa de dag thams cad rnam par dmigs par byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354b-34: gzhan yang yo byad kha dog dang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:354b-35: mdog gsal ba gang yang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355a-0: de dag shin tu dang ba'i phyir de dag tu @355a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355a-1: gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par byed kyang gzugs brnyan ni shin tu dang ba'i dbyings de dang 'dres pa yang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355a-2: gzugs brnyan de de las gud na 'dug pa yang ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355a-3: gzugs brnyan de de ltar rnam par dmigs pa dang yang 'grogs ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355a-4: dang pa'i dngos po de yang gzugs brnyan gyis dang 'grogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355a-5: gzugs brnyan de chu klung gi rgyun gyis kyang khyer bar mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355a-6: gzugs brnyan de chu bo'i rgya mtshor 'chi bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355a-7: dang ba sna tshogs de dag gis kyang gzugs brnyan de la gos par mi 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355a-8: de dag tu gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa'ang yod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355a-9: de dag gis gzung ba 'dra yang gzugs brnyan gang du dmigs par gyur pa des de'i tshe gzung ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355a-10: gzugs brnyan de ni ring bar yang snang nye bar yang snang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355a-11: de ltar ring ba dang nye bar yang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355a-12: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rang gi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gzhan gyi rgyud kyi yul du snang bar byed kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355a-14: 'di ni bdag gi ye shes kyi rgyud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355a-15: 'di ni bdag gi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor to zhes gnyis su mi byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355a-16: bdag gi yul dang gzhan gyi yul rnam par dbye ba'ang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355b-0: sa bon du gyur pa ni shin tu @355b 'phel zhing skye ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355b-3: sbu gu'i gnas su gyur nas rnam par dbye ba'ang yod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355b-4: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos nyid mi gnyis pa la gnyis kyis mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i ye shes la chags pa med pa'i mtha'i tshul gyis rab tu 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355b-6: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gzugs brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa ste brgyad pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355b-7: bzod pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag tu 'gro ba yang med la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa dag tu'ang snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas kyang g-yo ba med cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355b-10: 'jig rten gyi khams gang du'ang 'gro ba med la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355b-11: lus kyi dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan du gyur pa yang kun tu rnam par dmigs par byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355b-12: rjes su song ba'i lus kyang 'jig rten thams cad du phyin par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355b-13: lus rnam par phye ba chags pa med pas spyod pa'ang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355b-14: gang yang 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi mtshan ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355b-15: 'jig rten dong skom yod pa de dag 'dres pa'ang ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:355b-16: tha dad pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su rigs dang ldan par byung ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid @356a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356a-1: rnam par dag pa yang rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356a-2: kha dog mtha' yas pa'i lus thams cad rnam par dag pa yang rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356a-3: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sprul pa lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356a-5: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad sprul pa lta bur rab tu 'jug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356a-6: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pas sprul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par 'du byed pas sprul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356a-9: rnam par rtog pas sprul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356a-10: bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad kyi phyin ci log gis sprul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356a-11: sgro btags pas sprul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356a-12: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad med pas sprul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356a-13: tshig gi lam gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sprul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356a-14: nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yongs su rtog pas sprul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356a-17: 'dul ba rnam par byang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356a-18: rnam par dag par bya ba'i yongs su rtog pas sprul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356a-20: dus gsum du phyir mi ldog pas sprul pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byung ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356a-22: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyis sprul pa spyod pas yangs par byas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356b-0: @356b de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos sprul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356b-1: 'gro ba thams cad la bstabs par rnam par bkod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356b-4: thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis sprul pa mi 'jig pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356b-5: tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i ye shes kyis 'jug par rab tu shes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356b-6: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356b-7: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sprul pa rab tu shes par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356b-8: khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356b-12: mu med par ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin du thob par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356b-15: de kho na nyid du shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356b-16: yang dag pa nyid las mi g-yo bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:356b-18: ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du chud mi za bar byed do //
