K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:361b-6: nam mkha' ltar 'jig rten thams cad 'dzin pa'i tshul du lus thams cad 'jig pa med cing shin tu brten pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:361b-7: 'jig rten gyi gdung ba thams cad kyis nam mkha' 'tshig par mi 'gyur ba'i tshul du rdo rje ltar sra zhing brtan la rno ba'i dbang po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:361b-8: nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi tshul du 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'dzin pa'i stobs la yang dag par 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-2: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bzod pa thob pa bcu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos don 'di nyid de bas kyang gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-4: byang chub sems dpa' de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-5: ji ltar skyes bu la la zhig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-6: rin chen 'byung gnas thos gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-7: nor tshogs chen po bsags don du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-8: rab tu dga' ba skye ba yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-9: de bzhin shes rab che ldan pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-10: byang chub sems dpa' rgyal sras rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mtshan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-12: zab cing zhi ba rab tu nyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-13: zab pa'i chos ni thos gyur cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-15: de dag sems la sdang ba med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-16: skrag pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-17: rgya chen dbyangs ni thos gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-18: bzod pa'i dbyangs kyis byang chub tu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-19: shes rab chen po yang dag 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-20: de la the tshom skye ba med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-21: bdag ni thams cad mkhyen par bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-22: bdag ni mi yi mgon du bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-23: chos rab shin tu zab pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-24: bdag gis sgra yi sgo nas thos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-25: sgra yi rjes su 'brang bas ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-26: dga' ba'i dam pa mi 'thob ces //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos don du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-28: de yi mos pa brtan pa skye //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362a-29: bsam pa byang chub sems rab kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-0: 'dus shing @362b yongs su sgom pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-1: chos rnams 'khrug par mi byed de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-2: de yi dad pa rnam par 'phel;/
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-3: des ni sgra rjes 'gro ba yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-5: spyod la shin tu brtson byed cing; ;dbyangs kyi bzod la rab tu gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-6: chos kyi 'byung gnas yin pas na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-7: shin tu brtson pa rab tu tshol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-8: brtson 'grus ldog par mi byed de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-9: sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa byed; ;dbyangs tsam gyis ni gnas byed pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-10: byang chub sems dpa' bag tsha med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-11: dbyangs kyis mos pa rab tu 'thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-12: des ni rgyal ba mnyes par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-13: skyes bu la la bsod nams rgyas gyur pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-14: gser gyi 'byung gnas chen po rnyed gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-15: brgyan pa'i gnas kyi rgyan du rab sbyangs nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-16: de dag lus dang mthun pa'i rgyan du byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-17: de bzhin mkhas pas chos kyi phul thos na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-18: sems dang blo yangs rgya mtshor bsgyur byas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-19: ji ltar sngon thos chos rnams rtog par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-20: mi mthun tshul du chos la tshol mi byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-21: de dag rtogs nas shin tu mthun par spyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-22: rnam par mi sgom chos ni gang yang med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-23: de dag chos rnams ji bzhin mthun byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-24: de bzhin de ni chos rnams khong du chud par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-25: mkhas pa'i sems ni rnam dag skyer 'gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-26: dga' ba'i sems yid rnam dag gsal ba skye //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-27: chos kyi yid la bdag nyid che ba brtson //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:362b-28: rten cing 'brel 'byung chos la rab tu 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-1: mnyam pa nyid la de brtson te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-2: dngos po rnam par bsgom la mngon par brtson //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-3: rgyal ba'i mdzod dang 'gal bar mi byed de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-4: chos rnams mi mnyam med par rab tu shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-5: de ni bsam pa mthar thug rab brtan pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-6: rgyal ba'i byang chub ji bzhin rab tu spyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-7: ri rab bzhin du mi g-yo brtan pa yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-8: de yi bsam pa byang chub mchog la rten //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-9: mnyam gzhag sems dang ldan pas de brtson te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-10: brtson 'grus ldan pa'i yid kyis rab tu spyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-11: bskal pa stong du spyad pa spyod byed kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-12: de yi brtson 'grus 'jig par mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-13: 'di dag chos la yang dag de 'jug ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-14: rgyal ba'i rtogs bya'i gting yang rab tu rnyed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-15: chos nyid zhi ba rab tu thob gyur pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-16: de la 'jums pa'i yid byed gang yang med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-17: dpe zla med pas ji skad gsungs pa ltar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-18: de ni chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-19: mi mnyam tshul du bzod pa mi skyed de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-20: ye shes mnyam nyid yongs su rdzogs par sgrub //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-21: bde bar gshegs pas mthun par gang gsungs pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-22: de dag bzod pa'i sgo nas rab tu 'grub //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-23: chos rnams 'jig dang ldan pa ma yin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-24: chos nyid ji bzhin de 'dra rab tu shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-25: lha gnas 'di lha'i bu rnams 'dir 'dus dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363a-26: sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su lha rnams skyes gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-0: de dag zil @363b mngar sna tshogs rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-1: de dag 'khor ba'i snad gcig mngon spyod zad gyur na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-2: zil mngar zhim pa de dag 'ongs pa ma yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-3: phyogs bcu kun nas zil mngar stobs pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-4: las rnams ji lta ji bzhin lha rnams de ltar za //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-5: de la skye ba med de bza' ba med pa min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-6: de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'i sems rab mngon skyes kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-7: de la rdul cha'i chos kyang skyes par gyur pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-8: ma skyes gang yin chos de nam yang 'gag pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-9: dam pa'i chos kyi rkyen brten mkhas pa rab tu bzhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-10: ma 'gags gang yin mi zad chos rgyud de dang de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-11: chos nyid 'di yi tshul la rab tu gnas pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-12: tha dad med pa'i chos dbyings 'di la rab tu 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-13: 'jig rten tha dad med pa'i rgyud kyi tshul yang shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-14: de bzhin nyid mnyam 'jig rten zhi ba'i gzhir gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-15: gzhi med tha dad med pa'i yang dag mtha' shes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-16: smon lam rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gro la phan phyir 'debs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-17: rgyal sras de ni bde gshegs mkhyen la'ang mngon chags med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-18: de ni dben gzhol sangs rgyas chos rnams ston pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-19: chos kyi shugs las 'on kyang g-yo bar 'gyur ba med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-20: brda dang grangs kyi tshul gyis mngon par 'du byed de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-21: 'jig rten snying brtser smon lam dam pa rab tu 'debs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-22: smon lam 'debs la gnas kyang stobs bcu ldan pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:363b-23: 'gro ba ma lus kun la de ni gnas pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364a-1: yongs su len dang 'dor ba spangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364a-2: chos dang chos kyi man ngag rnam pa'i tshul la mkhas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364a-3: 'di ni bzod pa'i dam pa ma skyes chos can te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364a-4: des ni chos rnams zad med zad par mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364a-5: mi skye'i tshul gyis yongs su gdams bya'i chos kyi dbyings //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364a-6: de bzhin nyid las brtan pa rnam par 'gyur ba med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364a-7: rgyal sras byang chub don du bzod pa 'di gnas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364a-8: de la phyogs kun sangs rgyas mtha' yas lung yang ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364a-9: rgyal sras de la sangs rgyas mkhyen pas dbang bskur mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364a-10: phyogs bcu kun nas rab tu snang bar mngon du gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364a-11: de dag chos kun rab zhi rtag tu zhi ba'i sems //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364a-12: mngon par sgrub cing dge ba kun la 'gro ba 'god //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364a-13: dus gsum chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid de 'dra bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364a-14: mtshan rnams yongs su dag byas sems can 'dul ba byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364a-15: sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams nges par sus rtogs pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364a-16: de dag 'jig rten sna tshogs du ma rtogs byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364a-17: 'jig rten sna tshogs sgyu tshul yang dag rtogs byas nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364a-18: las yangs shin tu bsags pas rnam pa sna tshogs pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364a-19: sems las las kyi rnam pa du ma 'byung bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364a-20: de bas 'jig rten sems de sgyu ma lta bur bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364a-21: de dag rnam brtags sgyu ma 'dra bas nub par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-0: srid pa'i lam rgyud ma lus sgyu 'dra @364b yang dag min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-1: ji ltar sgyu ma'i rnam pa byin rlabs byas pa'i gzugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-2: lam gyi bzhi mdor 'jig rten phal gyi nang bstan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-3: 'gro bas mthong na de la kun kyang mos pa skyed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-4: sgyu mas 'jig rten las ni gang yang 'grub mi 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-5: de bzhin 'gro ba ji snyed gang rnams yod pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-6: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin lta bu ma skyes chos nyid de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-7: dngos yod dngos med de bzhin yod dang med pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-8: skal pa mi mnyam tshul gyis gro rgyud rab tu ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-9: sgyu ma'i tshul rnams shes nas sems can yongs su 'grel //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-10: sgyu ma lta bu'i yin par sems can khong du chud //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-11: sems can sgyu 'dra de bzhin sgyu ma sems can 'dra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-12: sems can med cing sgyu ma 'dra bar 'jig rten shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-13: sems can zhing dang chos dang de bzhin dus gsum dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-14: 'jig rten thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam par rab tu 'byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-15: sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur chos rnams rab rtogs pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-16: 'jig rten ma lus 'di dag sgyu ma'i rnam par shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-17: skyes pa dag dang de bzhin bud med rogs pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-18: bu mo de bzhin rnam par dul ba nye bar rton //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-19: glang po rta dang ba lang phyugs dang shing rnams dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-20: me tog 'bras bu bzang dang ldan pa'i mtsho yang ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-21: thabs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs mang bar sgyu ma'i sems //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-22: sna tshogs gnas la'ang sgyu ma yongs su gnas pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:364b-23: sgyu ma dben la gzhol zhing shin tu zhi ba yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-1: rten rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs mang po ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-2: de bzhin rgyal sras btsun pa rigs dang ldan pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-3: 'jig rten sgyu ma sna tshogs ji bzhin ston par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-4: sgom dang rnam par sgom pa'i dngos po'i sems kyang med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-5: dngos po dngos med sgyu ma ji bzhin rab tu shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-6: zhing dang sems can chos kyi rnam pa mang por bcas; ;las rnams sna tshogs rnam pas yongs su bsags pa la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-7: gnas par mi byed mngon par chags pa de bzhin med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-8: chags med mtha' yi sgyu ma'i tshul ni des shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-9: de ltar rgyal sras mkhas pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-10: rab tu zhi la dga' zhing spros pa med pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-11: gnas med sa dang yang dag ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-12: chos dbyings gnas la de dag rab tu zhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-13: de na chos nyid rtogs pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-14: brtan pa de dag rgyal ba'i sku skyes sras yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-15: 'du shes rgyu la mkhas pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-16: 'gro ba thams cad 'du shes 'dra bar shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-18: 'gro ba thams cad de ltar 'du shes phyin ci log /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-19: 'du shes rnam phye mkhas pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-20: de ni 'gro kun 'du shes spangs pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-21: sems can sna tshogs khong du chud //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-22: 'jig rten kun gyi sna tshogs rnam pa kun dang bral //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-23: 'jig rten 'du shes rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365a-24: 'jig rten 'du shes med min 'du shes ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365b-1: sems can mtha' yas 'du shes rnam pa sna tshogs yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365b-2: ma nor mig dang ldan pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365b-3: 'jig rten sna tshogs 'du shes rab tu mthong; ;'jig rten smig rgyu 'dra ba ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365b-4: 'du shes sna tshogs rnam pas 'jig rten rnam par bkod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365b-6: de dag phyin ci log gsum rnam par spangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365b-7: ji ltar smig rgyu'i tshogs kyi rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365b-8: 'gro ba rnams la chu yi rnam pa dmigs par snang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365b-9: de la chu ni yod min yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365b-10: chu yi 'du shes rnam par rab tu bslu; ;de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365b-11: khams gsum lam rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365b-12: 'du shes rnam pa smig rgyu bzhin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365b-13: chags med yid ldan spyod yul mtha' yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365b-14: 'du shes thams cad rnam par spangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365b-15: chags med ye shes ldan zhing spros pa med pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365b-17: 'du shes bslus las brten pa 'grel par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:365b-18: nga rgyal rlom dang dregs pa spangs //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-1: mkha' 'dra'i bzod pa'i tshul la shin tu brtan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-2: des ni mkha' 'drar mtshan nyid med pa kun; ;'jig rten ji snyed mtshan nyid tha dad pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-3: mtshan nyid mtshan 'das mtshan ma med tshul du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-4: kun kyang yang dag mkha' dang 'dra bar byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-5: gang la dus gsum thams cad gnas pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-6: chos nyid mkha' 'dra des ni shes byas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-7: de ni rnam par phye ba gcig tshul gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-8: 'gro ba thams cad nam mkha'i tshul du shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-9: de ni nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes lus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-10: de ni nam mkha' lta bu'i sgra dbyangs ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-11: de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin lus can te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-12: ye shes nam mkha' lta bur zhi bas gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-13: rgyal ba'i sras kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-14: bzod pa bcu po 'di dag de dag gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-15: bzod pa'i stobs la de dag rab gnas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-16: 'jig rten phan pa'i don du bshad cing bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-17: 'di yi tshul la brtan pa bslabs pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-18: ye shes 'di la shin tu mthu che ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-19: chos kyi mthu dang ye shes mthur yang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-20: byang chub tshul rjes bsam pa'i sems dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-21: bzod pa 'di yi tshul la zhugs pa ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-22: ye shes stobs kyis chags pa med la 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370a-23: 'jig rten lhar bcas de yi zil gyis mnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-0: 'jig rten @370b dag tu 'khor lo bla med bskor //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-1: de dag spyod tshul shin tu rgya che bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-2: de dag tshad ni 'jig rten kun na med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-3: skyes bu 'dul ba dpe zla med pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-4: ye shes rgya mtsho'i tshul la de dag zhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-5: bdag med sems kyis 'jig rten spyod pa'i tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-6: chos kyis rnam dag gyur pa'i yid ldan pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-7: bstan pa de dag 'di 'dra'i chos la 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-8: chos nyid des kyang 'jig rten tshim par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-9: 'gro ba'i tshad ni thams cad shes par nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-10: sems can ma lus thams cad bgrang bar nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-11: rdul gcig rtse la ma lus zhing bgrang nus; ;mkhas pa'i yon tan de dag mtha' yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-12: sangs rgyas sras po skyes bu chen po la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-13: bzod pa bcu po 'di dag yod pa ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-14: ye shes spyod yul sgor yang 'gro kun gyis; ;tshad du bgrang bar nus pa yod pa min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-15: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-16: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-19: bam po drug cu rtsa gnyis pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-22: grangs ma mchis pa shin tu bstan pa zhes bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-23: grangs ma mchis pa'i grangs ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:370b-25: ji ltar na grangs ma mchis pa bstan pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371a-3: kun tu mtha' yas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371a-4: bgrang du mi rung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371a-5: mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371a-6: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371a-7: gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371a-8: brjod du ma mchis pa'i yang brjod du ma mchis pa lags na ji ltar bstan par 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371a-9: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371a-15: de ltar khyod kyis 'jig rten thams cad grangs kyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371a-16: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen pa'i don 'di /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la zhu bar bsam pa legs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371a-19: de bas na skyes bu dam pa legs par nyon la rab tu yid la gzung zhig dang bstan par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371a-21: de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371a-22: byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371a-25: de la 'di skad ces bya ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371a-26: brgya stong phrag brgya na bye ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371a-27: bye ba bye ba na khod khod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371a-28: khod khod khod khod na thad dgu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-0: thad @371b dgu thad dgu na khrig khrig go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-1: khrig khrig khrig khrig na thams thams so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-2: thams thams thams thams na myad myid do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-3: myad myid myad myid na gang ya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-4: gang ya gang ya na ban bun no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-5: ban bun ban bun na phyar phyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-6: phyar phyur phyar phyur na lcag lcig go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-7: lcag lcig lcag lcig na byang bying ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-8: byang bying byang bying na chem chem mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-9: chem chem chem chem na phyal phyol lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-10: phyal phyol phyal phyol na khyud khyud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-11: khyud khyud khyud khyud na zar zer ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-12: zar zer zar zer na khrib khrib bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-13: khrib khrib khrib khrib na ya gangs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-14: ya gangs ya gangs na cho ma'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-15: cho ma cho ma na khram khrim mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-16: khram khrim khram khrim na nab nub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-17: nab nub nab nub na sang sang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-18: sang sang sang sang na brgyud yas so; ;brgyud yas rgyud yas na gtang yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-19: gtang yas gtang yas na bkra yar ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-20: bkra yar bkra yar na gsa' yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-21: gsa' yas gsa' yas na mtshungs med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-22: mtshungs med mtshungs med na lam lum mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-23: lam lum lam lum na yal yol lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-24: yal yol yal yol na khral khrul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-25: khral khrul khral khrul na thud thud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-26: thud thud thud thud na bsam phyod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-27: bsam phyod bsam phyod na brang breng ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-28: brang breng brang breng na bgrod yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:371b-29: bgrod yas bgrod yas na bsngo yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-1: yas bsngo yas na zang yag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-2: zang yag zang yag na 'phro bkye'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-4: rtse 'phyo rtse 'phyo na yong tan no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-5: yong tan yong tan na 'brug g-yos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-6: 'brug g-yos 'brug g-yos na sang yal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-7: sang yal sang yal na thig yug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-8: thig yug thig yug na yid 'phyo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-9: yid 'phyo yid 'phyo na nab neb bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-10: nab neb nab neb na khrig thams so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-11: khrig thams khrig thams na yal yal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-12: yal yal yal yal na bgrang yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-13: bgrang yas bgrang yas na thug yal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-14: thug yal thug yal na shang shang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-15: shang shang shang shang na yag yag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-16: yag yag yag yag na tham thim mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-17: tham thim tham thim na rlom bsnyal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-18: rlom bsnyal rlom bsnyal na gzhal 'phyos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-19: gzhal 'phyos gzhal 'phyos na gzhal yal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-20: gzhal yas gzhal yas na gzhal med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-21: gzhal med gzhal med na gzhal 'khor to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-22: gzhal 'khor gzhal 'khor na gzhal thim mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-23: gzhal thim gzhal thim na gar gzhal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-24: gar gzhal gar gzhal na gzhal sangs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-25: gzhal sangs gzhal sangs na gzhal thag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-26: gzhal thag gzhal thag na gzhal phul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372a-27: gzhal phul gzhal phul na gzhal zhi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-0: @372b gzhal zhi gzhal zhi na 'phyo 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-2: nyar nyer nyar nyer na phyag phyig go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-3: phyag phyig phyag phyig na zal zul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-4: zal zul zal zul na sal sal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-5: sal sal sal sal na g-yo ldeg go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-6: g-yo ldeg g-yo ldeg na phan phun no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-7: phan phun phan phun na brnang ya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-8: brnang ya brnang ya na rem 'drol lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-9: rem 'drol rem 'drol na rdzi ngad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-10: rdzi ngad rdzi ngad na rdzi rdul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-11: rdzi rdul rdzi rdul na phun yol lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-12: phun yol phun yol na ngad ngad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-13: ngad ngad ngad ngad na bgrang brtsi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-14: bgrang brtsi bgrang brtsi na zab bgrang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-15: zab bgrang zab bgrang na dga' rkyang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-16: dga' rkyang dga' rkyang na gzhung 'dal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-17: gzhung 'dal gzhung 'dal na khrug phyad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-18: khrug phyad khrug phyad na 'ol phyod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-19: 'ol phyod 'ol phyod na gdab yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-20: gdab yas gdab yas na gcal yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-21: gcal yas gcal yas na bgrang yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-22: bgrang yas bgrang yas na byim 'phyo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-24: yam me yam me na bsnyal yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-25: bsnyal yas bsnyal yas na ldab ldeb bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-26: ldab ldeb ldab ldeb na 'phan chad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-27: 'phan chad 'phan chad na phang phung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-28: phang phung phang phung na khe'u tshang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-29: khe'u tshang khe'u tshang na zhung zung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:372b-30: zhung zung zhung zung na mchog yal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-0: mchog yal mchog yal na mtha' @373a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-2: mtha' rdul mtha' rdul na yun 'gyangs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-3: yun 'gyangs yun 'gyangs na bun lob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-4: bun lob bun lob na lam lom mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-5: lam lom lam lom na bsnyad yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-6: bsnyad yas bsnyad yas na lang ling ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-7: lang ling lang ling na ljab ljib bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-8: ljab ljib ljab ljib na mi brtsal to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-9: mi brtsal mi brtsal na 'byams yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-11: nga 'grang nga 'grang na smos yal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-12: smos yal smos yal na bkra chal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-13: bkra chal bkra chal na lo rgyas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-14: lo rgyas lo rgyas na 'bum rdib bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-15: 'bum rdib 'bum rdib na gam gum mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-16: gam gum gam gum na la lo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-17: la lo la lo na bgrang 'phyos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-18: bgrang 'phyos bgrang 'phyos na bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-19: bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa bgrang 'phyos la bsgres na dpag yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-20: dpag yas dpag yas na dpag yas la bsgres pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-21: dpag yas la bsgres pa dpag yas la bsgres na yal phyong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-22: yal phyong yang phyong na yal phyong la bsgres pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-23: yal phyong la bsgres pa yal phyong la bsgres na mu yal to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-24: mu yal mu yal na mu yal bsgres pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373a-25: mu yal la bsgres pa mu yal la bsgres na bgrang yol lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373b-0: bgrang yol bgrang @373b yol na bgrang yol la bsgres pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373b-1: bgrang yol la bsgres pa bgrang yol la bsgres na mi 'jal to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373b-2: mi 'jal mi 'jal na mi 'jal la bsgres pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373b-3: mi 'jal la bsgres pa mi 'jal la bsgres na bsam phyod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373b-4: bsam phyos bsam phyos na bsam phyos la bsgres pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373b-5: bsam phyos la bsgres pa bsam phyos la bsgres na mtha' 'byams so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373b-6: mtha' 'byams mtha' 'byams na dpag thag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373b-7: dpag thag dpag thag na dpag thag la bsgres pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373b-8: dpag thag la bsgres pa dpag thag la bsgres na brjod du med pa'o; ;brjod du med pa brjod du med pa na brjod du med pa la bsgres pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373b-9: brjod du med pa la bsgres pa brjod du med pa la bsgres na brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa shin tu bstan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyal po la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373b-11: brjod du med pa'i brjod du med pa ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373b-12: brjod du med pas thams cad 'tshang bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373b-13: brjod du med pa bskal par brjod byas kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373b-14: brjod du med la mthar thug gang yang med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373b-15: brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas zhing gi rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373b-16: thams cad bshig ste rdul du kun blags shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:373b-17: gcig rtse la'ang gcig po brjod med par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:374a-0: thams cad brjod du med par rab @374a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:374a-2: zhing rnams brjod du med pa'i brjod med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:374a-3: skad cig sems kyis kun kyang rab tu 'jig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-043-001:374a-4: skad cig re re 'jig pa brjod du med; ;'jig pas bskal pa mang po zad par byed //
